properties.name: Charming 1940s Malibu
properties.space: Charming ranch house built in 1946.  Remodeled to maintain a vintage feel.  Amenities include washer, dryer, dishwasher, WiFi, television, cable,  DVD Player with a limited DVD library, CD Player, swimming pool about 125 feet away from rental (shared with homeowner).  This is the second private house on a 2-home property 5 minute drive to Zuma Beach and Point Dume. 3 minute drive to grocery store, gas station, post office, restaurants, bank, bus stop, etc. Ample parking 2 Bedrooms, 1 Bathroom (with tub and shower), Full Kitchen, Dining Room, Living Room, Back Porch, Front Porch Enjoy a peaceful getaway surrounded by nature! Close to beach, hiking trails, wine tasting and main freeways--easy access to Hollywood, Universal City/Universal Studios, Venice Beach, Santa Monica Pier, etc. **Stays after 2 weeks may incur additional cleaning fee

The beach is private but Carbon Beach ( Billionaire's Beach ) is one minute drive and Malibu road Beach about 3 minutes drive.  The house provides a great location in the heart of Malibu.  Nobu, Malibu Colony and Malibu Colony Shopping Center  is one minute drive. Cross Creek Road and Malibu Lumber Yard Shopping Center is a minute drive and you are 30 Minutes from Beverly Hills.

properties.name: Windcliff Ranch Malibu Retreat
properties.summary: Exceptional mountain-top property with breathtaking views of ocean/Malibu! Has pool. Perfect for people seeking a private/peaceful retreat. Close to Santa Monica & Malibu center. For 2 people, check our other listing if you are more than 2 guests.
properties.space: Check out our Instagram @windcliffranchmalibu for more day-to-day pictures. Please see complete house rules before making an inquiry. Do not make a reservation before sending a detailed inquiry so we can get to know each other better :)  This is a tranquil retreat with some of the most spectacular ocean, canyon, and valley views found in Los Angeles. We are situated on 10 park-like acres on top of Las Flores Canyon within a gated community. This location is very peaceful/private. Perfect place for nature-loving people seeking a quiet and relaxing private retreat in Malibu, CA. The house is located a beautiful 15-20 minute drive away from/above the beach and Cross Creek (Malibu's shopping/entertainment/dining center) — you'll get there quicker as you get used to the canyons. Other than beauty and peace, our mountain location has a lot of benefits. In the summer, you almost always sit above the seaside morning fog (see pictures) meaning you can catch the sun and enjoy our pool in the mor

properties.neighborhood_overview: Within the Santa Monica Mountains National Park & Recreation Area-- a naturalist's dream! The neighborhood is as close to Malibu's town center and beaches as it is to other valley-side communities. It's a 15-20 minute drive to each of these centers, where you'll find stores, groceries, and all other necessities. Approximately 25 minute (in no traffic) scenic drive to Santa Monica/Venice. We are a quiet, secure gated community with about 35 spread out homes. Our neighbors keep to themselves, though you might run into them if you take a walk! You cannot see other properties from our house (and they can't see you). We are one of the most removed/private houses in the neighborhood. WILDLIFE/NATURE  This beautiful, diverse, and wild mountain is home to an amazing assortment of wildlife. This is THEIR home we are their neighbors on the edge of this wilderness. With that in mind, we try to maintain a no-kill philosophy on the property. The house is VERY clean, but you might see some lizards,
properties.notes: The pool isn't heated, it is best to swim from June to mid October. A pool cleaning company comes every Wednesday afternoon for about 40 minutes. Not safe for toddlers and non swimmers. The pool is not fenced. Parents takes full responsibilities and acknowledgment.
properties.transit: Winding, canyon roads. You need a car. Unlike most canyons in Malibu, there are multiple roads that lead to our neighborhood. From the Pacific Coast Highway (PCH) to Las Flores Canyon or Malibu Canyon or from the valley take the 101 freeway to Malibu Canyon, Stunt Road, or even Topanga. This allows you a lot of flexibility when dealing with summer traffic. Also there is easy access to Calabasas and Woodland Hills.
properties.access: Please read the house rules first as it pretty much sums things up. The entire house with ONE bedroom, the ground of the property except the guest house, the garage, the  2 other bedrooms, my office and a few closets which will remain locked so there is no confusion.Again, your reservation includes private access to a pool, the big front yard, and various outdoor seating areas. Feel free to explore the entire property. This listing is for ONE bedroom. The other bedrooms will be closed. If you should need more, please see our other listing which accommodate more guests.
properties.interaction: We (me and/or my adult daughter) will be staying in the detached guest house across from the main house. We are quiet and will respect your privacy/make ourselves as invisible as possible. However, we will be available to help you at any time either in person or by text: questions, concerns, recommendations, etc.
properties.house_rules: - ENJOY yourself ! :) - NO PHOTOSHOOTS unless you have specifically booked for this purpose and paid the appropriate fees.  - NO PARTIES - NO COMMERCIAL FILMING unless you have specifically booked for this purpose and paid the appropriate fees.  - NO WEDDINGS.  - NO SMOKING - NO PETS (I love them, but can't have them in the house, my dog and cat are very territorial and they will mark!). - A 14% OCCUPANCY TAX of the gross rental amount is due at check-in. Since Airbnb is not collecting yet for UNINCORPORATED MALIBU/LA COUNTY, we will collect it directly from you AT YOUR CHECK-IN. - CHILDREN if accepted in the reservation request MUST know how to swim. The pool isn't fenced and is easily accessible from the bedrooms. - This place is not appropriate for young children (under 12). - NO ADDITIONAL GUESTS on the property unless you receive a written prior approval. We will request their names. We are very strict about this so please don't risk loosing your deposit. Two cars maximum. Visitor
properties.host_about: I am from France and have been involved with art, design and fashion for most my life.  I am a mother to a 22 year old who just graduated from college. We have a dog and a cat. I like to create something new each day and I strive to live in balance with nature. I have a passion for healthy living which may include a glass of red wine at the end of the day! I love to hike and to explore less travelled paths. I collect rocks and work with metals. I love large open spaces and cherish solitude, the clarity it brings. I live on a beautiful piece of the Earth and like to share it with people of like minds...who care about beauty and the creative nature of people.

properties.name: 'Bu Seaside Cottage!
properties.summary: Stay in a spacious, clean, and charming beach cottage with 1 master bedroom (king bed) and 1 guest bedroom (queen bed) with private baths. Enjoy a full kitchen, breakfast nook, and front patio overlooking the pacific ocean! 10 min walk to the beach!
properties.space: This ocean view cottage is clean, comfortable, and cozy for a group of friends, family or couples traveling together. Each bedroom has an electric fireplace and private bathroom. Enjoy the ocean breeze, crashing waves and seasonal whale watching from the patio! Cottage is located on a private, nature preserve owned by a non-profit land trust. 80% of proceeds go towards this non-profit land trust to preserve, protect and restore the natural habitat.

properties.neighborhood_overview: Nature lover's rejoice! We are located on a nature preserve in West Malibu near Zuma beach, several pocket beaches and down the road from Leo Carillo State Park and beach. You have a few polite and gracious neighbors that live on the property. Best of all, beach access is a short walk! ( less than .5 miles)

properties.transit: Car is a must. Bus stop is accessible 4.5 miles away, road cycling is very common on P.C.H. Best of all, you can walk to the beach.

properties.house_rules: Please note: no outside guests/visitors allowed at property.  Sorry, no pets from Air bnb guests are allowed at the nature preserve. Smoking is strictly prohibited on the property due to fire hazard. No loud music, no excessive drinking, no drugs, no swimming in the club house pool (there is no lifeguard on duty), No motorcycles. Hiking on property grounds is at your own risk. Thank you.  Please don't leave food out and watch for food spillls. It will attract ants. We also ask that you dump trash daily in the bin outside the unit. Thanks for your cooperation.  We appreciate you respecting your home away from home during your visit.
properties.host_about:
I'm a 33yr old professional that lives and works in Malibu. I spend most of my time outdoors: hiking, trail running, and doing yoga. I'm a Registered Dietitian by profession. Ask me about the best nearby dining, farmer's market, arts, culture, sightseeing in Malibu and beyond. 

As a host, we will get you settled in and stay out of your way during your stay. We are just a phone call away if you have a question or need our assistance.

You’ll love my place because of the location, the ambiance, the outdoors space, the zen, and the neighborhood. Pet friendly. Could sleep 4 if needed.

properties.name: Zuma Sanctuary Malibu
properties.summary: Our Remodeled 1974 Airstream Overlander sits looking over the Pacific Ocean in the front and a beautiful canyon in the back. Only a short walk to Malibu's best (and some secret) beaches and short drive to amazing parks for hiking and exploring.  Our property has 2 Aistreams and 2 Lotus Belle tents that can be rented separately or all together.  We have a BBQ deck for grilling, yoga deck, hammock zone, sunset chairs and hot outdoor shower.  Search Zuma Sanctuary to see all 4 listings.
properties.space: We invite you to stay in our 1974, charming and fully functioning Airstream Overlander ( 2 double sized beds, refrigerator, stove and bathroom/shower), located at the upper lot of our land.  Here you'll be fully surrounded by nature: the Pacific Ocean and Santa Monica Mountains.  You'll arrive to a decorated and equipped space to offer you an amazing time + kitchen utensils and our favorite organic Dr. Bronner's soaps.  You'll also enjoy watching Malibu's landmark sunset from our magical yoga deck located in front of your airstream, or from our easy accessed mountain deck. Plus, a lounge deck can be used as you wish: BBQ, relax or just enjoy some downtime under a beautiful ficus tree.

properties.neighborhood_overview: Our 16-acre Sanctuary offers privacy and proximity to the best beaches Malibu has to offer.
properties.notes: We will assess an EXTRA 50 cleaning fee if the trailer and space is not left clean (as it was found).
properties.transit: We are just a few miles from Zuma Beach where there is bus service from Santa Monica, but most of your time here you will be on foot exploring local beaches and mountains or going to close destinations by car. You call it!
properties.access: We will give you instructions on how to enter our gated property.
properties.house_rules: Our House Rules: - Please leave the trailer in the condition you found it- clean!  - No music or loud talking after 10pm we live in a quiet residential area and need to be respectful of our neighbors so we can continue to share the Sanctuary with guests -No extra guests without permission and payment; -No photo or video shoots without permission and applicable fees (contact us to discuss); -No smoking inside the trailer - Absolutely no fires  - No parties without our consent and applicable fees (contact us). - No shoes worn inside the trailer please; - No chemicals or objects beyond toilet paper are allowed flushed down the drain or toilet (We - and Malibu - run on a delicate septic system so please just TP down the toilette); - If you intend to go to the beach, please bring your own beach towels (or let us know if you need anything last minute). The ones we offer are not meant to be sandy.  We do offer rental beach chairs and towels for 25.  - Please wash off the sand before going in
properties.host_about: Jeremy is an entrepreneur and surfer; Luiza is a Brazilian journalist and together they are lovers of life, yoga, the environment, sustainability and adventure travels of all sorts.

properties.name: Hip and stylish Zuma beach
properties.summary: Hip and stylish California ranch located just a few minutes walk from Zuma beach and just across Point Dume and some of Malibu's quietest and most picturesque beaches and trails. 2-acre gated property with great panoramic canyon and Point Dume view

Beautiful lawn with soccer goal and basketball hoop make this property a kids dream. properties.name: Share our space
properties.summary: Our house is just a few mins walk to Zuma Beach, Starbucks,dining,stores and market.Hiking trails are everywhere.Based at the foot of the mountains, you are never far from a trail.You’ll love it here, at night you will here the waves crashing and as the sun sets, the sky will surprise you with a different colour every evening. Great for couples, solo adventurers, business travellers, and families (with kids) and anyone who loves to surf every day!

properties.house_rules: We expect the property to be treated carefully and with respect. This is our main home and there are personal items in view.  We expect our guests to respect the property appropriately. Smoking is not allowed.   We will inspect the house at the end of the lease period - it is expected that any damage will be reported by the guests immediately. No smoking No parties or events No pets Respectful behaviour Check-in after 3pm, very late check-ins can be accommodated. Check-out is by 10am on day of departure.
properties.host_about: We love exciting new adventures and always like to have our bag packed and at the ready.  We love the idea of sharing our space with fellow travelers when we are not here.  Take a look around our listing and if you have any questions we would be delighted to help you. It will be a home away from home for people!

properties.name: Charming Malibu Cottage: Perfect Beachtown Getaway
properties.summary: Our Malibu Park bungalow is 5 minutes from Zuma Beach and two blocks from a Santa Monica Mountains trailhead for expansive ocean view hiking: it is cozy and private, with a King size antique brass bed and a comfortable Queen sofa bed in the living area.  This small guest unit built in 1950 is lovingly appointed with everything you will need for your Malibu vacation: it is also a perfect workspace for creatives/writers, with an outdoor bar and a private sitting area for reading and relaxing!
properties.space: The cottage is equipped to make your stay in Malibu comfortable and fun.  See our listing, and send us a note if you need additional information. Malibu is especially beautiful in the late winter and early spring, known for its very low tides and spectacular sunsets.  The later Spring months are lovely, too.... less crowded on the beaches (especially Zuma Beach), but warmer weather.  Summer is the classic Malibu experience:sun, sand and endless fun boogie boarding, paddling and surfing.  Of course, the local kids are in the ocean 365 days a year, with or without wetsuits! We live in a fire zone, and safety is paramount for all: your space has a kitchenette, but not a full kitchen with an oven.  We do have a hotplate for you to use if you'd like, a microwave oven, a coffee maker, a 3/4 sized refrigerator, a kitchen sink and a fully equipped kitchenette with tableware, cups, mugs and service for 4.  We have a dining area and lots of take-out places really close by for hot food and such.
properties.description: Our Malibu Park bungalow is 5 minutes from Zuma Beach and two blocks from a Santa Monica Mountains trailhead for expansive ocean view hiking: it is cozy and private, with a King size antique brass bed and a comfortable Queen sofa bed in the living area. Malibu is especially beautiful in the late winter and early spring, known for its very low tides and spectacular sunsets.  The later Spring months are lovely, too.... less crowded on the beaches (especially Zuma Beach), but warmer weather.  Summer is the classic Malibu experience:sun, sand and endless fun boogie boarding, paddling and surfing.  Of course,
properties.neighborhood_overview: This is a quiet, rural neighborhood.  If you are looking for nightlife or parties, this isn't going to be a good fit for you.  Our skies are dark at night, and our neighbors tend to be environmentally minded, ocean lovers who deeply appreciate Malibu's pristine environment, especially at this end of town (see map, we are deep into Malibu, a mile from Zuma Beach).  :-)a
properties.notes: Remember you are in Malibu, so bring things to help you enjoy the beach and/or hiking.  Also, remember that you are in a rural neighborhood, so you'll need a car or experience ind using Uber to get around.... Malibu is many miles long and there are many cool neighborhoods, beaches and local spots that you may wish to see during your time here in Paradise!
properties.transit: No public transportation is available except one bus line that goes into and out of Santa Monica..... UBER works as it does in many more rural towns/environments.... and of course rental cars are recommended, as Malibu has much to see and do.  We have a dedicated parking spot for you, so you won't have to park on the street, but there is not a garage, so your car will be exposed to the elements!  Not a problem for us, but don't bring your pristine auto with a new paint job unless you don't mind a bit of dust, salty ocean air, leaves, and the occasional remnant left by low-flying sea gulls!
properties.access: You can access the entire guest cottage and its adjacent private patio, and we will respect your privacy always.  When you arrive, please park in your designated parking spot, which is located immediately adjacent to the address posted for the house: 5765 Busch Drive.   We will meet you outside where the parking spot is located and walk you in if you give us a "heads up" when you are a few minutes out!   If you arrive late or need to get in and we have not greeted you yet, here are the instructions for getting in: There is a walkthrough gate right there next to the brass bell, and you can enter the property there.  Walk through the gate toward the BACK of the property: there are two bungalows to your RIGHT.  Your bungalow is the one all the way to the back, on the right, with the RED DOOR.  Enter via the gate that has a sign on it that says: MERMAIDS WELCOME. And YOU are welcome, too! Jennie and Carol
properties.interaction: We can meet you upon arrival and answer your questions: there is always someone on the property that can answer your questions throughout your stay, but we will make ourselves scarce with respect to your privacy.
properties.house_rules: This is a private guest house located on a classic "Old Malibu" property, built in 1950 and occupied now by our family: we love to share our space with guests, and we offer complete privacy and a space for you to rest and relax.  There is always someone home to assist you with arrival and departure, and to answer any questions you might have about how to spend your leisure time in our beautiful neighborhood that includes close-by Zuma Beach and the Santa Monica Mountains trailhead for spectacular ocean view hiking.  We appreciate our guests respecting the quiet of our neighborhood, the dark night skies, and the pristine beaches of Lechusa and Broad Beach, easily accessible and  five minute drive from our home.
properties.host_about: I am a mother, a mediator and a Malibu resident.  I do yoga and walk on the beach daily, eat healthy foods, and love my "Old Malibu" home.  Built in 1950, our home was the first built in our Malibu Park neighborhood: we are only the second lucky owners of this classic Malibu ranch home.  Our guest home is also circa 1950, and we love to share it with travelers who appreciate a more rustic (yet very charming) space.... take a look at the pictures, which will give you a feel for our home and property!  The beach is five minutes away, and we have an ocean view from the front of our property (though not from the guest house).  You'll enjoy privacy in a cozy space with loving touches to make your stay comfortable and enjoyable!

properties.name: Enchanting Malibu Getaway
properties.summary: Ethereal vacation home located in the most prestigious Malibu community, Point Dume. This home is within walking distance of restaurants and stores. With this home comes a key to the exclusive private beach, known for its world class surfing, robust marine wildlife and, countless A-List celebrities looking to relax far from the crowds.
properties.space: Charming two story Mediterranian home with a lot of indoor and outdoor space. Located on the prestigious Point Dume and is within distance of many beaches and beautiful hiking trails. This home is one of select properties on the point with a key to Point Dume's exclusive private beach. Comes with a fully equipped kitchen. The property is enclosed and withdrawn from the street, only accessible through the private gate. All the bedrooms and living room come equipped with High Definition Televisions and Amazon Firesticks programmed to give access to a vast catalogue of shows or movies.

properties.neighborhood_overview: Peaceful, quiet neighborhood. A very short Walk to the local shopping center which includes a grocery store, banks and a few restaurants.
properties.notes: Commonly visible from the private beach are Humpback whales, Orcas, Sea lions and varied species of dolphin. World Class scuba diving. The house is within a short walk or dive from many private and public beaches. Walk down from the Private Beach to Paradise Cove restaurant. Up to 380 different bird species can be seen throughout the surrounding areas. The Santa Monica Mountains and its 500+ miles of public hiking trails are within a short driving distance. Spend the day in the nearby Channel Island National Park. Being that Malibu is in such a peaceful and secluded area, for your added security, cameras are located at the entrances of the home.
properties.transit: Car and on foot.
properties.access: The whole house inside and out, except the garage and downstairs closet. The guest will also have access to the key for the private beach.
properties.interaction: When needed
properties.house_rules: If you want to throw any parties, events or get togethers of 10 or more people, it must be cleared with us first.  Only declared guests may stay the night. If it is discovered that you have or are throwing an event or party without permission, you will asked to leave and no refund will be issued.  Please be mindful not to leave the toilets running. The House runs on a septic tank and will overflow if left running. There will be a 500 fee assessed for losing the key for the private beach. Please do not bring our bathroom towels to the beach. Bring our beach towels to the beach.  Do not bring any inside pillows outside and vice verse. Do not bring any indoor rugs or carpets outside and vice versa. Do not bring indoor furniture outside and vice versa. Being that Malibu is in such a peaceful and secluded area, for your added security, cameras are located at the entrances of the home.

properties.name: Charming Cottage in Point Dume
properties.summary: After an break in renting we are back.  Charming cottage in this idyllic and exclusive Point Dume neighborhood of Malibu. Located on Wildlife Rd., just minutes away from Zuma and Westward beaches, the stand alone cottage boasts a flat acre with a Big Sur ambiance.
properties.space: Come and enjoy our charming stand-alone cottage in this idyllic and exclusive Point Dume neighborhood of Malibu. Located on Wildlife Rd., just minutes away from Zuma and Westward beaches, the cottage boasts a flat acre with a Big Sur ambiance.  Stroll the winding garden paths with fountains, vegetable gardens, 50 foot Eucalyptis trees.   The cottage has an immaculate, bright, open floor plan. This newly renovated home fuses the best of indoor and outdoor style living. The open floor boasts a gourmet Italian range,  and a great room with flat screen TV, 2 bedrooms;  a queen bed and one twin bed. The Master Bedroom has a California King.  It is perfect for entertaining, with patio, fire pit, fountains, decks, courtyard and lawns. A real indoor/outdoor flow throughout. Also great for kids of all ages.     Enjoy the fresh seafood at one of Malibu's many restaurants from the beach fare of Malibu Seafood, Paradise Cove and Neptune's Net to more elegant spots such as the Sunset or Geoffrey's.

properties.neighborhood_overview: Point Dume has many delights to the senses!  Hike Point Dume National Preserve to watch whales with 360 degree ocean views.  Stroll the neighborhood and smell the ocean, Eucalyptus, lavender and other florals abounding.  The wildlife is always entertaining; bunnies hopping all about; parrots screeching above, hummingbirds everywhere, chickens, roosters, ponies, horses, sheep; many animal lovers around here!
properties.access: Complete stand alone cottage, park-like grounds with hammocks, organic garden, rose garden.
properties.interaction: As much or as little as would like!
properties.house_rules: Malibu is very quiet after 10:00 pm
properties.host_about:
Born and raised in Southern California, recently relocating to Malibu back in 2008.  My husband, Scott, and I share our five children and two grandsons we adore!
Scott is in the film location business and Diana owns a court reporting agency.  Our dog Hank shares our home with us!  A friendly poodle!

properties.name: Luxury 2 Bedroom Ten mins to beach
properties.summary: A relaxing drive from the Coast takes you to this home high in the  mountains with a heart-stopping view. From almost everywhere on the property you can see the Pacific Ocean & Mountains. We are very close to Pepperdine University one canyon over. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, and families (with kids). This apart is a little Spanish gem tucked against a backdrop of mountain and ocean views and completely and totally private. At night you can see the stars
properties.space: This apartment is a Spanish gem tucked against a backdrop of mountain views.  This one of a kind property is located in a  lavishly built Spanish gated estate on 250 acres of manicured grounds boasting the finest hand carved Mexican Paver stones. From almost everywhere on the property you can look down the canyon past waves of chaparral-cloaked hills all the way to the Pacific ocean. The quiet and privacy here are absolute. The Casa is an Estancia -Style structure with earth-toned stucco walls, a genuine Mexican tile roof and a wide lawn sweeping out in front. Immerse yourself in the Iconic Malibu in this state of the art guesthouse on a private Estate. This rural-residential property of 250 acres is just 12 minutes away from the Malibu center with it's restaurants, beaches, horse-back trails, hiking trails, boutiques, art galleries, Pepperdine University and loads of fabulous world class restaurants and wine tasting rooms. Your own private entrance and parking.  Cocoon in the master b

properties.neighborhood_overview: This is one of the most beautiful places on earth. We live on 250 acres of open space and hiking trials. We are in the most beautiful hiking and biking areas in the world and only 9  minutes away from the beach. We are 15 minutes from Pepperdine and most restaurants and shops.
properties.notes: We live in the top floor of the house. Although we try to be as quiet as possible, sometimes you can hear us walking around or a dog barking when someone comes to the gates or if there is a critter in the area. If this is a problem for you, this property may not be a good fit.
properties.transit: You definitely need a car to get around in Malibu. This would not be a good fit for anyone relying on public transportation. We do have Uber come to the house and a bus system that runs about 3.6 miles from the house. Uber is suggested if you plan on enjoying a few cocktails out at a restaurant.
properties.access: You will have your own gate to enter from. We provide you with a clicker. Then you have a sliding Custom Pella Door with a screen to enjoy the breezes. We can provide a landline if you need one.  We have a net gear wifi extender but we do live in the mountains so sometimes signals and service are spotty. If you need to be connected 100% of the time this might not be a good fit but in general we have had no complaints.
properties.interaction: We cater to our guests needs! Let us know if you want total privacy or if you'd like to interact with hosts or dogs. We are always open to making your stay perfect.
properties.house_rules: I am delighted you have chosen to visit, whether it's business or vacation, I want you to enjoy your visit and the beautiful 250 acre property.  I have a few requests and a few suggestions to make your stay the best it can possibly be.  First and very important is check in. Once I send you the directions please actually read them before you get into your car because the Corral Canyon part of your drive does not work too well with GPS or WAZE. And I promise you will get lost.  Another consideration is that once we agree on an arrival window of time to please honor that as this is not the kind of Estate where we can leave out a key in a lockbox.  We need to check you in personally, so if we agree you're arriving between 4 and 5 pm can you please do that unless you've hit murderous traffic or your airline was delayed which we totally understand. We do make special arrangements to greet you so please respect that we have other things to attend to and our staff have to go home after a hard
properties.host_about: I am a chef, author, restaurateur and philanthropist, and I arrived in Los Angeles from Northern Ireland in 1975, to begin my career in the culinary industry.  My  culinary expertise encompasses an international diversity including Indian, Chinese, Mexican, Japanese, French and, of course, Contemporary California and Irish. I have been featured in the L.A. Times, Fine Cooking Magazine, and Bon Appetit Magazine named (URL HIDDEN) of the top six chefs in the United States”. Today, I own two  distinctively different restaurants on Main Street in Santa Monica,California: Lula Cocina Mexicana, a bold, bright and colorful cantina famous for its murals painted by artist Eloy Torrez, and Signature Lula Margaritas;and Finn McCool's Irish Pub, boasting a beautiful bar shipped painstakingly over from Ireland through the Panama (URL HIDDEN) 1995, I  built my dream home, Rancho Chiquita, nestled high in the Malibu Mountains.  Rancho Chiquita overlooks a spectacular panoramic ocean view and 250 acres of rolling hills, and is host to many Charity Fundraising Events, Weddings , Private Cooking Classes , and Film and Movie Shoots. I am an avid advocate on behalf of the protection and rehabilitation of animals, and I share my home with a multitude of Rescue Dogs.

properties.neighborhood_overview: Families, safe and quiet.  Mostly gated homes in area. Almost everyone greets you with a smile and hello, so relax and give them a big smile back and enjoy.
properties.notes: Enjoy the dolphins almost daily, whales in season, winter and beautiful sunsets.  Bring a camera!
properties.transit: There is a bus about one mile away, or you can call a taxi.  You really need a car in Malibu.
properties.access: The entire outdoors of gardens with an ocean view on a full acre.  The upper  grassed sweetheart garden has a tent for you to relax in if you want to sit under for more shade, also you have your own umbrella.  There are two washers, 2 dryers in our basement. Ocean front Grassy lawn and patio, only for your accommodations. Swimming pool that is not heated but warms in August.
properties.interaction: Depends on the guests, many come up and we have a fun visit and tour, others are quiet and I respect their privacy. I am older and stay inside most of the time on my computer or busy with many things, but I am here in case anyone needs anything.  I love people and children.   I just want everyone to really relax and enjoy the dolphins, whales, seals and beautiful sunsets.  We have an Aussie that is 2 years old and very friendly.  She will be inside or on a leash, unless you want to play ball with her. She loves everyone.

Please take your trash out daily to avoid rodents or ants.  Do NOT  leave trash bags outside your door as Racoons could tear up your trash and spread it
properties.host_about: Love living in such a beautiful place that keeps me so happy and grateful to have been here for over 26 years. It is great to share it all with others. I am a senior that loves life and meeting new people from all over the world.  Cannot live without watching the whales in season and dolphins almost daily and the most beautiful sunsets.

properties.host_about: We are a designer and a producer couple with young children and two cheeky dogs. When we travel we love to stay in homes, rather than hotels. Nothing beats being able to cook a meal and do your laundry when you are away from home. We look forward to your stay with us.

properties.summary: Set right in the heart of Malibu, this remodeled 3-bed 3-bath vacation rental has a large deck with patio furniture, high-end finishes throughout and access to the heated community pool.

Its unbeatable location is just a stone’s throw from top-notch beaches, Pepperdine University, the famous Malibu Country Mart shopping center, world-class restaurants including Nobu, Mr. Chow, Duke’s and Geoffrey’s Malibu. Conveniences such as Ralph’s supermarket, CVS pharmacy, and the Malibu Racquet Club are also less than a mile away.  The home has been fully renovated with bright modern furnishings, custom beach-grey stained wooden floors, and provided with every amenity guests could want like a fully-equipped kitchen, a mounted 55” 4K Smart TV in the living room and a second 40” Smart TV in the master bedroom, 125+ channels, Bluetooth Bose speaker, and beach towels and chairs. properties.neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood is called Sunset Mesa and is right at the very start of Malibu. This offers east access to Santa Monica [ about 10 to 30 minutes - depending on traffic!] and about 10 minutes to Malibu Pier and the Malibu Shopping are. This area is a real gem and relatively undiscovered. Practically a gated community with one road in and out with access to the PCH [ Pacific Coast Highway]. Wide streets for easy parking, no unsightly over head wires, great views to the ocean. Very safe for walking day and night and great for young kids. We love the fact that we can walk down the street to the beach in front of the Getty Villa.  We have access cards for the Getty - free entry and you don't have to book ! The Santa Monica mountains abut the back of this small neighborhood and are hikes into the Santa Monica Mountains and Malibu State Park. This is a very tranquil and relaxing neighborhood.  Full high-end sports club/gym located a few blocks away and guests may have access to free guest pa
properties.notes: Three fabulous surf breaks are very close by. If you want to try surfing, we can give you all the info regarding hiring boards and wet suits. There is no kitchen, however, we have a small microwave and also a mini fridge. No TV either.
properties.transit: Generally in Los Angeles, it is best to have a car, but there is a regular bus service just down the street on the PCH at the Getty. The bus goes to Malibu in one direction and the Santa Monica and further. From Venice Blvd, there is a train that goes all the way to downtown and stops at some of the top museums and the exhibit for the Space Shuttle.  We are about 35 minutes from the airport. Directions are 405 North, 10 West onto the Pacific Coast Highway [ PCH]. Then you. travel along the beach all the way past Sunset Blvd. 2nd light after Sunset, right on Coastline, then right on Castlerock Rd. 2nd block, 3rd house on the right. White house with black Mansard roof #3826.

Close to horseback riding, the famous backbone trail, hiking & biking, Malibu wine safari, Saddle Rock Garden Dinners, Malibu wines & tasting. Short drive to beaches and Malibu restaurants. A beautiful drive to Pepperdine University activities, Malibu Pier and famous Surfrider beach.

You are welcome to take a walk around the property and use the hammock & sitting areas under the trees. There is a private sitting area beside the pond outside your front door, that is just for our suite guests. Perfect spot for a morning coffee or an evening drink. Book a facial or massage and soak in the peace and

properties.neighborhood_overview: Our home "Sequit Falls Ranch" is located within the Santa Monica mountains national recreation area (SMMNRA). There are many beautiful hiking/biking trails including the world famous Backbone Trail, we are a convenient overnight stop. We are located in the midst of the training routes for international cyclists, including training for the tour de France and other major cycling events.  (URL HIDDEN)   We are also close to "Malibu's Wines" vineyards, tasting location and Wine Safari. Malibu has some great restaurants and shops and of course world famous beaches, a beautiful 6 mile canyon drive to Leo Carillo beach and state park and Pacific Coast Highway. We are approx. 1 hour from Universal studios, Venice Beach and Santa Barbara and approx. 1 1/2 hours from Disneyland and Knotts Berry farm.  We are approx. 21/2  hours from San Diego and Sea World. Los Angeles international airport is approx. 1 hr 15 min, with a lovely drive along Pacific Coast Highway.
properties.notes: Our property is also an ideal venue for outdoor weddings or other events.  and we have on site parking to accommodate 200 plus people. Please contact us at Sequit Falls Ranch Locations for pricing and more information. We are listed with several movie location companies and have occasional TV, Movie and commercial shoots here.
properties.transit: We are in a rural area and there is no public transportation, however you can get Uber for your convenience. Guest often use it to go wine tasting, out to dinner or down to the beach to watch the sunset. Of course there's plenty of walking, hiking and cycling areas too. Note: There is no restaurant delivery service in this area of the canyons.
properties.access: Enjoy a walk around the property and a meditative stroll through the peace path, ending under the 300 year old oak, for peaceful meditation. Take a 2 min walk down the street to our neighbor, Arroyo Sequit State Park, for hiking & nature walks. Hike or bike on one of the many trailheads that start near by in the Santa Monica mountains, or go horseback riding at one of  Malibu's horse riding facilities.  We are six miles up from Leo Carrillo beach and state park on Pacific Coast Highway in Malibu and approx. 8 miles to the 101  freeway, which is a gateway to many local Southern California sites. For an additional price you can book massage and/or a facial, by Ali who is a licensed esthetician and massage therapist, at our cottage day spa, right here on the property.  We have a special for our airbnb guests of 75 for either our deluxe 1 hour massage that incorporates Swedish, acupressure and some deep tissue, tailored to your specific needs, or our 1 hour European facial. Before your tr
properties.interaction: We live and work here on our property, so will often be around if you need anything, or questions answered.
properties.house_rules: This is our home, so please show respect, no smoking, or loud music. Although we love animals, sorry absolutely no pets allowed. Read house rules before arrival. The room includes a queen sized bed and a pull out king, free wi-fi & free satellite TV. You have your own coffee maker, small refrigerator, microwave and electric kettle. You are up in the mountains and the nearest grocery store is 15 minutes away, so bring whatever food/snacks you may want with you. If the reservation is for two people, but you require the second bed (pull out couch) you need to request that at time of booking. Note* there is a extra charge for 3 & 4 person Smoking allowed in designated areas outside ONLY, use ashtrays. Please No butts on the ground. Santa Monica mountains are designated as a high fire hazard area.  Absolutely NO smoking indoors. Please keep food sealed or in the refrigerator, as ants love to share our space. We do not use chemical or toxic pesticides or herbicides.  We are on well water and
properties.host_about:
Hi Everyone, Thank you for checking out our airbnb. 
We live and work right here on our 10 acre Sequit Falls Ranch. Gary designed and built our home and developed our property. He also handcrafts functional wood art in his 2,000 square foot shop.  I handcraft all natural vegan skincare products in the soap kitchen Gary built for me. Our company is called Soap the Earth. Our motto is "Happy Skin, Happy Animals and a Happy Planet" 
I'm also a licensed esthetician and massage therapist. We have our small cottage spa, right here, where you can book treatments. 
We love what we do and feel so lucky we get to spend the time together in these beautiful surroundings.
After many years of health issues, we cleaned up our act and got rid of all household chemicals and became vegan, Gary's lagging behind a little bit in the vegan category :) 
It's also what prompted me to create all natural skincare products.
In todays hectic way of life, we firmly believe all of us need moments of quiet solitude in natures beauty to reboot and reconnect with nature 
Our mission is to have you leave refreshed and replenished.

HI! We love traveling, meeting new and interesting people and cultures.Good food and great red wine.
I work as a documentary photographer my passion is social issues, climate change . Bruce is in the music business. 
We like quit beautiful places, where you can breath fresh air but also being in the middle of everything.
Our favorite destinations- Cambodia- India- Kauai- Californian-Spain.
We like getting away from the crowds, staying in place that's peaceful and friendly, close to  when possible good food and coffee :)    
Our home is super relaxing and cozy, somewhere to return to recharge the batteries, go for swim one the beaches 5 mins away or hike in the mountains, and fall asleep hearing the waves crashing.

properties.neighborhood_overview: Malibu West is the real, authentic Malibu populated by the surfers, ranchers, and artists that together create a unique environment.  While neighbors are hardly visible here in our canyon, a great way to enjoy the architecture of the area is to stroll along the shore of Broad Beach where many Malibu celebrities live.
properties.notes: It is very important to PRINT OUT and BRING the Directions/Home Manual etc. with you so you know where we are, where to park, the gate code, the dog policy, etc.
properties.transit: Having a car is best, but if you don't we can pick you up at the bus stop at Trancas down the road.
properties.access: Guests have access to the pool and pool patio in addition to their own private terrace.    The pool area is technically a bonus area and not officially part of the Airbnb reservation, however, feel free to utilize the area along with other guests. Guests also have access to hiking trails right outside the door as 180 degrees of the property is bordered by Santa Monica Mountains Parks.  Malibu's best surf beaches and most secluded beautiful beaches are just 2 miles down the road and in the other direction are wine-tasting sites in the midst of Malibu's vineyards.  And, don't forget to star-gaze here in one of LA's only Dark-Sky preserves.  Finally, guests have access to Malibu's most affordable, quality dining option - our own farm-to-table, all organic home-cooked breakfast or dinners.
properties.interaction: We're happy to interact with guests as much or as little as they want.  Honey-mooners, for example, are given total privacy.  Other guests who want to mingle will enjoy hearing stories of our travels and behind-the-scenes working on Hollywood Studios as well as great tips for how to enjoy Malibu.  The best way to do this is to indulge in one of our very affordable farm-to-table, all-organic home-cooked breakfasts or dinners because this is when we have time to relax and chat. Please make sure to order meals in advance.  See Menu below: Malibu Orchard Menu – ALL ORGANIC! Farm-to-Table; Pasture-to-Plate Feast on a meal that is 100% organic and cooked from scratch just for you! AT A GLANCE: Breakfast: 20 pp plus gratuity includes Breakfast Plate, Toast, Home-Made Jams, Fruit, Coffee or Tea.  All organic and cooked just for you!  Dinner:  39 pp plus gratuity is a 3-course menu that includes a Main Course with Seasonal Veggies, a Garden-Fresh Salad and a Home-Made Dessert.  BYOB – no cork
properties.house_rules: Please respect our rule of NO PETS.  NO babies or children. Smoking in designated areas only. No food in the room - eat on your private patio or the pool patio where you can use the pool kitchen, fridge, microwave and BBQ. ORGANIC home-cooked are available. Please reserve in advance. Please leave the room tidy the way you found it when you arrived. Most importantly, try to allow time to just relax and soak up the beauty of our canyon.  Feel the sunshine, lounge by the pool, listen to the birdsong... and enjoy the peace and tranquility!
properties.host_about: WE EMBRACE DIVERSITY!  I'm an author/photographer by profession, but a traveler by vocation ... that's why I'm running an AirBnB... because even when I'm not traveling, I'm always on a journey!  I love learning languages and speak Spanish, Portuguese and French with a smattering of Japanese and Arabic.  Bruce is a Director of Photography specializing in 3D films.  But, we both share a passion for organic gardening.  Besides our orchard of 100 Meyer Lemons, we grow organic vegetables and herbs.  We both love sharing recipes and conversation with friends, new and old, from around the world ... as well as favorite travel tales, books, and music.

properties.summary: Our spacious one bedroom guest house overlooks the Santa Monica Mountains and sits on a charming creek. It sleeps two very comfortably.  It is a smoke free environment. The house is located just 10 minutes from Malibu beaches, and shops.

properties.neighborhood_overview: Our neighborhood, has easy access to hiking, biking, beaches and great restaurants . The neighborhood has an abundance of wildlife and horses. Great views of the mountains.  We live next door and are available to answer any of your questions . Our guest house and main house are great to rent for family reunions, weddings, and any other event .
properties.notes: Our guest house is great if you love the outdoors or you want some city life. Cycling is a huge draw to this area and many pro european  teams have come here to train before the season starts It only accommodate 4 comfortably and its 25 dollars for a 5th person a night. There is only room for two cars to be parked on the site.
properties.transit: There are buses in Malibu that run to Santa Monica. We are close to the 101 Freeway and the Pacific Coast Highway. Having a car is convenient.
properties.access: Guest will have access to beach chairs, umbrellas and boogie boards. We have games and plenty of books. The kitchen is fully stocked with cooking appliances. There is a grill and outdoor table for dining.
properties.interaction: We are available for questions and any  problems. We like to make our guests feel at home, so we welcome any suggestions.  We have two little friendly dogs named Oliver and Charlie, but both are non-allergenic dogs.
properties.house_rules: At our home we do our best to be Eco-Friendly. Please no smoking on our property. Keep it clean. Turn off air, heat and lights when leaving.  Do not flush anything down the toilet, except for toilet paper. Please re-use your towels if possible. Please be respectful if you have pets, and clean up after them. No dogs on furniture . No eating in bed. Please turn off air , heat and lights when going out for the day or going to bed.  Empty trash before you leave on side .  We just ask you treat our guest house with respect  and take care of it . We take pride in our place and want others to enjoy it just like you will.This is a smoke free property.
properties.host_about: We live life to the fullest, we enjoy eating healthly and being outdoors. We love travel and meeting new people.  Some of our favorite travel places are  Europe, Mexico and South America. We truly love culture, good food and great conversation. We live in a beautiful area and look forward to sharing it with you.  We are at the foot of the mountains for cycling and hiking.

properties.name: Malibu Carbon Canyon Haven
properties.summary: Welcome to the best Canyon in Malibu. We are dedicated to making your stay comfortable and hassle-free.  Behind gates, with a full-on ocean-view, we are less than two minutes from the best public beach access in East Malibu. Our neighborhood has great hiking, fabulous sunrises and sunsets, Nobu, and other fine restaurants a few minutes away.   Easy access to  Santa Monica (18 minutes), Cross Creek shopping/Pepperdine (5 minutes), or Point Dume (15 minutes), yet rural in character.
properties.space: With its own private entrance, your suite has a kitchen, breakfast area, and sitting space.  Sleep on the queen size memory foam mattress and if you have additional guests, you'll use the super comfortable pull out couch with a queen air mattress.   The space can easily accommodate a family of three or four.  The adjacent private, full bathroom and office area allows enough space to move around, work, or relax. It has a couch (children sleep on it), desk, and patio area.

Hike up Carbon Canyon on unimproved road to dirt trail leaving civilization behind.  Many nearby hikes for which we provide a suggested list. properties.notes: We can provide eggs on request as we have a chicken coop and chickens who often lay fresh eggs, (and two loving dogs who don't).

Ask us!
properties.access: Entire backyard with Hot Tub,  surrounded by citrus orchard, backyard deck, yoga mat,  work out and meditation areas.  Walk or ride to the beach.  We have many of the most recent/current films for you to watch as well.
properties.interaction: Always available to assist in making your time here memorable. properties.name: Malibu Ocean View Rustic 1BD + 1BA
properties.space: This is a newly re-modeled 1 bedroom + 1 bath Ocean View Mid-Century Modern Apartment located in a rustic canyon setting in Malibu, CA. The apartment is zero carbon and solar powered w. a flat screen TV, blu-ray dvd, & wi-fi internet.   It has a fully stocked state of the art kitchen w. new energy star appliances and granite counters. The unique redwood block floor was created from recycled wood. The apartment is fully furnished with a double bed and a double sofa-bed. The bathroom is equipped with kohler low flow fixtures and a glass tile shower with a skylight. The towels and linens are 100% egyptian cotton. There is plenty of off street parking and a washer and dryer. The apartment is 600 square feet which is perfect for one or two people.    This light, bright apartment is nestled in a box canyon overlooking the ocean near downtown Malibu.  It backs up onto a nature preserve. So it is rustic and peaceful with lots of birds, hawks, parrots, deer, coyotes, bobcats, and goats.  It is

properties.name: Peaceful enclave in great location!
properties.summary: Our peaceful neighborhood offers awesome ocean vistas and is in great location between world famous Paradise Cove, home of "Baywatch" and gorgeous Zuma Beach. The listing will show as being the Paradise Cove restaurant and beach club. That is a point of reference. Our home is across the street (address not listed for privacy, ours and yours). You can walk to shopping and restaurants and beaches while enjoying being enough off the beaten path to relax at will.
properties.space: Our home not only has shared tennis courts, pool,Jacuzzi and gym, you can also enjoy the latest features in our private theater, often times showing movies still in theaters! This is in a beautiful garden setting on an ocean view property. This is a very quiet, calm and meditative place, though within easy walking distance to where the action is. 2 night limit weekends, short term welcome during the week.

Pool, gym, tennis court, theater, fabulous patio and garden, on site parking, luxury linens, California King, private entrance,
properties.neighborhood_overview: This neighborhood has everything. The hottest stars live within walking distance and shop at these stores, the best beaches are here and the air is simply better. The water is cleaner up this way too!  A local favorite, Duck and Dive is wonderful for high quality burgers etc and local flare music! Be sure to say "Hi" to the cutie Ryan there!  The Grassy Knoll up by Vintage Market, which has fresh scooped Beachy Creme Ice Cream and is where the Malibu bus ends, is a favorite for local celebrities to try out their acts and has played host to many recently!  Casa Escobar, down by the Malibu pier,  is the stop for yummy TexMex and some higher end acts. Lucas Nelson was just there. They have fabulous egg dishes too! My favorite is a romantic spot looking over the ocean, Geoffrey's.  Plan to be there just before sunset so you can see the dolphins who are always swimming by!! Ask for a table along the rail so you have the best ocean views!! This is one of the most romantic spots in the world!
properties.notes: I have highlighted some of the nearby attractions and local points you can review if you like. You will also find the printed guide for you in your room.  I am also happy to tell you about any other interest in the area.  The bed is a brand new California King Sterns and Foster plush Euro pillow top. Because we have a lot of options for fresh, high quality linens from Egyptian cotton satin to flannel, we invite you to tell us what you want and let us have it ready, just the way you like. At this point, everything in the room is brand new or a freshly re-finished antique.
properties.transit: The bus stops right out front, and there is plenty close enough to walk to! If you choose to drive, parking is generally abundant and free in Malibu!
properties.access: Pool, gym, tennis court, theater, fabulous patio and garden, on site parking, luxury linens, California King, private entrance, on suite bathroom, smart tv and free wi-fi. Kitchen can be shared with some ground rules, if agreed upon in advance.
properties.interaction: Although often available  on-site, the place is large enough and spread so that our paths may not ever cross. If I am here, I can make you a smoothie in the morning or you can make it yourself with fresh fruit, frozen fruit and supplements that will give you every nutrient your body needs. It's a great way to kick off  a day in paradise! If you would like to host a dinner party, as long as you clean everything up and replace anything broken or missing, be my guest. The place is very well suited for it either in the fabulous dining room or on the lush garden patio. Emphasis on clean up after yourself and don't break anything or replace it if you do. This does need to be agreed to in advance.
properties.house_rules: No smoking. Be respectful of the peacefulness of the neighborhood, and this home, you have chosen to visit. This is a fun area, it is also a spiritual place. Once you have your keys and gate clicker, your suite is all yours. No one will enter unless you ask one of us to, unless we have to turn off water or lights left on, or if someone leaves and has forgotten to lock the private entrance and I am leaving. Also, we need a heads up as to your arrival time at least 48 hours in advance, if you will not be arriving at the stated 3 PM check in time, because we want to make sure to be respectful of your schedule and be available at the time needed. Failure to set up a time to get checked in with us in advance may result in your not having access at the time you want because we can't accommodate you if we don't know what you need.
properties.host_about: Hi and welcome to Malibu!! We love Malibu and feel very blessed to get to be here. That is part of why we wanted to have this fabulous guestroom to share with family, friends and new friends! We travel a lot and love to entertain. We are executives with a prominent online social media source for the arts, music, movies and fine art. I am here if needed and mostly we want to be sure you enjoy our home and all Malibu has to offer. Thank you for considering our home for your vacation.

properties.host_about:
We are longtime Malibu mountain dwellers.  We raised our family here and  are happy to welcome visitors into our Malibu mountain retreat where we enjoy hiking the 70 miles of the Santa Monica Malibu Backbone Trail, our wild mustang horses, jogging at sunset on beautiful Leo Carrillo beach and countless outdoor activities in Malibu.  
Guests will enjoy our home's wonderful peace and quiet as well as comfortable accommodations in our architecturally unique space.

properties.notes: Our home is located in the unincorporated area of Los Angeles County. SHORT TERM RENTALS (less than 30 days): Los Angeles County imposes a 12% Transient Occupancy Tax ("TOT") for stays under 31 days. This amount will be added to the basic rental fee if you are a short term guest. If we rent to you for more than 30 days, we do not need to collect the TOT from you. If we do agree to do a short term rental,  I will send a request for payment of the taxes at the end of your stay and you can pay through Airbnb. I will in turn pay the TOT to Los Angeles County. Our Los Angeles County Transient Occupancy Registration number is 000573. REGARDING MY REFUND POLICIES. Although I have chosen the Strict Policy for Rental Terms, please be advised that I will work with you to refund the rental fees to the maximum extent possible so long as I can book another guest. I will always seek to mitigate your and my loss. I think it only fair to work with guests in this manner and I know Airbnb will help us a
properties.transit: One last thing: You will need to rent a car. Public transportation is not a realistic option. Lyft and Uber are known to have drivers in the area but the wait time may be long depending upon the time of day.
properties.interaction: Always feel free to email/text/call me for help.  If you need help with the Nest 2nd generation thermostat or the TV/Roku, let me know.  I can access the Nest remotely to help you. So, please leave it connected to the WiFi. There are many online resources for the Nest. - It is easy to use. Always call me first but in an emergency, Nest has 24/7 support.
properties.house_rules: Los Angeles Transient Occupancy Tax (12% of rental rate) must be paid no later than 3 days following your departure.  The TOT applies to rentals that are less than 31 days. I will send a separate Airbnb resolution request to collect the tax. MALIBU RENTALS: Remember both fire safety and the fact that most homes are on septic tanks. (Nothing goes down the toilet other than toilet paper in reasonable qualities. No toxic chemicals. No dental floss! No tampons!) If you move any furniture around, it must be put back to where it was when you arrived. That includes use of anything that you find in the garage such as the child's table or Herman Miller gray table.  You are in a rural area so you may encounter insects, animals and reptiles.  During certain seasons, these are more prevalent than others. For examples, ants have been known to come inside when it is hot and/or dry outside.  (It is a good practice NOT to leave food out on the countertops.) Subterranean termites come out of hiding onc
properties.host_about:
About Stylish Nob Hill Court: Our family has owned this condo since the 80s. We recently did a complete renovation and the space is warm and inviting - not to mention stylish. This is not a generic place - we used our personal collection of MCM furniture and added many unique touches. Since we love to cook, the kitchen is fully equiped.

About Villa Seabreeze: We live next door to this house and purchased it to preserve our view from above. Next thing I knew, I fell in love with fixing up this house. So, now it is very cozy and clean.

I work primarily as an attorney in digital technology area in the San Francisco Bay Area and come back home to Malibu on as many weekends as possible. My husband's boutique land use and environmental law firm is in Santa Monica. The fruit of his labor is evident when you drive up our canyon and see all the parkland. His litigation led to the preservation of this special place. (Angel Law)

More re: languages - My husband also speaks German, Luxembourgish, French and Spanish.

properties.name: The Outpost Malibu Beach House
properties.summary: The Outpost Malibu's Beach House is a one-of-a-kind Polynesian house designed by famed architect Harry Gesner, full with lush breezeways and wraparound decks. It sits on a 1.5+ acre Encinal Bluff estate, where the main upper residence is occupied by the property owners. The beach house has its own pool, spa, and meditation temple. The beach itself is one of the most exclusive and private coves on the west coast and is perfect for swimming, surfing, kayaking, or lounging on the sand.
properties.space: Guests will access the Beach House through the gated front driveway, park at the upper residence and use the funicular tram to the Beach House.

properties.name: Writer's Ocean-View Malibu Haven
properties.summary: In this beautiful, quiet neighborhood on a gentle hillside over-looking the Pt. Dume, Zuma and Broadbeach areas, this old Malibu property feels expansive, peaceful and low-key.  A few minutes to the beach by car and ideal for hiking, unique beaches.
properties.space: Beauty and a sense of expansion create a gracious 'home away from home' feeling on this garden and tree-filled hillside  overlooking Zuma Beach (about a mile as the crow flies).  Private and quiet, both elegant and rustic, it's a nourishing place for a creative heart.   Beautiful pool and jacuzzi, as well the king-size bed, internet TV, wireless WiFi and phone.  Fruited garden and a wide sky for easy musing, breathing deeply and communing with nature, a pool/jacuzzi, great bath with skylight, kitchen, W/D, parking, Sautillo tile floors and a hard-to-leave deck over-looking Spanish style rooftops and the wild Malibu countryside in a gentle slope down over hills to white water waves. Hear the waves at night under the stars, perhaps a coyote or a seal far off-shore. See also our two other listings on this property: "Beautiful Poolside Cottage Near Zum" and "Artist's Ocean-View Garden Secret" each able to accommodate two guests. Half an hour from Santa Monica-10 Freeway and 20 minutes from

This whole area has the Southern Californian mountain/ocean country feel --- relaxed and  welcoming!

properties.name: The Malibu Outpost
properties.summary: The Malibu Outpost is a multiple dwelling secluded paradise that begins on a bluff among lush trees with a grand outdoor pool.  It has a tennis court, sauna, kayaks’, fishing rods, surfboards, organic vegetable garden, and orchard. There are several lush decks, balconies and hidden outdoor spaces for dining al fresco with unbelievable ocean and garden views. The funicular takes you to one of Malibu’s few private coves. The beach house is the closest to the beach in all of Malibu.
properties.space: This gated compound features a bluff house, pool house, and beach house, allowing ultimate privacy for up to three families. The bluff house is nestled among trees and is surrounded by sundecks.  It features a chefs' kitchen, grand salon with massive 152" TV, indoor/outdoor master bedroom suite that spills out into a sundeck, sauna, laundry room, fireplace, guest bathroom and office.  The pool house opens on all sides and is set in a tropical garden. It features two bedrooms, fireplace, and kitchenette. The large secret observation deck has a pizza oven for al fresco dining.   all-year organic vegetable, each structure has a fireplace  The beach house is literally on the beach; with panoramic views of a secluded cove.  There are three buildings attached by covered walkways. The great room has a large beachside wrap-around deck, master bedroom suite, and guest room with a private bath. The hidden pool with meditation temple is a unique feature. There are ocean views from each room.

properties.name: PRIVATE BEACH AND OCEANFRONT MALIBU.
properties.summary: A dream getaway house right on the water. Private access to the beach. Seals, dolphins and whales sitings every day. Beautiful sunsets. Less than a mile away from the Malibu pier. Wake up to the most amazing view and sound of the ocean.
properties.space: Our beautiful tinyhouse has an open space floorplan featuring a loft converted into a pillow room with a large tv that makes sleeping feel like youre in the clouds! The downstairs has a large sofabed that comfortably sleeps 2. The ocean serves as a real life wave sound machine.

We are traveling but will be available or have someone on hand to be available whenever our guests need! Malibu is unlike any other place! Everyone is extremely friendly, down to earth, and happy to show v
properties.neighborhood_overview: Malibu is unlike any other place! Everyone is extremely friendly, down to earth, and happy to show visitors around. We are located less than 2 miles from the famous Reel Inn, nobu malibu, soho malibu, topanga canyon, the malibu pier, safari wine tours, vineyards, and hundreds of beaches if you choose to venture out past your own private one in your backyard! There are also multiple gorgeous hikes through waterfalls and canyons that are close by. You are less than 6 miles from santa monica and 15 from hollywood, weho, and beverly hills. Do you scuba dive? Check out malibu divers down the road to rent your equpiment or have your dive tours arranged- there is a reef behind our bungalow where you can dive from!
properties.notes: This tiny home is one open shared space but is comfortable enough to accomodate 4 guests (if you dont mind sharing a bathroom.) There are extra large beach chairs under the long chaise on the patio and extra blankets to the side of the sofa. If you want to light the hanging mason jars there are tealight candles in the top kitchen drawer to the right of the oven.
properties.transit: We have a parking spot right in front of our unit and there are public guest spots two cartwheels away. Uber and lyft both operate from this location which are the most convenient way to get around if you dont have a car.
properties.access: Private beach access, parking spot, our hammock tbat is hung under the house on the beach, towels, fully equip kitchen with new appliances. Our closet is locked with our personal belongings but you will be so distracted by the rest of the magic this place brings it wont matter!

WiFi internet access (via ADSL, good for email and net browsing, too slow for streaming), mobile phone reception iffy (use (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN) or similar WiFi based apps). 2.5 miles to the nearest beach.

properties.host_about:
I am interested in making my apartment a good experience for you -all the while I stay out of your way. You are here to enjoy your stay -not to deal with me.   I don't like hotels. So I stocked the apartment with stuff I would like to have -fast internet, printer, TV with a gazillion of channels (even if why on earth would you want to watch TV here?), all the kitchen appliances I can think of, grill on deck, etc. Blah blah. Within reason you should find pretty everything you can think of for you here. If you don't, it can probably be arranged.

I have been writing a guide "what's interesting for me in Malibu". It's now 30 pages long and it's yours to keep.  So far my guests seem to like it.

You'll find more on me on that famous "book with faces" if you search for "heikki malibu" -most likely I am the only one you find.

properties.neighborhood_overview: Malibu West is the real, authentic Malibu populated by the surfers, ranchers, and artists that together create a unique environment. While neighbors are hardly visible here in our canyon, a great way to enjoy the architecture of the area is to stroll along the shore of Broad Beach where many Malibu celebrities live.  Another great option is to cruise Mulholland Drive all the way to the ocean.
properties.notes: It is important to note that during the months of Dec, Jan, Feb, & March, the temperature at night can fall below 50 degrees.  Although there is a nice wood pellet stove heater in the yurt, it is important to be aware that it can be chilly by morning even with the heater on, so we recommend having some warmer morning clothing available during these months.  We provide extra blankets for the bed during this time also.  The pool is available year-round but, of course, the water isn't warm until around July - October.  Note that the hot tub is not part of the AirBnB amenities.
properties.transit: Having a car is best, but if you don't we can pick you up at the bus stop at Trancas down the road for a reasonable fee.  Please note that taxis charge between 95-150 for transport from LAX or downtown L.A.  Unless you are an intrepid trekker comfortable with city transport, you will definitely need a car.
properties.access: Guests have access to the pool and pool patio in addition to their own private terrace. The pool area is technically a bonus area and not officially part of the Airbnb reservation, however, feel free to utilize the area along with other guests. Guests also have access to hiking trails right outside the door as 180 degrees of the property is bordered by Santa Monica Mountains Parks. Malibu's best surf beaches and most secluded beautiful beaches are just 2 miles down the road and in the other direction are wine-tasting sites in the midst of Malibu's vineyards. And, don't forget to star-gaze here in one of LA's only Dark-Sky preserves.
properties.interaction: Lastly, guests have access to Malibu's most affordable, quality dining option - our own farm-to-table, all organic home-cooked breakfast or dinners. Check the Menu at the end of this section, however be aware please that meals are an Option not covered or part of the Airbnb reservation. We love to interact with our guests, but we strive to give guests the level of interaction and privacy they want.. Honeymooners, for example, are given total privacy. Other guests who want to mingle will enjoy hearing stories of our travels and behind-the-scenes working on Hollywood Studios as well as great tips for how to enjoy Malibu. The best way to do this is to indulge in one of our very affordable farm-to-table, all-organic home-cooked breakfasts or dinners. Malibu Orchard Menu – ALL ORGANIC! Farm-to-Table; Pasture-to-Plate Feast on a meal that is 100% organic and cooked from scratch just for you! AT A GLANCE: Breakfast: 20 pp plus gratuity includes Breakfast Plate, Toast, Home-Made Jams, Fruit,
properties.house_rules: No infants or children No pets Smoking only on gravel or cement areas which are designated areas No smoking in the Yurt. Advance permission required for 5 guests. No more than 5 guests allowed. Check in is at 3:00 and check out is at 11:00.   Organic, home-cooked meals are available at additional charge. Reservation required.  Additional guests who are not overnighting are welcomed for meals pending approval by hosts. Be prepared to do a self check in please. At check out, leave the room as you found it.
properties.host_about: WE EMBRACE DIVERSITY!  I'm an author/photographer by profession, but a traveler by vocation ... that's why I'm running an AirBnB... because even when I'm not traveling, I'm always on a journey!  I love learning languages and speak Spanish, Portuguese and French with a smattering of Japanese and Arabic.  Bruce is a Director of Photography specializing in 3D films.  But, we both share a passion for organic gardening.  Besides our orchard of 100 Meyer Lemons, we grow organic vegetables and herbs.  We both love sharing recipes and conversation with friends, new and old, from around the world ... as well as favorite travel tales, books, and music.

properties.name: Newly Built Malibu Paradise
properties.summary: NEWLY BUILT!*BRAND NEW POOL AND SPA!* PRIVATE DRIVEWAY TO BEACH!**ASK ABOUT SPECIAL RATES**  Recently featured in a couple music videos, this 5bed/7.75bath celebrity-styled home lies just above Malibu's most secluded and pristine beach, Watkin's Cove. Located on the Pacific Coast Highway, the estate offers access to the best Malibu has to offer with complete seclusion surrounded by lush landscape. *EVENT AND PARTY PRICING VARIES ON A CASE BY CASE BASIS*
properties.space: (URL HIDDEN) With walls of glass that disappear at the touch of a button, offering spectacular 180 degree ocean views, this just completed stunning Balinese inspired bluff top estate showcases the very best that Malibu has to offer.   Expansive decks that flow out to a lovely lawn and sparkling pool with spa adjoining an aquarium make for the perfect entertaining environment.  Only a few feet away steps lead to a sandy secret cove.  This “smart” home features a cook’s kitchen with top of the line appliances that blend seamlessly into the hand-crafted cabinetry.  Exotic stone and unique finishes run throughout the many ensuite bedrooms, several kitchenettes and fabulous state of the art theater.  This is truly a striking, private one of a kind home.  Its location, just 10 minutes to shops and restaurants while still only 20 minutes from private jet friendly Camarillo Airport, make it an even more desirable property.

properties.name: Aphrodite-Airstream International Sterling Edition
properties.summary: This Airstream can be parked near some of the most desirable  beaches and surf breaks in Malibu.  Less than 30 minutes (depending upon LA traffic) to Santa Monica/Venice or fly into LAX and taxi up the coast 45 minutes to Malibu RV Park.  The closest beach is right across the street from the RV park.  We also offer deliveries all over the Western United States and allow you to tow our Airstreams with a sufficient vehicle and experience.  You must reserve space at the RV park prior to booking.
properties.space: This luxury Airstream accommodates 6 in comfort so ideal for couples wanting a romantic getaway or a family.  I have 7 more Airstreams in the fleet and growing so if you have a larger group, inquire about setting up several for a fun outdoor weekend. On the inside, there are 3 sleeping areas, a kitchen with 3 burner stovetop, oven, sink, fridge/freezer, Wifi, 2 flat screen TVs, shower, toilet, sink, heating and AC and lots of storage. We can arrange bedding or you can bring your own but otherwise our Airstreams are completely stocked with all kitchen items and most anything else you would need for a camping trip.

properties.neighborhood_overview: My fleet is going to be based in Malibu from October through March but can be delivered anywhere else you desire for an additional fee.  Malibu hosts some of the best beaches in the country for year round enjoyment, not to mention a plethora of shops and restaurants.
properties.transit: If you don't have a vehicle, using Uber/Lyft or a taxi service is the best way to get around.  Santa Monica/Venice is about 25 minutes from here and LAX is about 45 minutes depending on LA traffic.
properties.access: Guests will be required to reserve a spot at the RV park, state beach or campground prior to booking with me as we need to ensure there is availability, which I can help arrange.  We can also deliver to private property, concert venues or anywhere else you would like one set up.  We have a network of delivery drivers so depending on distance from our base will dictate prior.
properties.interaction: Either myself or one of my associates can be at the Airstream to go through orientation and make sure you're settled in.  We have instructions for each trailer but can also go over it all on the phone as it's quite simple.  We make ourselves available 24/7 via phone/text/email in case you have any issues and all the other RVers, especially Airstream owners, are always more than welcome to lend a helping hand.
properties.house_rules: - This Airstream can be delivered to any RV park in California for an additional fee, we just ask that you respect park rules as your conduct also reflects on the solid relationships we've established at both privately owned parks as well as state parks
properties.host_about:
Greetings Fellow World Travelers!

I have a growing fleet of Airstreams that triangulate between bases in Malibu (serving from San Diego to Santa Barbara), Sausalito (serving Marin, Sonoma, Napa and the Bay Area) as well as Aspen, Colorado.  After spending the past 15 years in real estate development and representing vacation properties in Aspen, I decided to chase my dream to live near the water so built a fleet of Airstream travel trailers, which I rent to travelers seeking a West Coast adventure.  During my "down" time, I buy, sell and customize vintage Airstreams to be used for corporate events, romantic couples getaways, family vacations, extra guest lodging at your home or winery and just about anything else you can dream of.

The fleet consists of late model Airstreams.  With a proper tow vehicle and experience, we allow you to hitch up and take with you.  If you don't have a sufficient tow vehicle, we can help locate one through a rental company otherwise we have a network of drivers who can delivery/setup/pick up so you have a truly turn key glamping experience.

Please feel free to contact me with any additional questions as look forward to helping you plan your next adventure!

Godspeed,
Christopher

properties.neighborhood_overview: It is extremely quiet and peaceful, with vineyards growing in the neighborhood. People ride horses up past the house to the state park which spans 60 mi.² right in our backyard.  The most amazing hiking trails start here.
properties.notes: You will need a car.  There is no public transportation.   Bathroom amenities include Towels, Shampoo, Conditioner and a Hair Dryer.   Weekly maid service is included with the cleaning fee.  There is also a small fridge/ freezer, a microwave and coffee maker in the room.  A list of the best restaurants, ranches, beaches and local spots will be provided to you when you arrive.  We know all the best secret spots in the area and we will gladly share them with you when you arrive.  You will have a great stay in Malibu and leave knowing so much more about Malibu and local life in the mountains.
