Our property borders the Santa Monica Mountain National Recreation area.  Miles and miles of hiking trails start at the back gate of our property.  The Backbone trail which runs thru the mountains and connects to the trails directly out our back gate, is a 68 mile 2 day hike.  Please let me know if you are interested in booking a Horse Back Riding tour right from our stables in the back yard.  Our resident horses will take you on an incredible ride with a view of some of these mountains along with the most gorgeous ocean views.  You will ride along the Zuma Ocean View Trail see some of the 159,000 acres (YES 288 SQUARE MILES) of clean open undeveloped wild mountain range which makes our property so special.

properties.house_rules: Unfortunately the neighbors are very sensitive, so we cannot allow parties of more than 8 people, and it must be quiet outside by 9pm. You must be in the house with the doors closed by 9pm. Please also do not play loud music during the day with the doors open, as it will disturb the neighbors. Also, if we find evidence of smoking either inside the house or outside the house, we will have no choice but to charge the fully security deposit for a special cleaning fee. Please note the driveway is steep but certainly driveable. The house also has stairs to enter and between the stories, so is not handicap accessible. No candles or open flames anywhere on the property.
properties.host_about: I have owned my ocean view Santa Barbara home for 40 years. I have two friendly small dogs, a cat that stays in my bedroom, and some large and small birds. I enjoy spending time with my three local grandchildren, playing piano, and taking my dogs for walks. I'd love to have you come stay in my private upstairs two room suite.

We treat our guest like family.   We do not allow our place to be Blogged about, or pictures used for your personal public marketing without our consent.

We have lots of kids stuff, to help make your trip more comfortable. WE WILL DISCOUNT THE PRICE TO SINGLE GUEST.  SO IF ITS JUST ONE PERSON BOOKING, Please let us know.

properties.neighborhood_overview: This area is just a  minute or 2 from all the main part of malibu.  2 minutes from Nobu, the pier.  Dukes, Cross creek. all are within 2-5 min. From our home it is a 5min walk down the street to the beach.
properties.notes: We offer complimentary appetizers, beverage and a choice of a full main meal.  Each guest and situation is different, so we will work around any all guest.       the house is stocked with food when guest arrive, we will make sure you are never hungry or thirsty.    We love meeting our guest and absolutely would love to see them again.   We also know a great massage therapist .   You can book massages while you are here, she comes here to the home.  This is a separate charge paid directly the the massage therapist.  She is outstanding!!! and we recommend you book with her prior to your arrival, so that she can schedule you.   We are very accustomed to celebrities and can comfortably accommodate, we keep your stay very private.  We are very social and we live in an amazing neighborhood and area. .  PLEASE NOTE, IT IS UP TO YOU TO CHECK FULLY BEFORE CHECKOUT, FOR ANY PERSONAL BELONGINGS.  WE WILL NOT SHIP, MAIL, DELIVER ANY LEFT ITEMS.   YOU ARE WELCOME TO MAKE ARRANGEMENTS TO COME TO PIC
properties.transit: we are well known and can assist you on your tours of malibu.  Can help make your malibu experience even more amazing, with helping to get you to the coolest best spots in malibu.
properties.access: our guest are to feel at home and enjoy all the beautiful and cozy relaxing spots around the home and property.   our property is open to large "wilderness"  we do not allow our guest to explore the extent of the property and open gated areas for safety reasons and for the protection of our children, dogs and animals.  There are exceptions and I will do my best to accommodate.    We also do allow our guest to go to the animal area and enjoy, but guest are NOT allowed to enter or open any of the the animal cages Without the host present.  We have rare, expensive and some irreplaceable animals and there safety is important and animals are unpredictable, so for the safety of guest, we do not allow anyone to touch the animals, without the host present and assisting.    We will gladly accompany you and let you meet, hold and pet the animals. and of course take pictures and enjoy.  we give full access to the kitchen, so our guest are welcome to help themselves and feel at home
properties.interaction: guest will be treated like family.  we are very easy going, very chill and happy.   the property, street and area of malibu, is full of amazing views, walks, animals. sites and sounds.  its a quiet street, and an 5 min walk to the beach.  We are happy to sit with you, hang with you, or give you complete privacy and separation.
properties.house_rules: we want our guest to feel at home, feel comfortable. and enjoy there stay. smoking is ok, just outside not indoors.  Were super chill and we guarantee you will feel super comfortable.  WE WILL ALLOW OUR GUEST TO INVITE OTHERS OVER TO VISIT,  BUT ONLY WITH IT BOOKED AS "EXTRA GUEST FEE" THROUGH AIRBNB.  IT IS 40 PER PERSON.  ADULTS (children no cost) Everyone will get  FOOD, DRINK AND TOUR OF FARM FOR THE DAY/NIGHT.   40 IS PRICE PER EXTRA PERSON WHETHER THEY ARE HERE FOR AN HOUR OR SPEND THE NIGHT.   I DO CATERING, SO I AM VERY CAPABLE OF HOSTING BUSINESS DINNERS, LUNCHES, PARTIES, ETC HERE.  BUT I NEED NOTICE.  UNDER 8 PEOPLE CAN BE DONE WITH A DAYS NOTICE.
properties.host_about: I am a chef, an artist,  a full time mother, and I also created Malibu Family Farm.     I grew up in the scrap metal recycling business and demolition.  I have traveled the country since I was a teen overseeing massive demolition jobs and recovering the metals.  Im the local "handyman" to neighbors.  Im a very down to earth, generous, understanding person.  my childhood was spent in Mexico, so my cooking is based on that upbringing, mixed with my own style and infusions of asian, euro, and american.   I am from Los Angeles, Santa Monica, and other beach areas.  My husband was born and raised in Malibu.  He is a student at Pepperdine and works full time.  We both work non stop to manage the home, farm and most importantly our 2 young children.  2 +4yrs

properties.name: CAMP OUT IN OCEAN PARADISE

Take in mind that if you check in late, you may have lot of assembly to do.

properties.name: Malibu Modern 1 bedroom Pool House
properties.summary: TWO GUESTS MAXIMUM 5 minutes to PCH Mid-century furniture Super efficient A/C and heat Pool 2 miles to "downtown" Malibu, 12 miles to Santa Monica Strong Wifi Filtered drinking water No late night check-ins No smoking No photo or film shoots, no parties
properties.space: Tranquil and peaceful, a stay here is really like being at a retreat! We are a blissful two minutes away from the noise of busy Pacific Coast Highway but close enough to easily enjoy all that Malibu has to offer. The one-bedroom pool house has a stunning ocean view with Catalina Island visible on most days. It is an incredibly quiet sanctuary with only the sounds of birdsong and the waves crashing on Carbon Beach below. The house is surrounded by organic avocado and lemon trees and has a private patio at the entrance and a wrap-around deck. Furnished with authentic mid-century furniture and all the comforts of home. Fully equipped kitchen features a brand new professional Viking range and refrigerator. Super efficient A/C and heat keep the temperature perfect. Strong Wi-Fi is provided as well as a Harmon Kardon wireless speaker for music.

properties.neighborhood_overview: We are located in the Carbon Canyon area of Malibu, two miles from the beach and the heart of downtown Malibu with shops, markets and restaurants close at hand. Malibu is a large area-- 27 miles, with many remote canyons-- but we are centrally located and a quick 20 minutes from Santa Monica (without traffic). Guests can go to dinner at Nobu and be home in ten minutes. Our canyon isn't really a "neighborhood"-- no sidewalks or street lights. Lots of wide open space, very few neighbors and an enormous ocean view. The closest beaches are Carbon Beach, one mile away (look for signs on PCH indicating Public Beach Access) and Surfrider Beach (otherwise known as "Malibu Beach") two miles to the north.  Nature abounds here and the rural surroundings, privacy and spectacular ocean views provide a very laid back environment. The pool house is the perfect place to decompress and restore.
properties.notes: When inquiring about our property please tell us about yourself and what brings you to Malibu. Our home is our sanctuary and we appreciate knowing a little bit about who will be here. An inquiry without any information about the guests will not lead to a booking. Please PRINT OUT and BRING the Directions/House Manual that you will receive upon booking! That way you will know exactly where to come and how to check-in.  We communicate with guests via the Airbnb website-- please download the Airbnb app or check the website for messages. Uber and Lyft are not possible from our property. The pool house does not have a T.V. and cell phone service can be spotty or non-existent in most of Malibu, depending on your carrier. The Wifi in the pool house is strong.  No PARTIES, EVENTS, WEDDINGS OR PHOTO SHOOTS allowed at our property. Professional photo and film shoots are handled by our property's agent, Catherine Meyler and Associates. Two overnight guests maximum. GPS is not always reliable in M
properties.transit: You will need a car to really experience Malibu.
properties.access: A private set of stairs leads guests down to the pool house from the driveway and is completely separate from the main house.  A spiral staircase outside the pool house door takes guests from the living quarters to the pool deck above.
properties.interaction: As needed! Our family lives in the main house (which is not for rent). The pool house is a stand alone house separate from the main house and a distance away.
properties.house_rules: This rental is best suited for couples or single guests looking for peace and tranquility. It sleeps two people comfortably and unfortunately we cannot accommodate more than two people per night. The pool house is not suitable for parties. There will be an additional 100 fee for over-night guests not on the agreement. If you plan on having visitors during your stay advise us of this at the time of booking. Please, no pizza delivery men/visitors ringing our doorbell (or our neighbor's). This is a rural area and deliveries really don't work well. It is your responsibility to give your visitors exact directions on how to find you! We respect your privacy and expect the same in return.  Uber and Lyft will not work from our property. Check-in is 3:00-8:00 P.M. Please don't arrive before then unless we email you that an earlier check-in is possible. Check-out is 11:00A.M. We do not accept children under the age of 12 due to safety/liability and concerns for the furniture. Carbon Canyon is a
properties.host_about: We're L.A. natives who love nature, architecture, good design and most of all Malibu.

properties.name: Large Glamping Tent in the Malibu Mountains
properties.summary: This enormous luxury tent is the perfect place to hold a one-of-a-kind event in the beautiful Southern California scenery. Nestled in the mountains of Malibu, this tent can comfortably sleep up to 20 people. Glampers will have an unforgettable experience staying on this lovely wildlife rescue ranch totally immersed in the natural wonders of southern California. Soak up the SoCal sun and relax with friends and family in the outdoor seating area surrounding the fire pit.
properties.space: This is glamping at its finest!    Beds are not included,  they can be setup for an additional fee.   The shared bathhouse is a short walk away.

Soak up the SoCal sun and relax with friends and family in the outdoor seating area surrounding the fire pit. This is glamping at its finest!    Beds are not included,  they can be setup for an additional fee.   The shared bathhouse is a short walk away. High up in the Malibu mountains,  with amazing views in all directions. Only 10-15 minutes from the beach and shopping centers.
properties.neighborhood_overview: High up in the Malibu mountains,  with amazing views in all directions. Only 10-15 minutes from the beach and shopping centers.
properties.host_about:
Rescuing animals, helping Kids in need interact with the animals. Movie shoots, film, weddings and giving that comfy cozy down home Mama Z style. 
Moving forward to take an action for a reaction. Growing  sustainable food No GMO, working towards the Ranch's best interest. Created the Ranch with my own hands out of recycled materials, feels like the 60's and 70's Glam Style. Number one to make the guest feel like they are the only one.
Clean freak, everything washed every time just the way I expect it.

Crickets, frogs, coyotes and deer are your neighbors in this canyon community, yet you are only 2 miles from the PCH and Malibu's beaches and shopping. properties.neighborhood_overview: Crickets, frogs, coyotes and deer are your neighbors in this canyon community, yet you are only 2 miles from the PCH and Malibu's beaches and shopping. We are also only 45 minutes from LAX, 25 minutes from Santa Monica, Venice, and any number of local famous stops on your list. Our neighborhood is tight and friendly--you can step out your door and likely find the kindly neighbor walking their dog, willing to offer any number of recommendations for your day. State park hiking and biking is literally a 5-minute car ride outside your door, with numerous trails, rocks to climb, and caves to explore in the Santa Monica mountains--some of the most exquisite outdoor experiences for the beginning or advanced hiker/explorer. Waterfalls and famous hiking trails greet you at the bottom of the canyon at PCH as well, along with  some of the most exquisite views in the world as you drive up.
properties.notes: Funky-delic apartment is located in the canyons up two-lane, well-kept county paved road, but a canyon road nonetheless. Guests should take their time driving up and down canyon (only 2.5 miles up, and about 8 minute drive), and are encouraged to stop at turn outs to take in views!
properties.transit: Right at the bottom of our canyon at the PCH, the Metro #534 stops. It can connect you to any number of Metro buses to get you to the city or other places you'd like to go.

properties.name: Rustic Bed + Bath Flat on 30-Acre Horse Ranch
properties.summary: Funky, rustic & private 1.5 room + bathroom on the ground floor w/ personal entrance on gorgeous 30-acre ranch. This space is attached to the main ranch house, but has been separated to function as its own small flat with kitchenette.  Less than 10-minutes from downtown Malibu food and shopping, PCH, Calabasas and the 101! Perfect access point for hikers, mountain bikers and nature lovers! Shared saltwater pool access with our family. ADDITIONAL 75 FOR SINGLE NIGHT STAY (Only) MAY-SEPTEMBER.
properties.space: This is a very private and comfortable flat with its own entrance and a small adjoining room fit with a small fridge, microwave, filtered water, coffee pot and tea kettle (a variety tea and coffee provided). This is a quiet room, ideal for relaxing or as a hub for adventure! Our family is quite busy, and while we are very friendly guests will find they won't see much of us - mostly just Suze passing by on horses with some quick Brit wit! Quick Facts: - Queen bed and private bathroom with shower + small adjoining outlet with kitchenette, kettle & coffee pot.  - This room is NOT ideal for 3 adults, we list as such simply to accommodate a single child traveling with adults. - Twin blow up camping bed for child w/ sleeping bag.  - Personal bbq available - Room TV has free access to Netflix,  Hulu and HBO GO.  - No in and out limitations once you arrive, come home whenever you like!  - Check in ONLY: PLEASE plan to arrive before dark (5pm in Winter), if you don't think you can/flight arrive

Quick Facts: - Queen bed and private bathroom with shower +
properties.neighborhood_overview: We live in Monte Nido, our own mountain nest 10 minutes from downtown Malibu. We are also 5 minutes from the main entrance of Malibu State Creek Park, 10 minutes from Calabasas (San Fernando Valley) with access to the famous Backbone trail at the bottom of our driveway! We are also just a few homes away from The Saddle Peak Lodge, a critically-acclaimed restaurant known for its exotic wild game! Rock-climbing, biking trails, hiking trails all easy distance!
properties.notes: From May-September is our high season and we are always booked to the teeth!! One night stays have become unfeasible for us, however we know most hosts do not offer one-night stays in the area and we LOVE our roadtrippers! So we have decided that in lieu of stopping single-night bookings all together we have simply added an additional 75-fee for those who would like to stay just one night. This helps a little to offset the cost of losing multi-night booking and to get outside help with cleaning! We have two large dogs and three small dogs and that call our property home (all rescues). They are very friendly. They do bark! But we will kennel them at night to keep the peace. We also have a number of horses! While we encourage you to visit the horses, we ask that you engage them with caution and ask that you always stay behind all fences. Please note that the property's beauty comes from its rural nature, which carries some hazards including rattle snakes! But not to worry, just stick to
properties.transit: A car is necessary as there is no public transit access in our remote location. Uber has been used successfully by other guests, however since we are remote we cannot guarantee there will be drivers for pick-up. We only recommend uber use if you have a highly flexible itinerary. Flat rate taxi to LAX can be arranged in advance through "MALIBU CAB".
properties.access: We ask that you please do not enter the main house without invitation and to be respectful of the room, property and animals, but beyond this please just enjoy yourself! Feel free to explore the grounds and enjoy the pool as much as you like!! We recommend cooking on the bbq and eating by the pool or watching the sunset! While there is much to see and experience in the Santa Monica Mountains, this ranch is also very beautiful so staying in might be for you.
properties.interaction: My husband and I are both retired; he writes, I ride! My husband is a writer originally from South Africa and often keeps to himself, while I'm often busy with the horses and ranch (I'm British!). We're more than happy to assist with anything you might need, and we hope your stay is peaceful and relaxing!
properties.house_rules: IMPORTANT: Check in is between 1pm-6pm, please let us know in advance when you plan to arrive, and message/text us when you get close (30-min) so that we can arrange to meet you! NO check-ins after six without prior arrangement. We are very happy to share our home and we are flexible on time of arrival, but we have busy lives as well - this is not a hotel and we can't be expected to wait all day for guest to arrive! Per our moderate cancellation policy we are NOT required to refund last minute cancellations (within five days of stay). However, we know life happens. We are willing to offer a refund less a 135 cancellation fee (approx 1 night stay) to those who need to cancel last minute. This does not include airbnb fees paid, of which we have no control. This room is in very high demand, your cancellation is a loss for us. Thank you for understanding! Airbnb is not a hotel service, we do not offer daily cleaning services. Please be sure to empty your organic (food) trash daily to avoi
properties.host_about: My husband and I are both retired; he writes, I ride! My husband is a writer originally from South Africa and often keeps to himself, while I'm often busy with the horses and ranch (I'm British!). We live on a horse ranch in the Santa Monica Mountains that we can rarely bring ourselves to leave!

Access to the Malibu beaches and the Santa Monica Mountains are within minutes of the house.  There are scuba diving facilities and world class restaurants on the Pacific Coat Highway. Perfect for solo travelers, a couple, maybe a couple with a baby.

properties.neighborhood_overview: Outdoor activities of course: surfing, biking, hiking, motorcycle rides, horseback riding and more adventurous once that you won't ketch me doing :). Restaurants are fantastic, in fact I think most of them are outstanding, and almost all are good, I am a foodie and would be happy to share my favorites. The place is probably what we imagine a heaven should be like, it resonates with all senses in most indulging way. I lived here for a little over a year and still thrilled every day to wake up to such beauty.
properties.transit: Best way to get around is by car, motorcycle or bicycle (although that one is a real exercise up the notorious among triathlon athletes Latigo Canyon) bus 534 on PCH that takes you to Palisades/Santa Monica area, and my friends sometimes use it, I drop and pick them up from the bottom of the hill.

My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers and kids up to 4.

Use of the deck of course to capture your memories or to have a morning coffee or evening wine with major star skies and the bare eye captures really the milky way. White water, stunning sunrises and sunsets waiting to be captured with your camera. I offer also Yoga classes for beginners or advanced if needed or body toning classes during your stay, as well health and life coaching for a fee (please ask upon arrival). Laundry 10 per load, Car ride to beach or local store and back 10 per ride. Car ride to dry cleaner or special stores 20 per ride NO Sand in house rule. properties.name: Traditional Tipi in the Malibu Mountains
properties.summary: What could be better than staying in a Native American tipi for a truly authentic glamping experience in California? Situated high in the Malibu mountains with views of the Pacific Ocean, this stunning luxury tipi is perfect for weddings and special events. This location is perfect for a rejuvenating spa retreat or hiking in the surrounding southern California wilderness. Glampers are kept company by the horses and rescue animals on site, giving them a true ranch experience.
properties.space: This is glamping at its finest!    Beds are not included,  they can be setup for an additional fee.   The shared bathhouse is a short walk away.

properties.name: Gated Malibu Canyon Estate Private Room
properties.summary: Welcome to our majestic Malibu Canyon Mountain Nest gated estate.  Our home is located in the Santa Monica mountains with many historic hiking trails, waterfalls, and Malibu Beach is 5 minute drive. We are located 3 miles from Pepperdine University and across from the world famous Saddle Peak Lodge Restaurant.  Santa Monica pier and 3rd Street Promenade are a 25 minute drive down beautiful Pacific Coast Highway.  We offer a chauffeur service at an extra cost. We look forward to meeting you!
properties.space: The room is a private entrance in a gated estate with private parking.  The room has Brazilian wood floor, a 50 inch plasma screen TV with your own private bathroom.  There is a comfortable, cozy full queen bed with soft pillows.  There is a chair for reading and a mirrored armoire with drawers and plenty of space to hang your clothes.  Beautiful views of the Santa Monica mountains from your front door.

properties.name: Malibu Queen Suite:Private Bath
properties.summary: Malibu mountain home designed by Lloyd Wright close to legendary Leo Carrillo surfing beach. Midcentury modern design with breathtaking views of state and national parks. Quiet rural setting in Malibu. Hike, swim, relax!
properties.space: This bedroom has a queen size comfortable bed, fresh new linens, charming decor, private access to outside sitting area, flat screen TV, keyed entry and ample closet and storage space in a dramatic architectural home nestled in a private Malibu canyon and designed by Lloyd Wright, the son of Frank Lloyd Wright.   A full private bathroom features floor tiling from Sausalito's famous Heath Pottery. This is unquestionably the quietest room in the home offering guests an incredibly peaceful night's rest.

properties.neighborhood_overview: No neighbors live in view in any direction. Setting is totally rural yet offers relatively easy access to beaches, Los Angeles attractions and the famous Malibu scene. Numerous hiking trails a short distance from the home. 1 hour from Los Angeles & Burbank airport. Multiple restaurants and shopping in Malibu by the beach or Westlake Village in the other direction.
properties.notes: A short drive to multiple wedding and special event centers such as Calamigos & Saddlepeak, we are able to host groups of out-of-town guests in a 3 bedroom setting. Malibu's Leo Carrillo beach is 4.1 miles from the house.
properties.transit: Plenty of free parking. Shuttle to airports available, but car is essential.

properties.house_rules: 1. No smoking of tobacco products or fires of any kind on the Property.  Property is located in an extreme fire zone area. 2.Do not touch or approach the two Wild Mustang horses, on the Property.  Horses are in fenced pastures.  Do not enter pasture areas.  3.Drive out of driveway/parking area in a forward direction.  Do not back onto Mulholland Highway.  Bicyclists, motorcycles and cars unexpectedly come around the bend.   4.Close all gates you walk through.  Gates are intended to keep domestic animals inside the Property and wildlife outside the Property. 5.Keep water usage to a minimum.  Home is on a well and excessive use of water is discouraged because of drought in the state of California. 6.Do not approach natural wildlife that may wander on the Property (e.g., coyote, rattlesnake, mountain lion, bobcat, deer, raccoon and fox).  Animal wildlife can be dangerous to humans and can cause injury to those that approach them.   7.Refrain from the use of harsh chemicals (e.g., hair dye
properties.host_about:
We are longtime Malibu mountain dwellers.  We raised our family here and  are happy to welcome visitors into our Malibu mountain retreat where we enjoy hiking the 70 miles of the Santa Monica Malibu Backbone Trail, our wild mustang horses, jogging at sunset on beautiful Leo Carrillo beach and countless outdoor activities in Malibu.  
Guests will enjoy our home's wonderful peace and quiet as well as comfortable accommodations in our architecturally unique space.

properties.name: Charming Cottage on horse ranch in the Malibu Mtns
properties.summary: Charming small one bedroom guest cottage w/ loft on horse property in the Malibu Mtns. Get away from the traffic and the city madness and spend some time sipping wine and watching the sunset in the beautiful Malibu Mtns. The Cottage is an ideal destination for wine tasting, hiking, mtn biking, street cycling, beach going or just relaxing in peaceful seclusion. Experience the magic of the Santa Monica Mountain Range all year round. We are 10 miles from Malibu and 5 miles from the 101 freeway.
properties.space: The main part of the Cottage consists of a kitchen with a mini fridge with separate freezer, a 4 burner gas stove top, toaster oven, microwave, Keurig coffee maker, etc. There is a dining area and a small sitting room with a tv and a small movie collection (sorry there is no cable tv). There is a loft with a double bed and a quaint bathroom.  Separate from the main living area there is a small bedroom that is accessed from outside and has it's own entry (see bedroom pictures). There is a queen bed in the bedroom.  Unfortunately there is NO wifi so bring a book and enjoy unplugging from the matrix :-). Note: I have made a couple upgrades since 02/10/2017. There is now regular door on the bathroom and I have replaced the electric cooktop with a gas stovetop. :-)
properties.description: Charming small one bedroom guest cottage w/ loft on horse property in the Malibu Mtns. Get away from the traffic and the city madness and spend some time sipping wine and watching the sunset in the beautiful Malibu Mtns. The Cottage is an ideal destination for wine tasting, hiking, mtn biking, street cycling, beach going or just relaxing in peaceful seclusion. Experience the magic of the Santa Monica Mountain Range all year round. We are 10 miles from Malibu and 5 miles from the 101 freeway. The main part of the Cottage consists of a kitchen with a mini fridge with separate freezer, a 4 burner gas stove top, toaster oven, microwave, Keurig coffee maker, etc. There is a dining area and a small sitting room with a tv and a small movie collection (sorry there is no cable tv). There is a loft with a double bed and a quaint bathroom.  Separate from the main living area there is a small bedroom that is accessed from outside and has it's own entry (see bedroom pictures). There is a queen bed
properties.neighborhood_overview: The grounds here are beautiful and the magic of Santa Monica Mountains is gentle and inspiring. While being 10 minutes to civilization, it feels like another world. Everyone enjoys the beauty of having coffee or tea in the morning out on the deck in the peace and serenity of the ranch. This is a great place to write, use as a base camp for recreation adventures, do yoga, plan local wine adventures, or just chill. The evenings are glorious, a star filled sky, a big moon, and nature all around. The neighborhood, if you could call it a neighborhood consists of homes scattered throughout the mountains. There are a couple homes on adjacent properties fairly close but you will feel like you are peacefully secluded and privately tucked away in your own mountain world.
properties.notes: Unfortunately there is NO wifi so bring a book and enjoy unplugging from the matrix :-).  The cottage is situated with plenty of privacy but since it is attached to the barn you might hear the person who feeds the horses getting hay in the morning and evening.   Also, while there are fans in the space the loft can get stay pretty warm on summer nights.
properties.transit: If you do not have your own transportation Uber is your only option. But since I am slightly off the beaten path there can be a 15-30 min wait time for pick ups.
properties.access: There is parking steps away from the Cottage. Guests can wander the grounds but I ask that you do not go up to the main house which starts at the cement driveway and definitely stay out of the main house backyard which is clearly fenced cause we have big dogs. There are a couple great spots with a view of the Hidden Valley where you can have some wine and watch the sunset (See pictures).  I have a small Weber charcoal BBQ that you can use by request only please.  Unfortunately the horses are not for public use as they are retired. They are rescues so please do not pet or feed them as they are not very friendly and may bite.
properties.interaction: I'll usually give my guests space and let them check in and check out on there own but I am always up for socializing. If I am around when you are here I will say hi and see if you need anything. I am available from 9am to 10pm for questions and concerns via airbnb, text or phone. If there is a house emergency please contact me immediately anytime.
properties.house_rules: -No smoking inside cottage -No open flame on the property -No children under 18 (request only)  -You must specify how many will be in your party and if you will be having any visitors. -Do not feed or pet the horses. They are rescues and can be unfriendly to strangers. -Quiet time after 10pm -When entering the property stay left on the dirt driveway and follow the "151 Guest Cottage" signs down to the cottage.  -You may stroll the lower grounds but please keep to the guest house/barn area. -Do not use hairdryers or other appliances in bathroom outlet. Only use kitchen outlets for electrical appliances.

properties.neighborhood_overview: This townhouse is located on quiet and star-studded Malibu Road. Enjoy a short walk down the beach to Malibu Seafood where they serve the best fish & chips I've ever had!  Or check out the tide pools on Flat Rock, just a few hundred feet away.

properties.name: Malibu Villa - Ocean Views & Off-Grid Living
properties.summary: Unplug at our rustic villa, located on 10 acres of Malibu mountains with sweeping ocean views.  Our peaceful & remote getaway is a 25 minute mountainous drive (plus 1 mile of gravel road) from Malibu's Pacific Coast Highway. It is completely off the grid: solar powered with spring fed/filtered water. Our place is great for couples, solo adventurers, photoshoots, families, and pets.  We offer a home phone and limited wifi.  Mobile calls/texting is out of range -- a true reprieve!
properties.space: Our unique home is one of the oldest private residences in Malibu -- built in the 1920's, using local stones.  The house has no neighbors in sight and is surrounded by 100's of acres of untouched mountains.  Our interior aesthetic favors an ultra simple, uncluttered space.

Our vision for our villa is that it's a private reprieve from th
properties.neighborhood_overview: The gate to our property is in Topanga, and our property is in Malibu -- so we're close to two great neighborhoods.  Some love the laid back, hippie vibe of Topanga, others the beaches of Malibu. There's miles of hiking trails in our area.  Cyclists, motorbike enthusiasts, and skateboarders enjoy the mountain roads in our area also.  To get a general idea of drive times to map out your interests/activities, the  25-minute mountainous drive starts at Duke's Restaurant in Malibu.
properties.notes: PHONES/ INTERNET/ WIFI: -- There is a satellite telephone available for guests to use. Although not reliable, texting may be available at the villa, and cell coverage is sometimes available at the view deck, a short walk from the villa (depending on your provider). -- Satellite wifi is spotty in the villa, but usually available in the living room. -- Emailing and internet surfing is fine, but we ask guests not to stream or download music & videos as we have limited gigabytes per month. LIVING OFF-GRID: -- We are on solar power. It takes a little extra mindfulness to keep our power running smoothly.  If lights or other electrical devices are left on during the night, heavy power usage guest appliances are plugged in, or lights are left on during daylight hours, the system may run out of power.  If the power does fail, it generally comes back on as the sun gets higher - typically by mid morning. We do have a back-up generator, however, it's loud and only used for emergencies. We ask gues
properties.transit: -- Guests must have a vehicle, there is no public transit.   -- All cars, except for extreme low-rider vehicles, are suitable on our 1 mile dirt road.  Even though the dirt road is bumpy in spots, a 4-wheel drive isn't necessary. -- After heavy rains, we may have to cancel the reservation due to possible mud/rock slides.
properties.access: Guests will have access to the main house and the 10 acres it sits on.  There is a guest cottage below the main house that's not available at this time.
properties.interaction: The house is all yours!  Our vision for our villa is that it's a private reprieve from the outside world.  We're happy to take calls or texts with any questions.  We generally don't meet with guests. There is a care-taker who lives part-time on the lower part of the property, who is generally out of sight, and always respectful of privacy.  If needed however, he can be available for any maintenance issues our guests may have.
properties.house_rules: Energy/Water Conservation:   Because we are completely off-grid, we ask guests to use resources with care: - reasonable shower lengths - all house lights turned off during sunny hours and all lights turned off before going to sleep - washer/dryer run during sunny hours only -  guest's appliances that use a lot of energy cannot be plugged into our outlets, such as hair dryers, hair irons, clothes irons. (Guests' electronics are no problem to plug in all day and night; this includes laptops, iPads, phones, and cameras) *We provide a small hair dryer, washer/dryer, fridge, gas stove/oven, Sparkletts hot/cold water, isoda maker, Senseo coffee machine, handheld blender, a fan, a bluetooth speaker, and TV's.  Our energy system is not set up to handle more than these items.  Thanks for getting on board with our off-grid lifestyle! Sharing the Gigabyte Wealth: Our satellite internet/wifi is limited per month, so we ask guests to be mindful of internet usage: - Unlimited: reading/surfing Intern
properties.host_about: I'm a lucky girl -- I have this breathtaking little spot on earth of mountains and ocean... it makes me happy to share this with others to enjoy.

A circular driveway flanked by leafy palms and a three car garage leads the way to the front entrance. Pull up a chaise longue on the main pool terrace and soak up the sun, surrounded by rolling lawn and olive trees. The heated pool and hot tub will provide refreshment no matter the season. properties.host_about:
Founded in 1999, Luxury Retreats specializes in personalized villa vacations in over 90 destinations across the world. Our portfolio includes more than 2,800 luxury villas, each hand-picked and personally inspected by our global team of passionate travel enthusiasts, who work to ensure our guests are offered the very best. 

Our team of well-travelled Villa Specialists are dedicated to helping our customers find the perfect villa in the right location.  

We provide every guest with worldwide support while on vacation. Our guests can relax knowing that there’s a team on standby, should anything require immediate assistance.

To make each vacation unforgettable, our guests also enjoy the complimentary services of a dedicated concierge, who will gladly arrange for a private chef, pre-stocking a villa with provisions or anything else that they desire. And all this without charging any membership fees.

properties.house_rules: 1. No smoking of tobacco products or fires of any kind on the Property.  Property is located in an extreme fire zone area. 2.Do not touch or approach the two Wild Mustang horses, on the Property.  Horses are in fenced pastures.  Do not enter pasture areas.  3.Drive out of driveway/parking area in a forward direction.  Do not back onto Mulholland Highway.  Bicyclists, motorcycles and cars unexpectedly come around the bend.   4.Close all gates you walk through.  Gates are intended to keep domestic animals inside the Property and wildlife outside the Property. 5.Keep water usage to a minimum.  Home is on a well and excessive use of water is discouraged because of drought in the state of California. 6.Do not approach natural wildlife that may wander on the Property (e.g., coyote, rattlesnake, mountain lion, bobcat, deer, raccoon and fox). properties.host_about:
We are longtime Malibu mountain dwellers.  We raised our family here and  are happy to welcome visitors into our Malibu mountain retreat where we enjoy hiking the 70 miles of the Santa Monica Malibu Backbone Trail, our wild mustang horses, jogging at sunset on beautiful Leo Carrillo beach and countless outdoor activities in Malibu.  
Guests will enjoy our home's wonderful peace and quiet as well as comfortable accommodations in our architecturally unique space.

Nespresso Machine Tea Kettle  Nutri-Bullet Meditation Garden Koi Fish Pond Outdoor table and chairs Washer/Dryer I prefer to meet guests in person before their stay. Point Dume State Beach features headlands, cliffs, rocky coves and vast beach access. The beach is presently operated by Los Angeles County, which also operates Zuma County Beach. These facilities are noted for swimming, surfing, scuba diving and fishing. Point Dume is a perfect place to watch for California gray whales during the December to mid April migration period
properties.neighborhood_overview: Point Dume State Beach features headlands, cliffs, rocky coves and vast beach access. The beach is presently operated by Los Angeles County, which also operates Zuma County Beach. These facilities are noted for swimming, surfing, scuba diving and fishing. Point Dume is a perfect place to watch for California gray whales during the December to mid April migration period.   Point Dume Nature Preserve  At the end of Westward Beach Road, access to Point Dume Nature Preserve begins from the cul-de-sac. A gradual ascending trail leads to an ancient coastal bluff sand dune. Visitors are asked to stay on the trail in an effort to help reserve this unique sand accumulation. An incredible view encompassing the entire Santa Monica Bay, north Malibu Coast, inland Santa Monica Mountains and distant Catalina Island may be enjoyed from the top on a clear day. A boardwalk,  just below the summit, leads to a viewing platform  - it tends to be more sheltered on a windy day. A stairway from the east side
properties.transit: Bike, car, or walking.

properties.host_about: Welcome! Originally from the Midwest, I moved to Europe after college and then spent the next 12 years in NYC building luxury brands and escaping to Montauk on the weekends. Once the winters became unbearable, I made the move to the west coast and landed in Malibu. I started my own consulting company that includes fashion styling and luxury branding. I spend a lot of time traveling for work, so my time at home is sacred...surfing, hiking, farming, long bike rides, and sunsets. Looking forward to hearing from you!

The double french doors and windows have incredible lush garden and pool views, and also allows for complete privacy to come and go as you please.  The room is large enough to order an in house massage. So come and swim, play tennis or simply sit back, relax and enjoy the beautiful garden and magnificent sunsets.
properties.description: Welcome!  Come and enjoy this quiet 400 sq ft private room surrounded by lush gardens where you can relax, swim, or play tennis inside our beautiful gated estate...  and only 3 minutes away from famous beaches, shops, cafés and restaurants! This tranquil suite with private outside entrance is located inside our estate in Point Dume, one of Malibu's most exclusive neighborhoods, where you’re only 3 minutes from famous beaches, shops, cafés and restaurants.  The room features a Queen size bed covered in soft linen, down comforter (duvet) and pillows, private bathroom with tub, small walk-in closet, large dresser, small refrigerator, sitting area, wireless internet, workstation for your laptop, coffee & tea bar, and 16x9 flat screen TV with Directv (Satellite).  The double french doors and windows have incredible lush garden and pool views, and also allows for complete privacy to come and go as you please.  The room is large enough to order an in house massage. So come and swim, play tenn
properties.neighborhood_overview: Unlike most neighborhoods in Malibu, you would not only be staying in a private, gated estate but conveniently located near a large grocery store, restaurants, cafe's, (Starbucks!), shops (hair salon, yoga studio, pharmacy & more), gas station, and famous beaches.
properties.notes: To keep our costs affordable for all guests, the large swimming pool is not heated during the cooler months.  However, we will be more than happy to heat the pool if you're interested in paying an additional 75 a day, for 8 hours to 80 degrees.  The spa is heated at no charge.
properties.transit: You're only 2 minutes away from the beach by car, and 2 minutes walking distance to shops, cafés and restaurants!  But if you don't feel like driving and want to explore more of Malibu, then jump on the Metro Bus!  It's only a 3 minute walk and it runs up and down Pacific Coast Highway (PCH) and even goes into Santa Monica and Los Angeles!  Be sure to check the Metro schedule online to get accurate dates and pick up times and see a full list of destinations.
properties.access: You will have access to enjoy the backyard... patios, large pool, spa, tennis court, gazebo with lounge chairs, and the tranquil gardens.
properties.interaction: We give our guests total privacy but are available if they need anything!
properties.house_rules: House Rules:  Like most people, we feel our home is a very special place, so we ask that you treat it accordingly.  It is not a party house and we respect our neighbors' right to peace and quiet, so please no loud music or excessive noise. Please do not bring any guests onto the property without our prior approval, otherwise additional fees will apply.  Also, this is a non-smoking environment and smoking is not allowed in the home or on the grounds, it can be a real fire hazard.  We are on septic so please only use the toilet paper provided (nothing else down the toilet or sink please).   Most importantly we hope you enjoy your stay so don't hesitate to ask for our help if you need anything!
properties.host_about:
Greetings!  Thank you for taking the time to look at my property and considering me as a host.  I was born and raised in a wonderful small town in Texas and made my way to the Los Angeles area 29 years ago.  I can't believe it's been that long!  During that time I got married, opened a business with my husband, raised children and settled in Malibu where I've lived now for 16 years.  It's amazing that a lifetime can be summed up in a small paragraph.  :)

I love movies, nature, gardening, animals, traveling, museums, people, visiting with friends, and mostly spending time with my family.  And I'm addicted to Mexican food which I could eat every day! 

To my surprise, I've thoroughly enjoyed the whole experience I've had renting our house, meeting so many different people from all over the world, hearing their stories,  and especially seeing their smiling faces before and after they've stayed here.  It's such a great feeling, after all the years of serious hard work I've spent on the house and garden, knowing I've helped create a lovely memory for them.

properties.name: La Maison
properties.summary: La Maison, located on a historic Malibu property, offers the best beach and  mountains that Malibu has to offer.  Cross the street and you are at the beach and go out the front door and you are in the hills. La Maison is also conveniently close to Santa Monica and w/in a  mile there are several restaurants as well as a wine bar. Romantic environment. Perfect for couples but also for travelers seeking to be close to the excitement of Santa Monica.
properties.space: La Maison is conveniently located across the street from the beach yet tucked away in the hills and close to many great restaurants and hiking trails. In the 40s and 50s, the 3 acre “Malibu Lodge” was an elegant French-Californian restaurant and hotel frequented by Hollywood luminaries including "Gone With the Wind" producer David O. Selznick,  songwriter Irving Berlin and, reportedly, Marilyn Monroe.  The cottage is about 700 sq feet  and has plenty of natural light and great views not only of the ocean but also of the hills. The space consists of a bedroom, a large living room with a pull out bed as well as an addition futon bed. There is a separate dining room, a kitchenette and of course a bathroom. The bathroom is accessible from the Bedroom as well as from the living room (dual entrance).  Can comfortably sleep 5 adults with two sharing the master bedroom and one person on the pull-out couch and the other 2 on the futon couch. The pull-out couch and the futon couch are located on

properties.neighborhood_overview: This is a very unique property in a great location. Typically, a property seemingly so secluded is tucked far away from the beach or way up the coast. La Maison, however, is literally across the street from the beach. In addition, within a mile, there are several good restaurants such as the Reel Inn (for fish), Mastro's (for steaks) and Cholada (for Thai food). Plus, Nobu is about 4 miles up the road as is Malibu Farm, Cafe' Havana and several other notable restaurants.
properties.notes: There is a TV with cable and Wi Fi connectivity (no password necessary). There are two space heaters as well as a gas Franklin Stove. The gas stove heats up the house very quickly. There is plenty of parking right next to La Maison.
properties.transit: As with virtually every other spot in LA, you will need a car to get to anywhere - besides the beach which is a two minute walk. There are private hiking trails behind the property that go on for miles but they are only accessible when I am available to guide you which I am happy to do whenever possible. Otherwise, I can recommend several other great hiking trails on public land, the closest being Temescal Canyon about 5 miles away.
properties.access: There is plenty of private parking and there is an outside patio plus lots of outdoor space. Feel free to say hello to the chickens located about 40 yards from the guesthouse! One can cross the street to get to the beach in about 2 minutes   Please note that the Pacific Coast Hwy can get busy. If you have children, it is advisable to drive across the street.
properties.interaction: I am always available for questions and to make recommendations and at times I have taken guests hiking on the private trails behind the property but I believe people are most comfortable given plenty of space.
properties.house_rules: - No candles - No parties - No smoking inside - please do not leave trash outside as the raccoons and coyotes will get it!
properties.host_about:
I grew up between Los Angeles and Rome, Italy and have been living in Malibu for about 15 years. I have also lived in Japan, Norway, Spain and the Philippines. I have a fantastic property and apparently my friends agree with me as throughout the years I have had a continued stream of guests. This is actually what led me to become a host with Airbnb and I couldn't be happier that I made this decision to do so. I'm not so sure my friends are as happy about this as I am as La Maison is often booked. C'est la vie!

I love the small town feel of Malibu and it's seclusion yet proximity to the city. Every chance I get I go hiking, stand up paddling or taking walks on the beach. While I still travel extensively, I couldn't think of a better place to call home.

properties.name: Beach Front Private Apartment
properties.summary: This pad is a piece of malibu history. World class surfers have stayed in this guesthouse. You are exactly 200 yards from the most incredible beach in Malibu (Big Dume) You can surf, hike, watch whales, dolphins, shop, and eat amazing food !
properties.space: Clean, perfect condition Guest house. 70 inch flat screen, playstation 2, netflix.

properties.name: Guest Green suite ten minutes to beach
properties.summary: We offer two separate suites with a private shared patio. Both rooms comfortably fit two guests in Queen bed. Located in a Malibu mountaintop estate. Hiking trails, 8 minutes to the beach and Malibu center.
properties.space: Rancho Chiquita is located atop a mountain with sweeping views of the Coastline and mountains. A quiet romantic getaway.
properties.description: We offer two separate suites with a private shared patio. Both rooms comfortably fit two guests in Queen bed. Located in a Malibu mountaintop estate. Hiking trails, 8 minutes to the beach and Malibu center.    Rancho Chiquita is located atop a mountain with sweeping views of the Coastline and mountains. A quiet romantic getaway. We have an in suite refrigerator and Coffee Maker . Cell service/Wifi is spotty in the mountains (Verizon works quite well) so we have a hard line for North American phone calls. If you absolutely MUST have internet/Wifi 100% of the time, then this guest suite is not suitable for you. I or my property manager will be here to check you in and help you with any of your needs. I live on site and so does property manager. We try to give you as much privacy as you wish but we are there if you need anything at all. This is a close knit family neighborhood nestled in the Santa Monica Mountains. Only minutes from beach and world class restaurants such as Nobu and g

properties.notes: We do have dogs on the property but we are very respectful of peace and quiet and if you need a good sleep in mornings let us know and we can be extra quiet.
properties.transit: We are a gated Estate and there is no public transportation. There is private secure parking. Uber will pick up and drop off at Rancho Chiquita.

properties.house_rules: I am delighted you have chosen to visit, whether it's business or vacation, I want you to enjoy your visit and the beautiful 250 acre property.  I have a few reqhttps://www.airbnb.com/helpuests and a few suggestions to make your stay the best it can possibly be.  First and very important is check in. Once I send you the directions please actually read them before you get into your car because the Corral Canyon part of your drive does not work too well with GPS or WAZE. And I promise you will get lost.  Another consideration is that once we agree on an arrival window of time to please honor that as this is not the kind of Estate where we can leave out a key in a lockbox.  We need to check you in personally, so if we agree you're arriving between 4 and 5 pm can you please do that unless you've hit murderous traffic or your airline was delayed which we totally understand. We do make special arrangements to greet you so please respect that we have other things to attend to and our staff ha
properties.host_about: I am a chef, author, restaurateur and philanthropist, and I arrived in Los Angeles from Northern Ireland in 1975, to begin my career in the culinary industry.  My  culinary expertise encompasses an international diversity including Indian, Chinese, Mexican, Japanese, French and, of course, Contemporary California and Irish. I have been featured in the L.A. Times, Fine Cooking Magazine, and Bon Appetit Magazine named (URL HIDDEN) of the top six chefs in the United States”. Today, I own two  distinctively different restaurants on Main Street in Santa Monica,California: Lula Cocina Mexicana, a bold, bright and colorful cantina famous for its murals painted by artist Eloy Torrez, and Signature Lula Margaritas;and Finn McCool's Irish Pub, boasting a beautiful bar shipped painstakingly over from Ireland through the Panama (URL HIDDEN) 1995, I  built my dream home, Rancho Chiquita, nestled high in the Malibu Mountains.  Rancho Chiquita overlooks a spectacular panoramic ocean view and 250 acres of rolling hills, and is host to many Charity Fundraising Events, Weddings , Private Cooking Classes , and Film and Movie Shoots. I am an avid advocate on behalf of the protection and rehabilitation of animals, and I share my home with a multitude of Rescue Dogs.

properties.name: Spectacular Malibu Beach Front
properties.summary: Located on World Famous Carbon Beach 'Billionaire's Beach'! Luxury condo with huge Ocean Front deck! Top of the line everything... Steam Shower, Big Screen TV's, Pool, Ocean Views, and SAND! Walk to bars, restaurants, shops. As good as it gets!
properties.space: Welcome to Paradise! Spectacular, spacious condo features a large living room which includes a 60″ TV, Cozy Fireplace, and opens out on to the ENORMOUS deck with Ocean Views, Views, Views! Hardwood floors throughout. THE LIVING ROOM FEATURES A BEAUTIFUL CURTAIN WHICH WHEN CLOSED CREATES THE PRIVATE 2ND BEDROOM WITH IT'S OWN BATHROOM AND CLOSET! Fully stocked kitchen with top of the line Stainless Steel appliances. The kitchen opens out to a large dinning table. The Master bedroom features a King Size bed, 42" TV, and a Luxury bathroom including a huge steam shower multiple shower heads - perfect after a dip in the Ocean! The guest bathroom is equally nice with a giant Japanese sunken tub and rain shower. Washer/Dryer in the unit. One garage parking space included.

properties.neighborhood_overview: Location simply does not get better anywhere in the world…. enjoy a walk along Billionaire’s beach, maybe catch a few waves, followed by a dip in the pool. Walking distance to the Malibu Pier and tons of bars, restaurants and shops, including Nobu, Malibu Inn, and everything Malibu Country Mart has to offer. Awesome PC Greens grocery store across the street. Minutes to World Famous hot spots like Dukes, Moonshadows, Mastro's, the Getty Villa and more. Pacific Palisades and Santa Monica a spectacular 15 minute drive away.
properties.notes: Top of line high thread count sheets. Lots of fresh clean white towels. High end products in the bathrooms. Free Wi-Fi, Netflix and Hulu (no cable TV - this is vacation!). Beach chairs, cooler, towels included! Everything you need for an amazing stay.
properties.transit: Uber!
properties.access: Lovely ocean front pool, poolside BBQ's, and most importantly... THE BEACH!!
properties.interaction: Text or call anytime during your stay.
properties.house_rules: This is a serene, quiet complex. Only registered guests, absolutely no parties allowed.  *After booking, please email or text me your email address. We will email you detailed instructions and the short term stay agreement. All adults are required to sign the agreement and provide a copy of ID. No exceptions. *Fines may be issued for noise violations or any HOA fines. *Only the registered guest(s) are allowed to stay in the unit. Any additional guests at the unit will be charged an additional 150/night. *250 fee per missing key/fob/remote. *There is a charge for late check-out's.

properties.host_about:
Hello, we offer the premier Malibu beach lifestyle!

Our units are equipped with complimentary wifi, flat screen televisions, and full kitchens with utensils. With rare direct beach access from our property, a quiet rustic setting with ocean views, and high end comfort, you will get the full Malibu experience.

So come on over and stay with us as we offer the ideal bungalow beach life!

properties.name: Spring Special blooms on the Sunny Sands of Malibu
properties.summary: Enjoy our beach front villa on the sunny, warm sands of Malibu Beach. You’ll love my place because of the amazing privacy, location/location/location right on the sand ,views from walls of windows, a spacious Master Suite with closet space galore, flat-screen TV, a boudoir with double sinks and showers and the kitchen with hand-carved teak cabinets imported from the Orient.  My property is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, and families (with kids). But not dogs or smokers!
properties.space: Our Zen Malibu beach house with its Japanese garden, koi ponds and 60' oceanfront deck is peaceful and exciting, both at once.

properties.host_about: Crashing waves and hand-carved teak. both Japanese and succulent gardens make our Malibu Beach house so unique that we love to vacation there ourselves!

properties.name: Amazing Panoramic Ocean Views by the Beach.
properties.summary: Cozy 2 bedroom, 2 bath, + office on top floor of duplex, complete with fireplace, outdoor deck and incredible panoramic views of the beach. Enjoy Malibu living with easy beach access across the street and shopping centers close by. Feeling adventurous? Check out some of the hiking trails nearby. Rent a surfboard or paddle board down the street and hit the water. Tired after a long day of fun? Relax on the deck watching the sunset or cozy up by the fireplace and watch a movie.

properties.name: Malibu ocean front beach paradise
properties.summary: One bedroom apt literally on the beach in Malibu. Airy and very private. Rare end unit with empty lot to one side. Close to town but feels a million miles away.
properties.space: One bedroom apartment at/on the beach with great privacy and space. Very rare end unit with empty lot on one side giving 270* views. There is a very private outside 20x15 ocean view deck with a full awning. Relax on the huge outdoor bed and enjoy unparalleled views of the Pacific ocean, Santa Monica bay, and Catalina Island. Daily dolphin shows and occasionally whales. At night curl up in a warm blanket and enjoy the famous "queen's necklace" view as the city comes to light. All the while listening to the calming sound of the ocean. There is always something going on out there to enjoy. Private steps down to the beach for a closer look, walks or watersports.    Inside is very nicely equipped with a modern fit and finish throughout. It has a full service kitchen with electric range/oven, fridge freezer, microwave, coffee maker, toaster,and kettle. Full size double bed for two. Large closet/wardrobe in the bedroom. Office desk with PC monitor and speakers at the beautiful picture window

properties.interaction: I usually meet and greet on arrival and am close by for anything that may come up but nothing has yet.
properties.house_rules: This is my own personal apartment so please treat it as you would your own home. Mainly please respect my neighbors who work so no parties/noise or loud music. This a place to relax and be mellow. Looking for mature responsible adults like myself. Sorry no pets or children. No smoking inside but on the deck is fine. Please do not park in or block any other parking spaces as they are all in use. Other than that just enjoy the beach and leave it as you found it.
properties.host_about: vw

properties.name: Malibu Mid-Century Modern Moroccan Home Near Beach
properties.summary: Recently remodeled by owner/designer, this mid-century modern home is located in western Malibu and a very short walk or even shorter electric cart ride to a private beach club. It is true to its mid-century modern design but mixed with farm house rustic elements and Moroccan interior finishes.  The cooks kitchen was designed as a gathering place with a huge island and Viking range. This house is great for couples or families with older children.  The home is available for monthly rentals only.
properties.space: The space was originally built in 1964 and owned by a famous scientist.  We purchased the home a couple of years ago with the vision of creating a light and open modern space, but with wood/farmhouse elements to soften the feeling.  The house has Belgian oak floors and several of the chandeliers and rugs are from Morocco.  The house is a single story and includes an office and a laundry room with a washer and dryer.   There is an A/V system in the house for television and music and an intercom system at the front door.

properties.neighborhood_overview: The home is located in one of the last true neighborhoods in Malibu.  It is a very friendly area and all of the neighbors are good friends of ours.  It is probably the only neighborhood in Malibu that you can walk to a market.  There is amazing beaches, surfing and hiking nearby!
properties.notes: The trash is picked up on Friday's and we can arrange weekly cleaners for the house if you like.
properties.transit: As with all of Malibu, it is best if you have a car.  But unique to this neighborhood is that you can walk to the local shopping center and beach.
properties.access: The entire house will be open to you, with the exception of one closet.  This includes our electric cart so you can drive to the beach and the local market and restaurant nearby.
properties.interaction: Either one of us or a close friend will be available as needed for help with anything. One of us will meet you to check in and make sure you are comfortable and settled in if you choose.
properties.house_rules: - Please be respectful of our neighbors and friends by keeping the noise down after 10pm
properties.host_about: We love to travel and eat good healthy food and all outdoor activities. We love our home but renting it out allows us to pursue our travels while providing a great place in Malibu for people to stay. We finished an extensive renovation in May 2016 and we hope you enjoy our home as much as we do. We rented our condo in Mammoth for many years, so we know what people want when they rent a house.  It means a lot to us to be great hosts!  We have stayed in wonderful places around the world that we rented on Airbnb and think its a great way to experience new places in a unique way.

properties.name: Malibu Airstream Adventure
properties.summary: My place is close to beaches in Malibu, State Parks, and hooks into the Backbone trail up Corral Canyon . Great for couples, solo adventurers, surfers and families with small children.  The camper is located on a private home's driveway and is amidst the Santa Monica Mountains.  The camper can fit two adults and two children max that are 5 or under.  There are 2 beds-one smaller than a queen and a table/bed coversion for 2 children max 5 or under.   There is parking on premises & outdoor shower.

properties.name: Waterman's Paradise Beach Home
properties.summary: 2 story ocean front home on a private sandy beach.  A large deck perfect for outdoor dining or lounging while looking for whales, dolphins and seals.  Beach wanders, swimming, SUP, tidepools, sunsets and sunrises, fish off your own deck and even surf in your front yard.
properties.space: Our home is a 2 story duplex and we are offering the lower level apartment on the water with a private 500 sq ft deck.  My family lives upstairs and there are part time occupants in the smaller, separate ocean level apartment on the east side of the home.  There is a communal walkway from PCH down to your space as well as to the stairs leading to the sand and a private beach.  The beach has dry sand but can be wet at the highest tides after big ocean swells. Like any Malibu beach house we are affected by the salt air leaving some visible rust and wear.  If you prefer the  sterile appointments of a hotel our place may not be for you.  If you want a beachy Malibu feel this is your spot. A kayak,  2 SUP's, 2 surfboards, numerous boogie boards and a BBQ are available for use.  I can set up a fishing rod or 2 if you are interested. The master bedroom has a queen bed while the 2nd bedroom is designed for a child with a single bed.  The bathroom has a shower and a 6 jet jacuzzi tub.  There is

properties.neighborhood_overview: Duke's Hawaiian restaurant is a 10 minute walk, Cholada Thai is the best on the Westside, Nobu is spectacular sushi, The Farm at the end of the Malibu Pier is a must spot for breakfast or lunch and Tramonto delivers delicious Italian food.  D'Amore's delivers the best NY style pizza.  Malibu's City center is great for browsing while Santa Monica's 3rd Street Promenade and the Venice Boardwalk offer exceptional shopping.
properties.transit: Rent a car or simply travel by Uber.  There is also a bus stop near Duke's restaurant.
properties.access: The 500 square foot deck in front of the apartment is all yours.  The private beach is great for wandering with a cup of tea or glass of wine.  You will meet lots of friendly neighbors if you desire.
properties.interaction: When I am not on the beach or in the water, I will be upstairs most of the time with my 11 year old daughter, my mother and our 2 friendly dogs.  You will certainly have your privacy but each of us can answer questions and offer recommendations.
properties.house_rules: Check in is after 3PM and check out is 11AM. Please no pets and no smoking on the premises. This is a family home so no parties, but up to 4 daytime guests are OK.  No more than 3 people total can stay overnight in the apartment. You are welcome to use the kayak, the SUP's, the surfboards and boogie boards but you are responsible for any damaged or lost items. We are on a septic system so toilet paper is the only thing that can be flushed.  No feminine hygiene products down the plumbing, please.
properties.host_about: Lifelong Malibu resident, surfer, SUP, diver, fisherman, waterman, coach, married, and father of an 11 year old girl.

properties.notes: We allow our guests to host parties at our home only with prior permission and with an increased security deposit. Any guests that allows additional people to our home or property, not agreed upon at the time of booking, will automatically forfeit their security deposit. Any guests that bring pets into our home or allow them on our property without prior permission also will forfeit their security deposit  We ask for a 5 day minimum stay during peak holiday vacation weeks and during the summer months.
properties.transit: There is no public transportation readily available beyond local cab and uber service.
properties.access: Guests have access to the main house. We have a home office with a private entrance and if we are in town we will access on occasion. It is separate from the house. We also keep our cats in this area during guest stays and stop in to visit and feed them once or twice a day.
properties.interaction: We are available by phone or text at all times to assist our guests with any need that they may have but give them them complete privacy during their stay.
properties.house_rules: Absolutely NO SMOKING inside of the house. We do have a porch where we allow smoking. We do not allow pets. We do not allow parties without prior approval. Check in is 3:00 PM and check out is 1:00 PM though we can often be flexible. Any unauthorized parties, overnight house guests beyond those disclosed at time of booking or pets on property will forfeit guests security deposit in full.
properties.host_about: In a word or two....we are empty nesters. Patty is a Malibu Coldwell Banker Realtor and Shachar is a local contractor and builder. We have put our hearts into the remodeling, design and decorating of our home and feel that it is now the right time to share some of that love with others. We look forward to meeting you!

properties.name: Sweeping Ocean Views-Prime Location
properties.summary: Lease the Life! Live the Life! Experience the Life at Casa de la Nueva Vida! (It’s the house of new life!)  You will feel comfortable with the modern, upgraded, open floor plan, vaulted ceilings, hardwood floors, picturesque views from large  windows in every room to see the sweeping-ocean & mt views. Home for families and friends to lease for private usage, fully stocked home! I take pride in the cleanliness and hire a professional housekeeper who cleans it thoroughly after each guests depart!
properties.space: Beverly's Retreat Though I am at Beverly's in the hills, I sit barely fearing any Revenant. But feeling more like a Martian isolated between Jupiter and a neighboring planet. Where stars out here need no red carpet, For the never ending cobalt blue and African ebony Tarmac, Was intentionally and purposefully out laid, Way before the golden Oscar even had a name. Spotlights flashing with their own paparazzi and bocce games not played by the nouveau riche, Driving comfortably in their dollar green Bentley Corniche. Fully suspended hugging roads like distant lands with plenty fodder. Grasping hands over a glass of fountain ocean mineral water. Causing commotion with the notion, That our outstretched tree palms need calamine lotion. From the chafing of worker bees sand papering the Rock to christen every room, And give it a clean sweep with a state of the art Roomba whiskbroom. Swept away fast with a Furious flurry might, Let Max Mad walk with Fury way beyond an 8 count of stage fright. Fo

properties.notes: Only guests on the reservation are allowed to stay over night!  Guests may have visitors during the day, but, only six guests allowed to spend the night. Guests booking this home are required to be 30 years or older.
properties.access: The guests will be leasing the entire home for complete privacy and complete access to a fully equipped home. This is a home, not just a vacation rental, so it has all the niceties and comforts of a true home. It will be YOUR home away from home!
properties.interaction: You will be utilizing this home by yourselves. I will not be living nearby or available to assist. I am always available by phone and text if there are issues and questions. You have full privacy and full use of the home.
properties.house_rules: This home is for vacationers and those looking to enjoy Malibu. This home is not suitable for parties or large crowds.  It is suitable for families and friends to create memories.
properties.host_about:
As a described Host extraordinaire, I am pleased to have hosted over 150 traveling groups creating lasting memories at my home!! From these vacationers, I have a super collection of trinkets and items brought to me from their different cities and states. If you visit my home, I would be pleased if you would enjoy adding a trinket from your area to my wonderfully unique collection. I like small trinkets that have your city engraved on them, leaving a small part of you with me forever!!

My friends would describe me as committed loyal friend, a stellar and visionary businesswoman, and an elegant, gracious hostess –For 30 years I have enjoyed entertaining my family and friends as I love to cook and host others. I have a wonderful collection of serving pieces and items for guests to use in my stocked kitchen.  I love to host birthday parties for each of my friends and just share some wine and celebrate the gift of life and share some laughter.  My motto, “Live, Laugh, Love” is on a plaque that adorns my wall. (However, as YOUR host, I am NEVER at home during your visit, I prefer to offer you complete privacy!)

As your host I look forward to sharing my piece of paradise that overflows with blue and tranquil ocean views, where you will breathe fresh air, smell my wonderful flowers, and just live a luxurious lifestyle as one of my prized travelers. My home is named “Casa de la Nueva Vida” The house of new life!  It earned that name because all that enters my doors get a new outlook on life and a refreshed feeling as you will overlook a spectacular panoramic ocean view and hundreds of acres of rolling hills. National parkland is directly below my home, where you will be thrilled to hike the many trails and see the real beauty of nature just minutes from my home.

I am in tuned to health & fitness, reading labels before purchasing or eat foods, visiting the gym or hiking the Malibu hills or strolling the beaches. I try to be a minimalist without clutter in my home, so I am described as very neat, organized, multi- tasker who manages to get 26 hours out of my day!

In California and Missouri, I am a licensed real estate broker and I operate and manage firms in both cities, which keep me traveling back and forth to service all of my various client needs. It gives me a great pleasure to specialize in marketing and selling the luxury living lifestyle in Malibu for the past 25 years. My greatest pleasure is to help buyers live their dream and sellers to sell to move on with their dreams.  Whether you are looking to lease temporarily or buy, I am ready to help you in Malibu with my team of Realtors at Seabreeze Estates Realty.

My Life motto is "Delay is NOT Denial" and I live a "Life by Design", I don't postpone, I am action oriented and I work hard at creating my own destiny.

properties.neighborhood_overview: Nature everywhere, nice and peaceful. There is a full supermarket 5 minutes away by car (or 15 minutes if you like to walk). There are half a dozen restaurants close by: Mexican, Japanese, Italian, and American cuisines are all featured, as well as takeout Pizza, Subway and Starbucks.
properties.notes: The closest beaches are 2 miles (3 km) away; close enough for easy access, far enough for privacy and calm. For kids, and kids-at-heart, there is the Santa Monica pier, about 20 miles away, with Ferris Wheel and Rollercoasters. There is also an aquarium, trapeze school, historic carousel as well as lots of restaurants. It is a quintessential Southern California experience. World-famous Venice Beach is just 3 miles (5km) south of the pier. For those who enjoy walking, there is a path on the beach for the trek.
properties.transit: Parking is no problem.  There is a bus (line 534) that runs from Malibu to Santa Monica, about 25 per day, 6am - 9pm, with about 20 per day on Sunday, 7am - 9pm. The closest bus stop is about 10 minutes from the studio. From Santa Monica, there is public transportation to virtually any point in the Los Angeles Metropolitan area.
properties.access: The studio has a private entrance, terrace and BBQ. Relax in one of the lounge chairs and absorb the beautiful sunsets (particularly stunning in the winter). New queen bed; very comfortable.
properties.interaction: We are able to provide local information about hiking trails, nice jogging paths, best beaches to visit, etc. Close to Zuma Beach and Pepperdine University. Visit the Getty Villa museum and Adamson House, the first home in Malibu. We speak English and French.
properties.house_rules: Property is located in a gated community. There is an outdoor private BBQ and sink. Inside the studio there is a microwave, mini-refrigerator, and hot water for coffee/tea.  However there is no proper kitchen/cooking area and as such is not suitable for extended stays. There are at least 7 restaurants and a supermarket, as well as Subway and takeout Pizza within a 30-minute walk (the closest a 10-minute walk); all less than 5 minutes by car.

properties.name: Malibu Beachfront Apt/Villa
properties.summary: Stunning beachfront villa.  Isolated 1 BR over the pacific ocean in South Malibu; don't be deceived by very far north bookings. See seals, dolphins, even whales from our deck with tide pools & private beach below.  Enjoy Malibu; adj to Santa Monica.
