properties.house_rules: This is a beautiful oasis that sits on the water and allows you to fully absorb each sunrise and sunset.  It is a very respectful, private comnunity perfect for a couple seeking a romantic getaway or the writer/musician/artist seeking peace and inspiration.  Namaste.
properties.host_about: My life motto is to 'find peace wherever you may be...'...And that journey begins from within. I enjoy traveling, yoga, family, and diving deeper into my spiritual roots.  I hope you can partner with the ocean here and enjoy this important slice of paradise while you enjoy your true self as well.  Unwind, Unravel, Understand.

properties.name: BOHEMIAN BEACH HOUSE
properties.summary: Newly remodeled, picturesque, spacious, comfy and very private home nestled into the hillside of the very beautiful, cute and exclusive Malibu West neighborhood. Walking distance and access to private Malibu West Beach Club, Vintage Market, beaches, hiking, parks and shopping. Close to wineries and everything Malibu has to offer.
properties.space: Step inside this spacious, 2 story, almost 3500 sq. ft. home to find a welcoming entree way with moroccan chandelier. The kitchen, to your right, offers LG studio series professional stainless steel appliances including a 5 burner cooktop, double oven, dishwasher, large built in refrigerator/freezer and under-counter beverage center. Caesar stone waterfall island countertop and custom made sink with unlacquered brass fixtures and hardware. Open floor plan leads into comfy living space and dining room area. Living room has a fireplace, expansive mountain views and grand piano. Also downstairs is a kids playroom, office, laundry room and guest bath with shower.  All doors lead to a 2000 sq. ft. wrap around deck and patio with 20' rustic table and huge 10 person spa. Back yard has artificial turf lawn, huge kids clubhouse with tube slide and swings as well as a trampoline.  Upstairs are the bedrooms. Master bedroom has king size Tempurpedic mattress. Master bathroom includes double sinks,

Walking distance and access to private Malibu West Beach Club, Vintage Market, beaches, hiking, parks and shopping. Close to wineries and everything Malibu has to offer. Living room has a fireplace, expansive mountain views and grand piano. Also downstairs is a kids playroom, office, laundry room and guest bath with shower.
properties.notes: Access to private Malibu West Beach Club. Drive up to the sand or just walk! Located in between the world famous Zuma Beach and star studded Broad Beach.
properties.house_rules: Please treat us, our home and neighborhood with respect.  No parties. No more than the agreed amount of people at the house at any time. No loud music or noise. No smoking. No pets. Respect your neighbors. Try to conserve energy and water by turning off lights and keeping baths and showers short and sweet. Please keep the house clean and organized...leave the sand at the beach and out of the house as much as possible. Most importantly, enjoy, relax, get inspired, rejuvenated and have a good ol' time.

properties.name: Intimate Malibu retreat in Artist's home.
properties.summary: Sunny little one room guesthouse.  Large outdoor shower, outdoor kitchen, pool, jacuzzi, ocean and mountain views, a .5 bathroom in main house.  Minutes from beaches or take a hike right from your doorstep. Great for a couple's romantic get away.
properties.space: This tiny house comes complete with stunning ocean and canyon views. It is perched at the edge of a canyon and is perfect for nature lovers. Wake up to the sounds of birds, parrots and horses. It has a queen sized bed with down comforter and lots of pillows. There is a small table for eating or working on your laptop.(We have wifi.) In the tiny house are also a mini fridge, microwave, and Keurig coffee maker. We will provide coffee tea and all the fixens'. There is a flat screen TV were you can watch Netflix etc. The structure is older so it does show some signs of aging. breakfast (included) Please let us know at check in if you would like Our home is not suitable for pets or children.

Guests are welcome to access the bathroom in the main hou
properties.neighborhood_overview: By car, are are just minutes  from the nearest beaches. The Santa Monica mountains also offer myriad of hiking and biking options as well as world class wineries. There are several  wine tour operators to show you around. Car and Motor cycle enthusiast will love driving the winding mountain roads and the famous Mullholand highway. We have many dinning options nearby. Malibu Colony is just a few miles up the road where you can pass the day shopping and star gazing. Pepperdine University, the Getty Museum and the MASH filming site are local destinations.
properties.notes: We share a driveway with 2 other homes. When you arrive, our neighbor's dogs might run up to great you. They are extremely friendly! We also have two small, sweet Pomeranian's. Please be mindful when entering or leaving through the gates to close them. Often it sounds like they closed but the latch may not go down so a visual check is best. We are in the wilderness so do not be surprised if you catch a glimpse of deer, coyote, or even bobcats!
properties.transit: We are one mile up from PCH. At the bottom of the hill is a metro stop that takes you in to Santa Monica or Malibu
properties.access: Guests are welcome to access the bathroom in the main house at any time. The outdoor kitchen pool and shower are available from 8 am to 8 pm. You can use the Jacuzzi until 10 pm, but we do ask that you keep your voices down. ( We are happy to show you how to turn it on and off.) The outdoor lights go out at 10 pm. The indoor kitchen is available for light cooking. Please let us know that you will be needing it. We also provide pool towels and have yard games and table top games if you choose to hang out here. Are you an aerialists? You can play on our silks or lyra!
properties.interaction: We are available to assist our guests with any questions, recommendations. The tiny house is private space but we do share the outdoor living spaces and indoor kitchen/ bathroom. We are as social or private as you wish. If you are celebrating a special occasion and would like champagne or something in the room upon arrival, we can try to accommodate that but an additional fee will be applied depending on what it is you are asking for.
properties.house_rules: - Quite 8am-8pm - Kitchen 8am-5pm - Outdoor Kitchen 7am-7pm
properties.host_about: I am Marston Smith, a cellist, sculptor, and filmmaker and Heidi is a Special Ed teacher at Malibu High. We love NETFLIX, traveling to European medieval cities and the Game of Thrones.

properties.name: Malibu Safari Chic Tent
properties.summary: Luxuriate in safari romance in this secluded African-style 'Out Of Malibu' canvas tent with en-suite bath and sun-warmed shower.Nestled into a canyon, you'll enjoy total privacy and panoramic views of pure nature surrounded by native wildlife.  If your requested dates aren't available, check our "Malibu Yurt Retreat on Organic Farm", "our OCEANVIEW reTREAT on Malibu Farm" or our Tiny Japanese Tea House soon opening.
properties.space: This brand new safari tent with a modern en suite bathroom has been designed by Bibi Jordan, host and award-winning author/designer of the interior design/travel coffee table book SAFARI CHIC. The Safari Tent has a small room heater and a heated blanket, but in Dec, Jan, Feb and March temperatures may dip at night and/or day, so please dress in layers and bring slippers/cosy socks (no shoes on the soft bamboo floor please) and a robe for your comfort. A word of caution though, if you are the type of person who might suffer from Mobiphobia (fear of mobile connection loss) and need a constant uninterrupted internet fix, then perhaps this is not the right setting for you as the Safari Chic Tent is a WiFi-Free Zone.  A WiFi connection is available a short walk away at our pool area, but not at the Tent site itself.  We feel that unplugging from the constant buzz of modern life is the very essence of staying at this calmed and peaceful site.  In this rustic retreat, you’ll enjoy the tranqui
properties.description: Luxuriate in safari romance in this secluded African-style 'Out Of Malibu' canvas tent with en-suite bath and sun-warmed shower.Nestled into a canyon, you'll enjoy total privacy and panoramic views of pure nature surrounded by native wildlife.  If your requested dates aren't available, check our "Malibu Yurt Retreat on Organic Farm", "our OCEANVIEW reTREAT on Malibu Farm" or our Tiny Japanese Tea House soon opening. This brand new safari tent with a modern en suite bathroom has been designed by Bibi Jordan, host and award-winning author/designer of the interior design/travel coffee table book SAFARI CHIC. The Safari Tent has a small room heater and a heated blanket, but in Dec, Jan, Feb and March temperatures may dip at night and/or day, so please dress in layers and bring slippers/cosy socks (no shoes on the soft bamboo floor please) and a robe for your comfort. A word of caution though, if you are the type of person who might suffer from Mobiphobia (fear of mobile connection loss) an
properties.neighborhood_overview: We are just 2 miles up the canyon from Malibu's most beautiful beaches, best surf spots, and wine-testing places.  We are surrounded 180 degrees by the Santa Monica Mountain State Park with few neighbors and can offer the peace and tranquility of pure nature.
properties.notes: Malibu Safari Chic is a special experience for a special type of guest.  Luxurious as it is, remember it is a tent!  Be prepared to hear the wind in the trees and sometimes the canvas flapping.  At night, you're likely to hear the owls and the nightingale.   The dogs may sleep nearby and will bark if raccoons are in the area.   So if you are a very light sleeper, bring some ear plugs. The tent is accessed from the parking area along a path cut into the hillside that includes about 38 steps so please carry only an overnight bag.  Big suitcases can be left in your car in our secure parking area. The bathroom is just a few steps behind the tent attached to the tent platform. With a flushing toilet and hot/cold water, it is simple but modern and there is a private outdoor shower. To get the full 'safari experience', guests should order our special 'safari' breakfasts and dinners.  This provides the total relaxation, luxurious service and into-nature experience of an African safari. The ten
properties.transit: Bus number 534 comes from Santa Monica to Trancas in Malibu, but you will need to arrange transport with hosts.  A car is REALLY necessary to get full enjoyment of the surroundings.
properties.access: Guests will enjoy access to the swimming pool filled with natural mineral water warmed by the Malibu sun.  The pool area is technically a bonus area and not officially part of the Airbnb reservation, however, feel free to utilize the area along with other guests. Many guests choose to enjoy the organic home-cooked meals that have made this organically-certified Meyer Lemon orchard so popular with locals and travelers.
properties.interaction: We cater to our guests needs!  Let us know if you would prefer total privacy or if you'd like to interact with hosts and other guests over our home-cooked organic meals.  We are always open to suggest hints and tips for making your stay perfect!
properties.house_rules: * No small children and no dogs. * No smoking except in designated areas. * Please keep your voices down... this is a 'quiet zone'.   * No drop-in guests without prior permission. * No shoes in the Tent. * No food in the Tent area - use pool area instead. * Leave Tent as you found it - follow check list for clean-up at check-out. WiFi is available at our pool area.  Bring only an overnight bag into the tent. Leave your big suitcases in the car. No food in the tent. Use the pool area's picnic tables, refrigerator, microwave, and BBQ  Enjoy the outdoor solar water heated shower in the afternoon or at dusk times when  it is the hottest temperature   Or, use the hot water outdoor shower by the pool.
properties.host_about: WE EMBRACE DIVERSITY!  I'm an author/photographer by profession, but a traveler by vocation ... that's why I'm running an AirBnB... because even when I'm not traveling, I'm always on a journey!  I love learning languages and speak Spanish, Portuguese and French with a smattering of Japanese and Arabic.  Bruce is a Director of Photography specializing in 3D films.  But, we both share a passion for organic gardening.  Besides our orchard of 100 Meyer Lemons, we grow organic vegetables and herbs.  We both love sharing recipes and conversation with friends, new and old, from around the world ... as well as favorite travel tales, books, and music.

properties.name: The Dolphin Octagon
properties.summary: Free-Standing Octagon House ~ nestled up Decker Canyon in the hills just above Malibu!  A peaceful, private retreat space with a large  mountain viewing deck. Surrounded by nature, and the birds ~ golden light in the late afternoon plus star-gazing & moon watching at night!
properties.space: Peaceful, private bohemian - chic rustic space!  A magical environment designed for enjoying the nature, meditating, yoga on the deck, hiking, surfing, wine tasting, relaxing or simply just "being" .. you will be embraced by the mountains and blanketed by the stars! However, if you are seeking activity ~ there are many great wine tasting rooms & cool, hip restaurants nearby ~ The Sunset Restaurant, Malibu Wines, The M Cafe, The Old Place and The Cornell Winery are some of our favorites! For a super affordable "Happy Hour" you can drive down to Westward Beach and check out the Sunset Restaurant ~ A Malibu Local Favorite :) Vintage Market, Zuma Sushi, Spruzzo's Restaurant ~ Sunlife ~ Acai bowls, fresh soups etc.. Duck and Dive for great food and music are all located nearby between Zuma Beach and Point Dume ~about a 15 minue drive. PS ~ The second bedroom is a "Sleeping Loft" with a Queen-size bed~ it's like sleeping in a Tree House :)
properties.description: Free-Standing Octagon House ~ nestled up Decker Canyon in the hills just above Malibu!  A peaceful, private retreat space with a large  mountain viewing deck. properties.neighborhood_overview: Malibu beaches, Malibu Wine Region, hiking trails, biking (there is a bike path along the Pacific Coast Highway, Vintage Grocers, shops and restaurants across from Zuma Beach ..about a 15 min drive.. RESTAURANTS in the area. -Ollie’s Duck and Dive- good vibes, live music on some weekends.  -The Farm on Malibu Pier- Organic deliciousness located on the end of Malibu Pier, on the water. Must go, see, eat and drink. -The Sunset- Awesome happy hour and beautiful beach setting. Make sure to go in time to catch the Sunset. Or fine dining upstairs.  -The Old Place- Rustic, Cowboy, Hipster, Coolness. Artists, Musicians, Models, Actors and one darn eccentric crowd love this hidden gem. Located about 20 minutes away in the middle of the Malibu Mountains/Wine Country. Make reservations. Books up fast and is very small and intimate. -The Malibu Cafe- Huge, beautiful, rustic outdoor setting. Located in the Malibu Mountains/Wine Country. Lake, ducks, peddle boats, amazing for Brunch, drinks and chil
properties.notes: As we are in a High Fire Area please use caution when lighting candles, wood stove etc. There is no central heat in the main area so when it is cold you will need to light a fire in the wood stove. There is a wall heater in the Master Bedroom. The loft bedroom now has a queen size bed! The property is on a Septic System ~ No Tampons in Toilet ~ Light Toilet Paper Please! Country Septic :)
properties.transit: You will need a car. There is no public transportation but you can always check with Uber.
properties.access: The entire Dolphin Octagon is available for our guests use only ~ 4 person Max ~ No visitors please! The drought has affected many of our fruit trees :(  and as we are on a "well watering system"  please be conscious of your water usage ~ thanks!
properties.interaction: Kathleen is available by cell (PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN) to answer any questions and make the arrangement for you to pick up the keys.  Other recommendations surf lessons, massage, private chef, horseback riding etc. Emergency # Nina ~ (PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN) / Sara ~ (PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN)
properties.house_rules: It is a shared property so please respect the peaceful environment.  No children between 1-12 ~ Infants may be allowed ~ No pets ~ absolutely No parties ~ No smoking inside the house  ~No visitors ~When accessing the Octagon please only drive up to the (2) parking spaces provided at the red stair railings and not around the entire property... so as not to disturb the other occupants.
properties.host_about: single, professional, mother of 4 ~ kids are all grown now ~ grandmother of 3 ~ originally from brooklyn new york, I've been living, working and playing in the Malibu area since 1976. The things that are most important to me are family & friends, and a peaceful heart* I'm a photographer, stylist, globe trotter, foodie, I love nature, the ocean, beaches, dancing and music. Life motto: 'To enjoy every day as much as I possibly can".  I love the idea of being a part of the new "shared economy life style". This whole concept really excites me :) I can't wait to meet my new guests!

properties.name: Malibu Architectural - Sea and Sky
properties.summary: This house is all about the ocean & canyon, with expansive ocean views from every room in the house. Modern and fun with wall sized windows that open to decks and outdoor spaces, creating the ultimate indoor/outdoor living & entertaining environment.
properties.space: This is truly a special retreat. As you drive up the canyon you enter into gorgeous landscape of natural beauty that can only be found in the hills of Malibu. The House rests upon a large piece of property with amazing mountain, ocean views and starscapes that can only be experienced from this height. The house is surrounded by indigenous chaparral vegetation and wildlife including sage, wild flowers, fruit trees, lavender, hawks, deer and bunnies! It is also surrounded by park land which gives the property privacy and peace. It is a retreat from the wilds of the world and yet it is still only a 10 minute drive to downtown Malibu.  The house is a cutting edge piece of Architecture designed by Don Dimster, a well renowned American architect. This is a gorgeous brand new house that is all about the ocean and canyon views, with expansive ocean views from every room in the house. It is a contemporary house with huge wall sized windows that open to decks and outdoor spaces, creating the ult
properties.description: This house is all about the ocean & canyon, with expansive ocean views from every room in the house. Modern and fun with wall sized windows that open to decks and outdoor spaces, creating the ultimate indoor/outdoor living & entertaining environment. This is truly a special retreat. As you drive up the canyon you enter into gorgeous landscape of natural beauty that can only be found in the hills of Malibu. The House rests upon a large piece of property with amazing mountain, ocean views and starscapes that can only be experienced from this height. The house is surrounded by indigenous chaparral vegetation and wildlife including sage, wild flowers, fruit trees, lavender, hawks, deer and bunnies! It is also surrounded by park land which gives the property privacy and peace. It is a retreat from the wilds of the world and yet it is still only a 10 minute drive to downtown Malibu.  The house is a cutting edge piece of Architecture designed by Don Dimster, a well renowned American architect
properties.neighborhood_overview: The gorgeous Malibu Beaches, shopping and restaurants are all near by including Nobu, Maestros, Geoffrey's and Mr. Chow. There is epic surfing 7 minutes away at the famous Malibu point "the birth place of so-cal surfing culture" also close to Zuma beach and the intensely gorgeous Matador Beach. The house is also located in the same canyon as the favorite solstice canyon waterfall hike which can be easily accessed from the house.  There is a lovely little community across the valley from the house that is reminiscent of the small hill towns of Italy.
properties.notes: Malibu is gem on the Pacific Ocean that can offer visitors almost any experience they desire. Privacy and relaxation as well as fun restaurants and bars. Sparkling beaches and gorgeous nature hikes with rugged terrains, caves and waterfalls. fine dining and roadhouse fare. Posh shopping spots and zen retreats. A bird and whale watchers dream spot. A place to find yourself, reconnect with a partner or party with your crew. There are many opportunities for surfing and fitness everywhere. Also a great farmers market every Sunday with a petting zoo and amazing local vendors. Nights are gorgeous in Malibu as it seems to be protected from the lights of the city and the skies are clear and full of shooting stars.
properties.transit: LA is notorious for being a driving city - and it holds true to it's reputation.  A car is pretty much a necessity here.  However Uber will come up to the house as well as the malibu local taxi service. And Malibu has an excellent delivery service (Malibu Delivery) that can deliver everything from sushi to surf boards.
properties.access: The whole house is for you to enjoy.  We just ask that we keep our music studio off limits.  Thanks!
properties.interaction: We have arranged for spa services to be available to you upon request from the best local practitioners: Personal Chef Massage Yoga  Personal Training Facials / Manicure/Pedicure Beauty and salon services Meditation and Life coaching Adventure guides Babysitters/Childcare Housekeeping we are available to help with anything that may come up and to assist in making your stay as comfortable and easy as possible.
properties.house_rules: Smoking only allowed in outdoor areas.  please use ashtrays or clean up after yourself.  We appreciate it if guests remove shoes in the house.  Also best to use plastic ware while dining outdoors as the decks are hard and break glass easily.

properties.name: CAMPOUT WITH AMAZING VIEWS
properties.summary: Campout on the large yard of the host's home. These views give one of the best camping experiences on the West Coast in Malibu, looking out the ocean while you arrive, sleep and wake up, hugged and surrounded by amazing mountains.  There are animals that come around. We sight coyotes and hawks the most. Bring your own tent and camping gear. We have an outdoor potty and potty tent that you can set up as well. Fires are not allowed in Malibu. We can provide you with a cooler if needed.

properties.host_about:
I Love to entertain and be a host. I have been a host and manage other listings for over 4 years and I LOVE IT!  - please click on my profile photo to see all my current listings … I am a real estate agent in CA and in Hawaii. Love being an entrepreneur… I  keep my home clean and organized at all times. Enjoy making my guests welcome and fell like at home. If my guests like to socialize, then this is your home away from home…. if my guest like privacy… this is your home away from home too… you can interact with me as much or little as you want to. I will always respect my guests.

One of the things I love about being a host is that most people check-in as guest and check-out as my friends!

properties.name: Sanctuary by the Sea
properties.summary: Private, gated Mediterranean 5,500 sq. ft. home on Point Dume in Malibu.  Featuring a gourmet cooks kitchen,  2 Master Suites and keys to a private beach. Peaceful retreat with stunning seasonal veggie garden and relaxing salt water pool and spa.
properties.space: Private, gated Mediterranean 5,500 square foot home in a premiere Point Dume location. This peaceful yet comfortable retreat features five bedrooms and keys to the private beach. The Master suite features a lounge area and private terrace overlooking manicured grassy lawns, a salt water pool and spa and a stunning seasonal veggie garden.  Each of the bedrooms features ensuite bathrooms and spacious walk-in closets. Tall ceilings throughout with beautiful natural lighting through custom glass doors and large windows. Located yards from several of Malibu's best beaches and hiking trails.

properties.name: Breathtaking Mountain Views
properties.summary: My place is close to Zuma beach and the  Valley . It has lots of family-friendly activities, restaurants, dining, and nightlife. You’ll love my place because of the ambiance, the outdoors space, the neighborhood, and the comfy beds. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, families and specially children. We are located in the heart of the Santa Monica Mountains between the Valley and the Beach side. We are 15' to the beach and 10' to Thousand Oaks and Conejo Valley.
properties.space: The apartment has a full 360 full view of the Santa Monica Mountains and Canyons. What it makes it unique besides the view,  is the atmosphere and the spacious apartment.

properties.host_about: I'm a  wife and mother of two beautiful boys. We lived on this property for more than 15 years now. I'm the kind of host that would go to any extent to make your stay a relaxing,  and an unforgettable stay.  I'm available 24-7 for my guests requests. I'm committed to make your stay enjoyable and stress free. We are an outdoor family . We like to surf, boggie board and we  enjoy the beach in summer and winter as well. My passion is cycling whether is mountain biking or road. My life motto is to enjoy every moment to the fullest. Be kind and thankful to others, because we don't know what other people are going thru.

properties.name: Ocean Front Private Vacation Rental at Duke's
properties.summary: Set in the heart of Malibu, located next to one of the most popular restaurants in Malibu, Duke's Malibu Restaurant, this vacation rental offers magnificent unobstructed views of the Pacific Ocean.  This newly remodeled 4 - bedroom 3-bath features a large ocean front deck.  The apartment is renovated with bright modern furnishings, hardwood floors, and amenities including a large fully-equipped kitchen, a mounted TV in the living room, washer & dryer & ample reserved parking for up to 4 cars.
properties.space: Its unbeatable location is just a stone’s throw to Duke's Malibu Restaurant, top-notch beaches, Pepperdine University, the famous Malibu Country Mart shopping center as well as Pacific Palisades and Santa Monica. Conveniences such as Ralph’s supermarket, CVS pharmacy, and the Malibu Racquet Club are also within a close proximity.

In addition to the main entertaining rooms of the home, there is a hidden screening room, and a wood paneled office. The acres of land are fully manicured with enormous lawns, 200 bush rose garden, and fresh water pool.

properties.name: Mini 'Castle' at Reel Kick Ranch!
properties.summary: 1/2 Mile to Ocean! The 'Castle' is a unique, rustic two level stone apt. Upstairs is equipped with a fridge/stove/sink and cozy living room. Through a trap door, down concrete stairs, find the cave-like bedroom and bathroom! (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN) at Reel Kick Ranch!
properties.space: An 11 acre 'Reel Kick Ranch' ranch, 1/2 mile to the PCH!  20 chickens share this magical space.  A seasonal creek flows through the property around huge oaks and eucalyptus trees.  The stone home keeps you cool as you have the best sleep of your life in a cave like apt! Stroll up the hill to our unobstructed ocean view picnic area. Write, play music, surf, beach, hike, Road Bike or just enjoy. All this serenity and beauty so close to everything Malibu has to offer! Reel Kick Ranch also offers the NEW 'Magical Guest House at Reel Kick Ranch' on airbnb. It is located on the same property check it out!

There is a ten min easy hike to our picnic table and hitching post overlooking th
properties.neighborhood_overview: Malibu, for us, is trails, hiking and riding! For others it is surfing, beaches and shopping! We are situated right in the middle of everything Malibu has to offer. No long winding drives. From the 'Castle', the beach is 1/2 mile drive or a 15 min walk to Latigo shores. World renown '1st point' Malibu pier beach is a ten minute drive and Zuma beach is a 15 min drive. We are between Solstice canyon and Escondido canyon parks and many others are only a short drive away! Latigo canyon road is also a famous motorcycle, road bike and driving canyon road. Be safe!
properties.notes: Internet is spotty in the castle. But works well in the communal BBQ area.  Verizon is the only carrier that works on the property- Classic Malibu!  No Cable - Tv with Dvds is supplied! There are chickens and ROOSTERS Coyotes noises Its a ranch - complete with barking dogs, crowing roosters and whinnying horses. We do our best to evict mice and spiders but they do live on our property!  If you enjoy nature and the outdoors close to Urban shopping you will LOVE us.
properties.transit: Car, Taxi, Uber or Simone can arrange a private driver.  Road Biking. Public transit bus 534 will take you to Santa Monica and down to Trancas.
properties.access: Explore scenic trails on our property. There is a ten min easy hike to our picnic table and hitching post overlooking the ocean. We welcome you to pop a cork and breath it all in! A lovely BBQ space, fire pit (when allowed), wifi (slow satellite wifi  so sometimes no downloading or streaming capabilities). The local pub Ollies Duck Dive welcomes your wifi needs!  Large TV with Dvd player and HDMI cable.  Colorful, fresh, organic, free-range eggs are supplied for your breakfast! Lawn, swing and hammock are yours to enjoy.
properties.interaction: Simone is our new Ranch Concierge! She can arrange any number of wonderful things from Driving, private dinners and wine tastings, Photographer, Picnics. All customized to suit your needs. Prices vary.
properties.house_rules: RESPECT nature is the #1 rule No Smoking  No Fires  No littering Conserve water No pets  Respect the unique personal possessions left for your homey enjoyment Be honest! If you did something bad just tell us so we can help fix it! Don't feed the animals - an oldie but goodie : )  Take your garbage to the bins and do your dishes before you go.  Noise down at 10 pm Don't open the chicken coop or let them out.  Make sure the toilet isn't running or using water in any unnecessary way.  We save water where we can so be a part of that!  DO have fun hiking and surfing and enjoying the dynamic of the special animals that live here and the amazingness that is MALIBU! Cant wait to meet you!
properties.host_about:
A Canadian who relocated to Malibu five years ago to live in the sun with horses, chickens and dogs! 

I love to Host and if you need any help, suggestions or have a special occasion that needs organizing. Im here to make it happen!

properties.name: Luxury Mansion with Chauffeured Mercedes Included!
properties.summary: Sitting on an impressive 3.5 acres of land, this sprawling architectural wonder would impress even the most discriminating guest.  Adorned with only the most opulent furnishings, spoil yourself with a trip into pure, unadulterated luxury. Enjoy your luxury vacation inside the property, or venture outside the gates in your personal, chauffeured Mercedes Maybach. Professionally managed and designed to exceed every expectation, welcome to La Maison de Reve.

Equipped with 5 ultra lux bedrooms and bathrooms, the estate can comfortably accommodate 10 of the luckiest guests in all of Malibu. Prepare to lose yourself in opulence that rivals any 5-star resort. OUTDOOR LOUNGE AREA, POOL & WHIRLPOOL TUB: Driving up to the property on the individually placed old stone driveway, past the 18th century fountain to the sculptured courtyard, it’s difficult not to become infatuated by the chateau’s rare level of sophistication.   Stepping out of the villa and into backyard area, you’ll feel like the only person in all of Malibu. Impressive in size and surrounded by trees and shrubbery for the utmost privacy,  the estate covers numerous acres of land that are fully manicured. properties.name: Malibu Studio Enchanted Sea Cottage
properties.summary: Private gated bluff acre above Westward Beach, on Point Dume, next to famous Zuma Beach. A large ocean front private room, partial ocean view from studio, but full ocean view when out on the large deck.  Full kitchenette, glassed in shower, queen bed, also a daybed, TV, wifi, gardens and steps down our bluff to a beautiful sandy beach. Very clean, private and quiet, mostly the sounds of the waves. Accommodations only, no parties or events.
properties.space: Our wonderful location is a real paradise, overlooking the sand and waves, dolphins almost daily, whales in season, sunsets right in front. A great place to just relax and have fun at the beach or watch everything below from our 100 foot blufftop.
properties.description: Private gated bluff acre above Westward Beach, on Point Dume, next to famous Zuma Beach. A large ocean front private room, partial ocean view from studio, but full ocean view when out on the large deck.  Full kitchenette, glassed in shower, queen bed, also a daybed, TV, wifi, gardens and steps down our bluff to a beautiful sandy beach. Very clean, private and quiet, mostly the sounds of the waves. Accommodations only, no parties or events. Our wonderful location is a real paradise, overlooking the sand and waves, dolphins almost daily, whales in season, sunsets right in front. A great place to just relax and have fun at the beach or watch everything below from our 100 foot blufftop. Gated acre with lawns, gardens, trees, roses with full ocean views, pool not heated, but warms in late summer. Upper lawn garden is tented, if you wish to relax in the shade,  or sit under your own umbrella. Steps down our 100 foot bluff to Westward Beach and right next to Famous Zuma Beach. Beautiful sunse
properties.neighborhood_overview: Great family neighborhood, quiet, friendly and very safe. Mostly gated. Walk to the headlands on Point Dume Nature Reserve with views down the coast to Santa Monica, Long Beach, Catalina and Palos Verdes.  We are next to Famous Zuma Beach, with miles of clean sandy beach to enjoy.
properties.notes: Everything is very clean, with views down to the sand.  Hiking in nearby trails, surfing rental shops nearby, many restaurants in area, Malibu Stage nearby, Pepperdine University with stage productions are 7 miles away, movie theatre and lots of shops in main section of downtown Malibu, 8 miles away.   Two small shopping centers, with Banks, Markets and small shops are nearby on Point Dume.  Close by golfing, tennis club, hiking trails, surfing lessons and rentals closeby.
properties.transit: You will need a car, but there is bus service about a 15 minute walk.
properties.access: Gated acre with lawns, gardens, trees, roses with full ocean views, pool not heated, but warms in late summer. Upper lawn garden is tented, if you wish to relax in the shade,  or sit under your own umbrella. Steps down our 100 foot bluff to Westward Beach and right next to Famous Zuma Beach. Beautiful sunsets, dolphins all right in front.
properties.interaction: I really try to give everyone their privacy, but if they wish to visit and have a tour, I am here.  Everyone is welcomed to visit me or just enjoy their peaceful stay watching the dolphins go by, surfers and the beautiful sunsets, all right in front. I am here if you need anything, please feel free to ask.  We keep our Aussie dog inside, when outside on a leach only, unless you enjoy dogs and want to play ball with her. She is two years old and too friendly, loves everyone.
properties.house_rules: No SMOKING OR PETS please.  Love dogs, but we are very firm on this.  Parties, filming or anything other than accommodations are strictly forbidden. No discounts, rates are firm. FOR ALL  (accommodations) there is a 12% Malibu City tax is included thru Airbnb charges.  NO TAX on rentals 31 days or longer.  Cleaning fee is 100.00 for studio, 150.00 for guest house and 200.00 for downstairs 3 bedroom accommodations. properties.host_about: Love living in such a beautiful place that keeps me so happy and grateful to have been here for over 26 years. It is great to share it all with others. I am a senior that loves life and meeting new people from all over the world.  Cannot live without watching the whales in season and dolphins almost daily and the most beautiful sunsets.

properties.name: Private Malibu Cottage
properties.summary: Close to the famous Malibu beaches: Leo Cabrillo and Zuma. Close to the many local wineries, bike trails, national parks, and hiking trails, this charmingly cozy cottage, nestled beside a beautiful rare Coral Tree on a private three acre ranch, is a uniquely delightful vacation retreat, perfect for personal introspection, romantic renaissance, or family vacation.
properties.space: Surrounded by rolling hills and tree-covered mountains, this house is located about twelve minutes from Pacific Coast Highway in West Malibu while also being about twelve minutes from Westlake Villiage. The cottage interior has beautiful Saltillo floor tiles, rich brocade curtains, two comfortable couches, and a real queen-sized bed ( having traveled myself and experienced the futon options, I note this as a relevant consideration). The outside of the cottage has lots of private outdoor space for sunbathing, bird-watching, archery, or interacting with "nature." This is a perfect place to get away from it all, while still being close to the city.
properties.description: Close to the famous Malibu beaches: Leo Cabrillo and Zuma. Close to the many local wineries, bike trails, national parks, and hiking trails, this charmingly cozy cottage, nestled beside a beautiful rare Coral Tree on a private three acre ranch, is a uniquely delightful vacation retreat, perfect for personal introspection, romantic renaissance, or family vacation. properties.neighborhood_overview: This unique Malibu hide-a-way is located down a private road off of the Mulholland Highway scenic route in West Malibu. Sweeping tree-lined vistas and oak-covered mountains are all around.  Every sunset is amazing! The Malibu Country Club, Calamigos Ranch & Conference Center, Malibu & Vine Tasting, the Cornell Winery Tasting Room, The Old Place (an old timey bar featured in "Butch Cassidy and the Sundance Kid"), Backbone Trail, Malibu Wine Safaris, Circle X Ranch, Leo Cabrillo Beach, the famous Rock Store, the equally famous Neptune's Net, and many local wineries are all near by. Plus is you go the other direction, into Westlake, you have Cisco Kid's, Sprouts, and Brent's Deli.
properties.notes: This is a real ranch so occasionally the alpacas will mouth off with their weird vocalizations. Frequently, you can hear coyotes howling at night and owls hooting from the trees. There are bunnies, cute quail families, woodpeckers, hawks, lizards, toads, and others. The night sky is dark and amazingly dense with stars. People who live in the city really miss out on how many more stars you can see at night. This is a really great place if you like nature. You are close to options which include surfing, hiking, biking, wine-touring, archery, and art-viewing. Outside is rustic, inside has old world charm. If you want to get a sense of camping, but still want the comforts of a cozy home, this is the place. The house has a kitchen, a bedroom, a living room, and a bathroom with a shower, toilet, and sink (but no tub). The couches could sleep one adult and one child comfortably or two children (but note there is no bedroom door). The place is best suited for one person, a couple, or a family
properties.transit: There are plenty of bike and hiking trails locally but no close convenient public transportation. However, there is public transportation that goes up and down Pacific Coast Highway and that you could ride to get other places.
properties.access: Complimentary bottle of wine, cheese & crackers, and fruit available upon arrival.  Coffee and tea available for mornings, as well as pancake or waffle options, if you choose to cook them. Netflix, Internet,  board games, books, lots of parking, small oven,  hot plates, waffle-maker, donut-maker, fridge, dishes and complete utensils for cooking, ceiling fan, room heater, felting lessons (if you would like), and lots of interesting and beautiful exterior spaces to explore. There is a view of the ocean in three places from the top of the property. There are also vintage dresses and art available for purchase from the gallery.
properties.interaction: I am happy to interact with you as much as or as little as you might require. Should you have questions about the local environment, need to have food delivered and/or cooked for you, learn to make felt, or require other needs to be arranged please alert me early, so that I might accomodate you.
properties.house_rules: This is a private residential neighborhood so we would like consideration to our local neighbors. No cigarette smoking inside the house. No pets.
properties.host_about: I am a artist, rancher, and mother. We have friendly alpaca on our property and use their fiber to make beautiful warm scarves. If you are interested in learning how to felt, I would be happy to teach you. This place is unique in Malibu as it refects the old style of Malibu living, seems almost like the South of France, except that you are less than 15 minutes from the California Coast and equally the same distance to Westlake. You might see bobcats, mountain lions, coyotes, owl, cool lizard and rabbits during your stay, but regardless you will ses a sky full of stars as we are far from city lights. This beautiful little magical cottage, seems out of time, but is still delighfully close to local vineyards, the beach, and the big city.

properties.name: Modern Malibu Mansion
properties.summary: Spacious Modern Estate with 180 Degree Ocean Views that allow you to have ocean view with our floor to ceiling windows.The front door has keyless entry as well. We designed the house with granite counter tops and and top quality stainless steel appliances. We have 2 curved glass bars with ice makers.  Custom built a state of the art sound system with built-in ceiling and wall speakers, Pool Patio speaker system, Pool fountains! Walking distance to your own gated private beach access area!
properties.description: Spacious Modern Estate with 180 Degree Ocean Views that allow you to have ocean view with our floor to ceiling windows.The front door has keyless entry as well. Custom built a state of the art sound system with built-in ceiling and wall speakers, Pool Patio speaker system, Pool fountains! Walking distance to your own gated private beach access area!

properties.name: Fabulous Ocean Views at Malibu Dream GetAway
properties.space: Love the panoramic ocean views, play at nearby beaches, hike memorable mountain trails.  Malibu has it all for a perfect seaside adventure.  Whether it’s a romantic interlude, family fun or peaceful solitude by the sea, our guest apartment--Deja Bu--is right where you want to be for a lovely coastal escape.  You can’t help but love the ‘Bu (Malibu to locals)! This charming 1 bedroom/1bath guest apartment boasts your own private ocean-view patio, private entrance, full kitchen, washer/dryer, fully-tiled floors and high-quality furnishings.  Located on a quiet street just 400 yards from the ocean as the crow flies and a two-minute drive, the enchanting blue Pacific fills the expansive window views from every room in the apartment.  In fact, you’ll never get tired of gazing over the beguiling and ever-changing ocean from the queen-sized bed.  From our elevation of 380 feet on a clear day, you can see several Channel Islands including Catalina, and if you’re lucky, you might even spy a wha

properties.neighborhood_overview: Fabulous ocean views, mountain views and quiet surroundings, and nature at your doorstep.
properties.access: Full one bedroom guest apartment with kitchen and washer dryer, private entrance and private patio.
properties.interaction: As little or as much at they want.
properties.host_about: The apartment is the ground floor of a lovely Malibu home. When the owners (who live on the second floor) realized they didn’t need so much room for just the two of them, they decided to offer the lower level as a guest apartment.  Both are avid tennis players, beach volleyball players and hikers, so they can point you in the right direction for a myriad of the wonderful outdoor activities Malibu has to offer.

properties.name: Rare Oceanfront with 2 Decks on Malibu Road!
properties.summary: Extremely rare Malibu Road beach loft.  This apartment is attached to a home that is very rarely occupied so you will have total privacy. This white, bright, and clean loft sleeps 4 and has a full bathroom with a washer and dryer. It has a large toaster oven, new microwave, coffee machine, and a new medium-sized refrigerator with freezer.   It has a brand new sleeper sofa that sleeps two.  The unit accommodates 4 people total.  Two outdoor showers and two decks. This the perfect beach get away.
properties.space: Beachfront access on the prestigious Malibu Road. Surrounded by homes ranging from 8mm to 30mm. Two private decks.  One deck off of the living room and one huge deck right on the beach. Two outdoor showers.   Plenty of parking. This property does not have a stove and a kitchen sink although there are appliances to cook small meals.  We have knives, a cutting board, 4 plates, 4 salad bowls, 4 cereal bowls, silverware, 4 glasses, 4 coffee cups, oversized countertop convection oven, microwave, refrigerator, and a freezer.

properties.neighborhood_overview: Malibu Road is the most popular Road to live in Malibu.  Plenty of parking, beach access, hiking trails, and a long walk to restaurants and shops.  Malibu road is several miles long and it is perfect for a walk or a jog any time of the day.  It is a beautiful quiet road with a speed limit of 25 mph which makes it very safe for walking or jogging compared to PCH.
properties.notes: This unit does not have a full-size oven or a kitchen sink.
properties.transit: Buses are available on PCH which is within walking distance to the property. Uber cars are frequently available as well as local taxis.   Parking is permitted in front of the house, not in the driveway.
properties.access: They will have access to the private unit, access to two decks, and access directly to the beach. Unlimited parking on the street only.
properties.interaction: I am available to answer any questions you have via AirBnb, text, or phone.
properties.house_rules: No smoking, no pets, no disturbing the neighbors, no unauthorized guests, and no parking in the driveway.  Lost keys are 50.  Furniture can not be taken outside of the unit.   This includes but not limited to, dishware, cups, silverware, furniture, rugs, speakers, regular towels (we provide beach towels) or anything inside the unit.  You will have to pay the full replacement value if it's been outside.

properties.name: "Windcliffranch"Malibu Retreat
properties.summary: Exceptional mountain top property above Las Flores & Carbon canyon with breathtaking views of ocean with a POOL and BEST SUNSETS! Perfect for people seeking a private/peaceful retreat.Close enough to Santa Monica and Malibu center. Artist and nature lover haven! Surrounded by beautiful rock formations.Truly magical. IMPORTANT:Before making an inquiry,please read the ENTIRE DESCRIPTION and HOUSE RULES, tell us you did and give us the full names and age of ALL guests who will be staying. THX!
properties.space: Check out our Instagram @windcliffranchmalibu for more day-to-day photos. Please see complete house rules and all the detailed description before making an inquiry. Please do not make a reservation before inquiring.  We are a tranquil retreat with some of the most spectacular ocean, canyon, and valley views found in Los Angeles. We are situated on 10 park-like acres on top of Las Flores Canyon within a gated community. This location is very peaceful/private. Perfect place for nature-loving people (4 max) seeking a quiet and relaxing private retreat in Malibu, CA. The house is located a beautiful 15-20 minute drive away from/above the beach and Cross Creek (Malibu’s shopping/entertainment/dining center) — you’ll get there quicker as you get used to the canyons. Other than beauty and peace, our mountain location has a lot of benefits. In the summer, you almost always sit above the seaside morning fog (see pictures) meaning you can catch the sun and enjoy our pool ( not heated) in the mor

We are situated on 10 park-like acres on top of Las Flores Canyon within a gated community. This location is very peaceful/private. Perfect place for nature-loving people (4
properties.neighborhood_overview: Quiet, secure gated community with about 35 spread out homes on large acreage(mostly 3 to 4 acres) . Our neighbors keep to themselves, though you might run into them if you take a walk! You cannot see other properties from our house (and they can’t see you). We are one of the most private house in the neighborhood.  WILDLIFE/NATURE  This beautiful, diverse, and wild mountain is home to an amazing assortment of wildlife. This is THEIR home we are their neighbors on the edge of this wilderness. With that in mind, we try to maintain a no-kill philosophy on the property. The house is VERY clean, but you might see some lizards, ants, and other critters during your stay (particularly during the summer). If you enjoy hiking, there are many trails nearby, including the famous Backbone Trail which is only a few steps away. You will be surrounded by beautiful state and national parks. Sometimes it feels like Joshua Tree with all the impressive boulders, other times it feels like Southern France
properties.notes: The pool isn't heated, it is best to swim from June to mid October. A pool cleaning company comes every Wednesday afternoon for about 40 minutes.  Not safe for toddlers and non swimmers. The pool is not fenced. Parents takes full responsibilities and acknowledgment. There is a 14% occupancy tax due at check in, we belong to the unincorporated portion of Malibu and Airbnb is not collecting for our area yet which falls under LA county jurisdiction. You are welcome to verify this fact by calling Airbnb. This may sound odd but believe our previous experience for notting it, there are sometime some bad weather or other natural occurrences that can happened and if there is nothing in our power we can do about it, we are asking you kindly not to hold us responsible or negatively impact our review  when you leave one. Thank you.
properties.transit: Winding, canyon roads. You need a car. Unlike most canyons in Malibu, there are multiple roads that lead to our neighborhood. From the Pacific Coast Highway (PCH) to Las Flores Canyon (10-15 minutes) or Malibu Canyon or from the valley take the 101 freeway to Malibu Canyon, Stunt Road, or even Topanga. This allows you a lot of flexibility when dealing with summer traffic.
properties.access: Please read the house rules and the entire description first as it pretty much sums things up.You have access to the entire property except the guest quarter( where we stay), the garage, my office and a few closets which will remain locked so there is no confusion. Your reservation includes completely private access to a pool, the big front yard, and various outdoor seating areas. Feel free to explore the entire property, including our additional 5 acres beyond the barns.
properties.interaction: We (me and/or my adult daughter) will be staying in the detached guest house across from the main house. We are quiet and will respect your privacy/make ourselves as invisible as possible. However, we will be available to help you at any time either in person or by text: questions, concerns, recommendations, etc. We cannot see and will not access any of the private outdoor areas included with your rental (pool area, front yard) unless there is an emergency (in which case, we will notify you). Airbnb hosts depend on their star rating and good reviews for future bookings so if during your stay there are anything we can do for you to deserve the best review, let us know.
properties.house_rules: - ENJOY yourself ! :)  - NO PARTIES - NO WEDDINGS.  - NO SMOKING - NO PETS (I love them, but can't have them in the house, my dog and cat are very territorial and they will mark!). - NO COMMERCIAL FILMING unless you have specifically booked for this purpose and paid the appropriate fees. No commercial filming with overnight/vacation rentals.  - NO PHOTOSHOOTS unless you have specifically booked for this purpose and paid the appropriate fees. No photoshoots with overnight/vacation rentals.  - A 14% OCCUPANCY TAX of the gross rental amount is due at check-in. Since Airbnb is not collecting yet for LA COUNTY UNINCORPORATED MALIBU, we will collect it directly from you. - CHILDREN if accepted in the reservation request MUST know how to swim. The pool isn't fenced and is easily accessible from the bedrooms. - This place is not appropriate for young children (under 12). - NO ADDITIONAL GUESTS on the property unless you receive a written prior approval. We are very strict about this, please do
properties.host_about: I am from France and have been involved with art, design and fashion for most my life.  I am a mother to a 22 year old who just graduated from college. We have a dog and a cat. I like to create something new each day and I strive to live in balance with nature. I have a passion for healthy living which may include a glass of red wine at the end of the day! I love to hike and to explore less travelled paths. I collect rocks and work with metals. I love large open spaces and cherish solitude, the clarity it brings. I live on a beautiful piece of the Earth and like to share it with people of like minds...who care about beauty and the creative nature of people.

properties.name: Malibu Townhouse with Ocean Views
properties.summary: Our home is a three level condo in a gated university community. On the bottom level we have one bedroom and a full bath with a tub. One room has a queen size bed and a patio. The second room is more for children, with two twin beds. The middle level has two living rooms, a dining room, a patio, a kitchen and half bath.  The third floor has a master bedroom with a king size bed and a bathroom with tub. It also has a nice balcony with a lounge chair for reading in the sun and viewing the pacific.
properties.space: Our decor is simple but tasteful with art by local artists and former students. Very sharp knives and plenty of pots and pans for cooking. The garage has a washer and dryer and... a ping pong table. We have outdoor toys for kids - bikes and sand toys, as well as many neighbors to make friends with.

properties.neighborhood_overview: Our home is located within a university community. It is safe and relaxing. We have excellent views of the Pacific, with three different porches. Kids will enjoy our neighborhood. Steps away from the front door are a community pool and grill. Most important, our homes provide excellent access to many Malibu beaches, from the world famous Surfrider beach (think Gidget) to more secluded beaches such as El Matador and El Pescador in the west. Malibu Seafood - the best restaurant in town, is 5 minutes away. Bring your own wine or beer to this local fish joint. Great surfing June through August.
properties.transit: Car recommended for getting to the beach and around Malibu.
properties.house_rules: - No shoes in the house - Quiet hours 10pm-8am
properties.host_about:
Our home is a three level condo in a gated university community (Pepperdine University). On the bottom level we have two bedrooms and a full bath with a tub. One room has a queen size bed and a patio. The second room is more for children, with two twin beds. The middle level has two living rooms, a dining room, a patio, a kitchen and half bath. The sofa has an ottoman and created an additional sleeping space for larger parties. The dining room table seats 8 comfortably. We do a lot of entertaining at our table. The third floor has a master bedroom with a king size bed and a bathroom with tub.The master bedroom also has a nice balcony with a lounge chair for reading in the sun and viewing the pacific. There is also a loft with a desk and a simple bed. Our decor is simple but tasteful with art by local artists and former students. Very sharp knives and plenty of pots and pans for cooking. The garage has a washer and dryer and... a ping pong table. We have outdoor toys for kids - bikes and sand toys, as well as many neighbors to make friends with.

properties.name: Oceanfront Townhouse on Quiet Malibu Road
properties.summary: Hello and welcome to Malibu!  Come enjoy this contemporary oceanfront townhouse on a quiet beach with amazing views. Granite and limestone kitchen & bathrooms, living room with fireplace, spa tub, BBQ on oceanfront deck, 2-car parking, lounge/recreation area with bar, ping pong and dart board. Just a short drive or bike ride to all the great shopping and dining Malibu has to offer!  And in addition to the beach, there are lots of hiking/biking trails and wine tasting nearby.
properties.space: You'll love this townhouse as it is spacious, quiet and private with the sound of the rhythmic surf in every room.  It's laid out like a house and the master bedroom is amazing with a huge picture window that looks out to the ocean.  And at night, you can see the moon and the stars without even lifting your head off your pillow!
properties.description: Hello and welcome to Malibu!  Come enjoy this contemporary oceanfront townhouse on a quiet beach with amazing views. Granite and limestone kitchen & bathrooms, living room with fireplace, spa tub, BBQ on oceanfront deck, 2-car parking, lounge/recreation area with bar, ping pong and dart board. And at night, you can see the moon and the stars without even lifting your head off your pillow! The townhouse has a keyless entry, which enables 24-hour check-in and the freedom from having to manage keys.  Included with your stay is access to our beach level recreation area that has
properties.neighborhood_overview: This townhouse is located on quiet and star-studded Malibu Road.  Most beachfront residences are on the Pacific Coast Highway, a four-lane highway that is both noisy and dangerous.  Whether you choose my place or another, I highly recommend you choose somewhere on Malibu Road.  Enjoy a short walk down the beach to Malibu Seafood where they serve the best fish & chips I've ever had!  Or check out the tide pools on Flat Rock, just a few hundred feet away.
properties.notes: If you have a baby, the townhouse comes equipped with a crib, play pen, high chair and gate for the top of the stairwell.  However, the place is not baby-proofed, so your baby must be supervised at all times.
properties.transit: Uber is the best way to get around if you don't have a car during your stay.
properties.access: The townhouse has a keyless entry, which enables 24-hour check-in and the freedom from having to manage keys.  Included with your stay is access to our beach level recreation area that has a lounge, bar, ping-pong table and dart board.  There is also a restroom and outdoor shower for washing off after a swim in the ocean. In addition, we have mountain bikes for hitting the trails or riding into town.
properties.interaction: Co-host Waverly will check you in upon your arrival and will be available by cell phone throughout your stay.
properties.house_rules: For stays that include a Friday or Saturday night, a three night minimum is required between April 1 and May 31, and a four night minimum is required between June 1 and September 4, as well as Thanksgiving, Christmas and New Years. Only confirmed guests are allowed on the property.  No one else is permitted without my specific consent.

properties.name: Beachfront Bungalow
properties.summary: MAIN PICTURE IS ACTUAL VIEW FROM THE BALCONY!  It will amaze you how a place this close to the hustle and bustle of the city will whisk you away to such a peaceful and romantic setting. Once inside, the only thing you will hear are the soothing sounds of the ocean. Quick walk up the beach to Moonshadows restaurant and bar for a cocktail or amazing meal right on the ocean. Quick trip to Malibu Colony for some retail therapy. Private access to a beautiful stretch of Malibu Beach. Pura Vida!

properties.name: Guest Pink Suite Ten minutes to beach
properties.summary: Our "PINK" room has designer linens, Shower, Bathroom, comfortable cast Iron Antique bed Frame. Overlooks private Palapa Patio. En suite refrigerator and Neurig Coffee Maker. Soap, Towels, Shampoo all provided. Spacious bathroom.
properties.space: Rancho Chiquita is a 250 acre Estate located in the Malibu hills. It has sweeping views of the Pacific Coastline and also of the local mountains. It is an extremely private and romantic getaway. This magical Estate is only 10 minutes away from the center of Malibu with its boutiques, galleries and world class beaches, surfing, hiking and top notch restaurants. The views from all points of the Ranch are stunning  as is the night sky lit up with stars.

properties.host_about: I am a chef, author, restaurateur and philanthropist, and I arrived in Los Angeles from Northern Ireland in 1975, to begin my career in the culinary industry.  My  culinary expertise encompasses an international diversity including Indian, Chinese, Mexican, Japanese, French and, of course, Contemporary California and Irish. I have been featured in the L.A. Times, Fine Cooking Magazine, and Bon Appetit Magazine named (URL HIDDEN) of the top six chefs in the United States”. Today, I own two  distinctively different restaurants on Main Street in Santa Monica,California: Lula Cocina Mexicana, a bold, bright and colorful cantina famous for its murals painted by artist Eloy Torrez, and Signature Lula Margaritas;and Finn McCool's Irish Pub, boasting a beautiful bar shipped painstakingly over from Ireland through the Panama (URL HIDDEN) 1995, I  built my dream home, Rancho Chiquita, nestled high in the Malibu Mountains.  Rancho Chiquita overlooks a spectacular panoramic ocean view and 250 acres of rolling hills, and is host to many Charity Fundraising Events, Weddings , Private Cooking Classes , and Film and Movie Shoots. I am an avid advocate on behalf of the protection and rehabilitation of animals, and I share my home with a multitude of Rescue Dogs.

properties.name: Spanish Hacienda ten mins to beach
properties.summary: A relaxing drive from the Coast takes you to this home high in the  mountains with a heart-stopping view. From almost everywhere on the property you can see the Pacific Ocean & Mountains. We are very close to Pepperdine University one canyon over.
properties.space: This house is a little Spanish gem tucked against a backdrop of mountain and ocean views and completely and totally private. At night you can see the stars and the view along the Ocean all the way to Palos Verdes is called the Queen's necklace because it sparkles so much. This one of a kind property is located in a  lavishly built Spanish gated estate on 250 acres of manicured grounds boasting the finest hand carved Mexican Paver stones. From almost everywhere on the property you can look down the canyon past waves of chaparral-cloaked hills all the way to the Pacific ocean. The quiet and privacy here are absolute. The Casa is an Estancia -Style structure with earth-toned stucco walls, a genuine Mexican tile roof and a wide lawn sweeping out in front. Immerse yourself in the Iconic Malibu in this state of the art guesthouse on a private Estate. properties.neighborhood_overview: Malibu is considered to be a extremely expensive area. We are home to a lot of movie stars; in fact we have a Shuttle- Open Air Van that gives tours of our very street.  The famous Malibu Seafood restaurant is a 15- minute walk to dinner. It requires no fuss & kick-off sandals. You- fish n stix! Malibu has worked hard keeping its natural beauty since its original development. We have a little book that you'll find left for our guest to enjoy, filled with History about Malibu with photos from the early days.  You will no doubt fall in love with the Ocean and with Malibu, especially if you stay here on this property. I did, as I'm absolutely sure you will too. I should let you know one important fact: You will absolutely HATE to pack up and have to leave~~~~ it's sad, but so true!
properties.notes: We do have PAC & Play crib, which we gladly can arrange to have set up in your unit. This property was developed in 1950s which means it has great bones, but has kept some of its nostalgic style.  There are only two units on this entire property. Most properties have been bought and rebuilt as one extremely  large custom villa or multi-units with less outdoor deck space per unit or common areas. This property is extremely unique with providing so much open deck space to enjoy!
properties.transit: You'll see a lot of cyclists, joggers & people out walking along Malibu Road. Uber is the next best way to get around town.
properties.access: You'll have plenty of parking in our private Off street parking. We are Keyless, so you will be given code for private 24 hour access. You'll walk through our Entry door & then on to the central deck, which then leads you on to your private walkway with a Awesome Ocean View ! You'll have several decks from which to choose. The central garden deck, where you can mingle with others or sit & read while having your coffee & listen to the morning surf. Perhaps an early morning run on our popular Malibu Road, or better yet....along the sand.  You could always join me & get out and put in few miles cycling.  Our Malibu Road which is notably a safe haven for road bike enthusiast..! Should you prefer Mtn bike riding, we can supply you with a book of local Mtn bike paths, however you'll have to bring a bike. Perhaps you'd rather kayak...? Or paddle board..? No worries, we got em. Beginning to sound like a resort...!
properties.interaction: After getting you in and connected and familiar with the property, I can provide you with nearby restaurants and shopping information. you'll likely see me on the property during the day, out on our Central Deck watering or planting flowers.  Recently the guest & I have enjoyed sitting around our small bon fire & enjoy wine in the evenings. Any questions, Tex seems to be best.
properties.house_rules: DOGS- 25 Cleaning Charge for each dog, per stay ALL Dogs absolutely must be approved BEFORE they are brought on to property.  As we limit type and amount of pets on the property. SMOKING- No smoking allowed inside unit.  PARTIES & NOICE Advance approval is required if you plan to have a party, which we consider having more than 4 guest at one time, on the property. We need to know if you are planning a party during your stay: The Day, Time & Number of guests. Although the beach surf drowns out most noise, please be considerate of others, especially when out early in the mornings or late at night on Central Deck. RESPONSIBILITY/LIABILITY- Owner and/or Host are free of all liability. You are completely responsible for yourself  &  everyone you invite on to the property & or into your unit. Which includes Everyone! Such as You, your friends, your friends friend, family members, and or your friends family members.  You are responsible for Any & All damages, theft or liability that it caus
properties.host_about:
My husband is a chef & started hosting guest's before AirB&B was what it is now.  It is really his love of food & caring for people that got this up & going.  You're in for a treat, to see all that he has put together!  
 Im happy to play in his garden he has so proudly keeps blooming. You'll likely run into Jennifer, who Host's & runs the property. Eager to share her housekeeping tips! I wonder out n about, watering the deck garden & feeding the birds...always happy to hear about your journey that brings you to Malibu~~~

properties.name: Malibu Beachfront Three Bedroom Bungalow
properties.summary: Premier beachfront property on La Costa Beach for the sun and sea seeking vacationer. Imagine enjoying your morning coffee on the large oceanfront deck with the sound of the waves and smell of the ocean air.
properties.space: Sitting on La Costa Beach, one of the most premier beachfront locations in Malibu. Prepare to experience beach living in this 3 bedroom, 3 bath bungalow with unique features including floor-to-ceiling windows overlooking the ocean and exquisite accent walls consisting of sea shells. The master suite, with a full size bed, and a sliding door to the outdoor patio, provides the perfect morning with the ocean view that is always present. There are two guest bedrooms one near the entryway, and a second guest room with ocean view.  Turquoise ocean views from nearly every room and classically, clean white beach decor with dark wood furnishing providing the beach retreat we've all dreamed about. The front courtyard is gated and there is no public access to the beach, allowing privacy for you and your guests. Centrally located with resort-like landscaping, there are endless activities to do in Malibu, whether you're interested in shopping, surfing, or just wining and dining in this coastal city

I created a coffee table book on luxury travel and curated a collection of best hotels in the world for a top concierge company while I was based in London.

properties.name: Malibu - Panoramic White Water Ocean View Retreat
properties.summary: The best view in Malibu! You’ll love our place because of panoramic white water ocean view and beautiful modern multi-level apartment with hardwood floors and all new furnishings. Up to 4 people with our queen size bed in the bedroom and a queen sofa bed in the living room. Private access to a large outdoor deck and small 6’x12’ (not heated) pool. The apartment is just a couple of hundred feet from the ocean. Walking distance to restaurants and beach access. Other great spots are 5 min by car.
properties.space: Our place is a beautiful one bedroom multi-level modern apartment with amazing views and loud waves. It accommodates up to 4 people: queen side bed in the bedroom, and a queen size sleeper sofa in the living room. Bedroom, bathroom and a walk-in closet are located on the upper level of the apartment. Bathroom has a shower cabin. Living room, dining and kitchen area are on the lower level of the apartment leading to the big outside deck with the pool. Kitchen has all the amenities - refrigerator, microwave, dishwasher, gas stove/oven with plenty of dishes and cooking utensils.  The pool is at the deck level, just right outside of the apartment main entry. BBQ  is available, if you wish to grill something. There is a washer/dryer in the bedroom.

properties.neighborhood_overview: Malibu is famous for its pristine coastline and remains one of the most coveted locations in the United Sates. Everyone from billionaires to celebrities flock to this beachside communicate as a result of its year-round ideal climate, scenic mountains, and upscale lifestyle. Our neighborhood - La Costa (about 300 residential houses) -  is in the eastern part of Malibu with an easy access to Downtown Santa Monica in approximately 10-15 minutes while still being within 10 minutes of Malibu Colony Plaza, Malibu Lumber Yard and Malibu Country Mart. The weather is nice year round, the ocean is incredible and very close.  Surfrider Beach and many other great beach and surfing spots are as close as 5 minutes by car.  Malibu's reputation for world-class dining continues to attract top chefs and restaurants are famous for their exquisite cuisine and premier service. Well-known restaurants include Nobu Malibu, Mastro's Ocean Club, Paradise Cove Beach Cafe, Duke's Malibu, The Sunset Restaurant and
properties.transit: Many people rent a car or use a car service like Uber or Lyft, but public transportation is also available. Metro line bus #534 (bus stop is 3 minute walk from the house) takes you to downtown Malibu and Santa Monica, and from there you can transfer to the Expo train line which takes you to downtown LA and elsewhere. There are also Big Blue Bus and Culver City Bus lines available in Santa Monica.
properties.access: We are located right off PCH up the hill.  You can access the apartment by going down the long set of stairs on the left side of the property. There is plenty of free street parking at the apartment.
properties.interaction: We are always available via phone, text or in person if you need anything.
properties.house_rules: No loud noise after 10 pm.

properties.name: Malibu Romantic Hilltop Pool House
properties.space: Special mid-week rate! 10% off the nightly rate for bookings with check in date on a Monday, Tuesday or Wednesday and checking out no later than Friday morning.  2 night  minimum. The perfect Malibu vacation getaway, the Pool House house is nestled among the chaparral, manzanita, sugar pine and sumac of the Santa Monica Mountains, high above the Pacific Coast Highway with beautiful ocean and canyon views. This lovely single private guest house is available for rent by the night, week or month year round.    We call this amazing place "The Malibu Island Pool House". There is a private swimming pool exclusively for you. You do not share the pool. You have a large redwood deck with gas bar-b-q, surrounded by colorful gardens. The house consists of one large room with a king sized bed, a separate full kitchen and 3/4 bath with shower. Sliding glass door opens to a sparkling private pool for a cool dip or invigorating swim anytime of day. Ideal for one or two people maximum for Monthly rent

properties.house_rules: CHILD RESTRICTIONS:  No child under the age of 7 will be allowed on the property at any time.  Neither as a renter or a guest.  We can only allow an infant that cannot walk or crawl.  This property is surrounded by steep stairs and hillsides.  There is a pool right outside the front door with no fencing.  Owners are not responsible for any injuries sustained on the property by any renter or guest, due to negligence, accidental fall or the like. PETS: Pets are not allowed on premises without Owner's consent.100 Deposit required if allowed plus 10/nt. SMOKING:  There is NO SMOKING allowed inside the Malibu Island house.  Smoking is permitted outside the house, on the deck or parking lot.  However, please use ashtrays (by request) and do not drop cigarette butts on the grounds, deck, pool area, etc.  Please be very cautious pertaining to fire safety.  This property is a highly flammable area.  We are under strict regulations by the County of Los Angeles to maintain fire safety practices

properties.name: Private Suite at Villa Mariposa
properties.space: Tranquil  and secluded 600 sq.ft. suite with a private entrance in our home, Villa Mariposa, located in Serra Retreat--one of Malibu's most exclusive neighborhoods. The Suite features 2 full size beds, a pull out sofa and an en suite bathroom with a large stall shower. There is separate room for coffee, a compact refrigerator and microwave. A cozy sitting area complete with wireless internet, direct TV, DVD player, and a 42 in"  plasma TV. Twice weekly maid service is also included.    On the same floor as your suite, we have laundry facilities and a spa. You can enjoy a far-infrared sauna and a massage at your leisure in our serene spa. I also would be happy to recommend a professional and reasonable therapist to you.  Though the remainder of the house, which includes our kitchen, is not included in the rental, guests are welcome to relax and enjoy the resort-style saltwater pool, nestled amidst our beautifully manicured acre of gardens. Serra Retreat is a hidden, luxury community nes

properties.name: Charming Private Modern Ranch Guest House
properties.summary: Cool & comfortable brand new Private Modern Ranch Guest House with queen bed situated at Point Dume in Malibu.  Fresh clean air blowing up off of Zuma Beach with ocean view's from the front & back yards.  Horseback riding directly out of our back gate from our private stables.  Chickens, Goats & other animals all on the property.  Amazing dining, markets beaches & scenery.  This Guest House is separate from the main house and has its own entrance with plenty of free parking.  New and remodeled.
properties.space: If you are looking for the most peaceful, clean, quiet and special place in Malibu then this is your spot.  Situated on a private gated road, all you will hear at night is Crickets, Owls, an occasional coyote mixed with a beautiful cool ocean breeze bringing the freshest air right up to your windows from Zuma Beach.  I just finished remodeling this guest house with brand new White Oak hardwood floors, solid Walnut furniture, soft 100% cotton sheets on a new amazing mattress.  A new 50" flat screen Smart TV connected to wireless internet.  You will be able to stream Netflix on this TV by logging into your Netflix account.  This guest house is situated on a 1.5 acre ranch with horses, goats, peacocks, chickens and turkeys. You enter the your guest house thru a private entrance with a private keyed door. The property is located on a private road in a gated community and is extremely quiet, safe and peaceful with amazing views of Point Dume and Zuma Beach right from the yard.
properties.description: Cool & comfortable brand new Private Modern Ranch Guest House with queen bed situated at Point Dume in Malibu.  Fresh clean air blowing up off of Zuma Beach with ocean view's from the front & back yards.  Horseback riding directly out of our back gate from our private stables.  Chickens, Goats & other animals all on the property.  Amazing dining, markets beaches & scenery.  This Guest House is separate from the main house and has its own entrance with plenty of free parking.  New and remodeled.
