properties.neighborhood_overview: It is extremely quiet and peaceful, with vineyards growing in the neighborhood. People ride horses up past the house to the state park which spans 288 mi.² right in our backyard. The most amazing hiking trails start here at our back gate.  Start out your day by taking a walk and exploring the Zuma Ocean View Trail.  There is also The Backbone Trail which is a long distance trail extending 68 miles across the length of the Santa Monica Mountains.  You can access this trail at multiple points within 15 minutes drive of the property.  Pepperdine University is also located within 10 minutes of the property as well for parents who need easy access to graduation and school events.
properties.notes: You will need a car. There is no public transportation. Bathroom amenities include Towels, Shampoo, Conditioner, Tooth Paste and a Hair Dryer. Weekly maid service is included with the cleaning fee. There is also a small fridge/ freezer, a microwave, coffee maker and electric water pot in the room. A list of the best restaurants, beaches and local spots will be provided to you when you arrive. We know all the best secret spots in the area and we will gladly share them with you when you arrive. You will have a great stay in Malibu and leave knowing so much more about Malibu and local Malibu life in the mountains.
properties.transit: Guests will need their own mode of transportation. There is plenty of free parking available.
properties.access: Guests have easy access to so many great restaurants, beautiful beaches and amazing markets. Easy parking is available just a few steps from your door. Our property borders the Santa Monica Mountain National Recreation area. Miles and miles of hiking trails start at the back gate of our property. The 66 mile long Backbone trail runs thru the mountains behind the house and connects to the trails directly out our back gate.  For a beautiful view of some of these mountains with the most gorgeous ocean views, call Talley ((PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN)) and book a Horse Back Riding tour on our horses right in the backyard and see some of the 165,000 acres (YES 288 SQUARE MILES) of clean open undeveloped wild mountain range which makes our property so special. A list of the best restaurants, ranches, beaches and local spots will be provided to you when you arrive. We know all the best secret spots in the area and we will gladly share them with you when you arrive.
properties.interaction: Guests will have their own entrance with their own key and as much or little interaction as they want.
properties.house_rules: No smoking. Please be mindful of noise after 10pm
properties.host_about: Host extrodinaire.  Ive lived in Los Angeles and Malibu all of my life.   I know all the secret local spots to dine and play.   The nicest beaches and most amazing hiking trails.  Im a designer and a business man.  You can see more photos on my instagram @laspeed and more photos of the property specifically at hashtag #malibusofferanch

Brand new remodeled apartment, new to AirBnB, first time on the market (that's why no reviews yet), immaculate, full of natural light. Private deck with white-water views of Zuma Beach. properties.transit: Public transport? Are you kidding me? There's a bus to Santa Monica (east) every 30 minutes or so. No public transport that I know of to west or north. Pepperdine University is 9 miles away via PCH (Pacific Coast Highway) -usually uncongested ride except in hot summer weekends.
properties.access: Gas grill on the deck, fully equipped kitchen with a gas stove top, pots and pans, silverware, plates etc, large fridge, toaster oven, micro, beach chairs, iron & ironing board, fast internet, TV w 400+- channels, ink jet printer, washer and dryer.
properties.interaction: You have all your privacy for yourself -short of occasionally asking if there's anything I can do for you. I may or may not be there during your stay.
properties.house_rules: No parties, all guests have to be cleared with owner (septic system sewer, neighborhood is very noise sensitive). Washer/dryer shared and available. Electric heaters available in the apartment.
properties.host_about:
I am interested in making my apartment a good experience for you -all the while I stay out of your way. You are here to enjoy your stay -not to deal with me.   I don't like hotels. So I stocked the apartment with stuff I would like to have -fast internet, printer, TV with a gazillion of channels (even if why on earth would you want to watch TV here?), all the kitchen appliances I can think of, grill on deck, etc. Blah blah. Within reason you should find pretty everything you can think of for you here. If you don't, it can probably be arranged.

I have been writing a guide "what's interesting for me in Malibu". It's now 30 pages long and it's yours to keep.  So far my guests seem to like it.

You'll find more on me on that famous "book with faces" if you search for "heikki malibu" -most likely I am the only one you find.

properties.neighborhood_overview: The property is about 3 miles up a canyon road from the coast. It's right in between some of the best hiking, biking and horse riding in LA (state and national parks), some of the best beaches in California (Zuma beach and surfrider beach), and Malibu's wine country (which has tours). Almost anything you could want to do is accessible from here, but the property itself is nestled in the canyon and you have a complete sense of serenity.
properties.notes: The entire residence is terraced up the side of the mountain with stair access to all four (4) floors via an external wood stair case.  Each level has it's own ingress/egress to the Suite as well as it's own private patio area for outdoor cooking.   Of note:  feeling comfortable with stairs is important.   Parking is off-road - approximately 50 feet to "temporary" parking and  700 feet to "permanent" parking.   Natural wildlife sounds abound.....
properties.transit: Car rentals are available in Santa Monica. Uber and Taxi's are all available in the Canyons.  Public transportation via bus is available on Pacific Coast Highway both up and down the Coast as well as into Los Angeles.
properties.access: The unit can be accessed from a private entrance to the second floor. A private patio with BBQ is available for guest use also.
properties.interaction: I'm more than happy to provide help finding local activities. I've spent 20 years living in the area and can point you either to touristy stuff to do or hidden gems. If you like nature, I can help you find anything you want. I'm also happy to let you enjoy the peace and solitude on your own.
properties.house_rules: No smoking - as Malibu has fallen victim to fires in her past.  No parties or events  - this is a quiet space. Please be respectful of your noise levels and footprint. Request day-light arrival. Prior arrival arrangement recommended. Check-in after 4PM.   Not all Map Apps are dependable in the mountains of Malibu.  Review driving directions, coordinates, and photos prior to booking.   Large exterior lights to be extinguished by 10 PM - to allow us all to enjoy the amazing star display in our dark (non-city) sky.  No commercial ventures.  Contact Site Manager, Rosalee Mayeux for bookings information:  (PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN). Will consider small pets on an individual basis for 20/night. Feel free to inquire. Use of fireplaces requires pre-approval by host based on current Malibu weather &  local fire-conditions.
properties.host_about:
I am an outdoor, nature enthusiast! Having lived in Malibu for more than 20 years I have deep knowledge of and can recommend beautiful equestrian and mountain bike trails as well as some of the best and/or most challenging hikes in the Santa Monica Mountains.   

It would be my pleasure to introduce you to the benefits of nature and what this community has to offer.

I have three gated horses - two Rocky Mountains and one Missouri Fox Trotter, all with excellent credentials work & knowledge of the Santa Monica Mountains.  For experienced riders, feel free to contact me if you are interested in working out an add-on riding experienced overlooking the Pacific of exploring the largest urban park in the US ... just out of your back door!

Your first evening welcomes you with a bottle of fine wine from one of Malibu's local wineries. Should you want to tour the wineries and experience an afternoon of wine tasting, they're but minutes away.

A barbecue on a lovely outdoor private patio is yours to use while you are a guest here at the 'Angels of the Oaks'. We are in a California Shenandoah Oak Preserve surrounded by national and state parks. Caution with sparks required.

Should you be interested in being pampered, massage therapists, aestheticians, yoga instructors are only minutes away. 

I would be very happy to make the arrangements for you.

For those evenings that you simply want to cozy up and enjoy the movies or a premium series, Netflix is available for you to enjoy.

I look forward to welcoming you to what guests have said is a magical, energizing, and beautiful place to call home for as many days as you choose to stay.

properties.name: Ocean View 3 Bedroom Guest House
properties.summary: The Guest House at Sage Hill Ranch is a private house on this 6 acre Malibu Vineyard Estate with an Ocean View fenced yard. A perfect home away from home for families with all the amenities needed for the perfect Malibu vacation!
properties.space: The Guest House is a wonderful family residence at Sage Hill Ranch - a horse ranch & vineyard in the Malibu hills overlooking the ocean. It has 3 bedrooms - the master suite has a Queen size bed, TV & en-suite bathroom. The kid's room has bunk beds, desk & toys. The 3rd bedroom has a Queen size bed & French doors to the Ocean View yard. The living room is comfortable with  a sofa, comfy chairs & a sofa-bed for extra guests & a TV. There is a dining area with seating for 6, breakfast table in the kitchen, & tables in the yard for outdoor dining. Pool, Hiking Trails, Beaches, Surfing, Massage, Wine Tasting I like to be there to greet my guests & show them around - & then leave them in peace unless they need me. properties.neighborhood_overview: I love the seclusion of the ranch - 5 miles up from Pacific Coast Highway - Sage Hill Ranch is a sanctuary - far enough for peace & quiet but close enough to the beaches, restaurants & stores of Malibu.
properties.notes: We are 5.5 miles up a windy canyon from PCH! It takes 15 minutes so is not for the faint-hearted! But it's worth the drive as the views are spectacular.

properties.interaction: I love to meet my guests & make sure they have everything they need & then leave them to relax  & enjoy themselves. I'm always available to help with information, reservations & of course provide wine tasting!
properties.house_rules: Pets are welcome! We have horses, chickens, dogs & cats at the ranch. No smoking in the house. No fires - gas barbecue only. No more than 6 guests! Any extra adults will be charged 50.00 per night, children 25.00 per night! Quiet time after 10pm.
properties.host_about: I'm British but have lived in California for 35 years. I like to go "home" a couple of times a year to stay connected to family & friends but am always so happy to get back to sunny California! I love where I live - Sage Hill Ranch is a 7 acre paradise overlooking the ocean. It used to be a Christmas tree farm & there are hundreds of enormous Pine trees on the property. I have 5 horses & the riding around here is amazing. Miles of ocean view trails - the Backbone trail goes all the way to the beach. I planted a vineyard when I moved here 6 years ago & now we are enjoying our own Syrah, Cabernet Sauvignon & Sauvignon Blanc which we are happy to share with cabin guests! I have loved having Airbnb guests staying in the cabin. Everyone that has stayed has been so nice & many have become friends. I look forward to experiencing other Airbnb accommodations on my travels to Europe.

Located in the beautiful Point Dume area, our space is completely private and extremely peaceful.  The yard is teeming with birds and affords amazing views of the coastline and mountains across the canyon.
properties.description: Our guest apartment is private and comfortable, within walking distance to the beach and with stunning views.  Come and experience life on the edge of the canyon…  Conveniently located, peaceful and beautiful.  Hear the waves crash and watch the incredible sunset from your own garden! A one bedroom guest apartment with granite kitchen and bathroom and a comfortable living room.  Located in the beautiful Point Dume area, our space is completely private and extremely peaceful.  The yard is teeming with birds and affords amazing views of the coastline and mountains across the canyon. You'll have the entire apartment to yourself, with a private access way, ample parking in our gated, private estate, your own garden area and plenty of space to relax.  There is a bench to enjoy the sunsets from and a comfortable table and chairs with umbrella as well. We're busy people leading our own lives and we respect our guests privacy and desire to unwind.  However, we are always available to chat or t
properties.neighborhood_overview: We love the outstanding natural beauty that surrounds us.  We love listening to the waves breaking at the beach in the evening, watching the sunsets from the balcony.  We enjoy walking the neighborhood and love the easy access to PCH and shops, as well as being able to take a stroll on the beach when we want to.  It's a quiet, peaceful neighborhood and a safe, desirable place to live.
properties.notes: Please note...   Between June 10 - August 31 we prefer two night bookings on weekends when a Friday or Saturday night is included. July 26 - August 10...  Minimum two night bookings only please. We will provide  beach chairs and  beach towels for our guests.  We also have bikes available for use. Please be mindful of the stairs heading down to the apartment.  Motion sensor lights come on at night to guide your path. Please note there are two steps leading up from the living room to the rest of the apartment, and one small step down into the kitchen. We do have wifi access in the apartment.  The apartment has its own router. The kitchen has cooking facilities but there is no under counter or built in oven.  However, it has a full stove top, microwave, small dishwasher, coffee and tea making facilities and a small fridge, in addition to a counter top Cuisinart "Oven Central" for baking/roasting purposes. Please note we do not keep milk, cream or other perishable foods in the apartment fo
properties.transit: We're located an hour north of LAX and it is fairly essential that guests have their own car.  We have bikes you can borrow and Uber operates in Malibu, as well as a public bus service.  The beach is walking distance or a very short drive. You can also walk to the Point Dume Headlands nature preserve easily.   There is a small shopping center with grocery store, coffee shops, restaurants, banks and other services about a mile away.  The Sunset restaurant is extremely close, as are several other restaurants.
properties.access: You'll have the entire apartment to yourself, with a private access way, ample parking in our gated, private estate, your own garden area and plenty of space to relax.  There is a bench to enjoy the sunsets from and a comfortable table and chairs with umbrella as well.
properties.interaction: We're busy people leading our own lives and we respect our guests privacy and desire to unwind.  However, we are always available to chat or to answer any questions about the apartment and happy to share our knowledge of the Malibu area.  We enjoy hosting guests from all over the country and the world.  We do live on the property but your retreat is a private apartment that is full of fresh air and great views, and has its own private entrance and access path.
properties.house_rules: Our neighborhood is very peaceful and we want to keep it that way.  This is not a party house and we respect our neighbors right to peace and quiet.  We ask that you do the same.   It's a beautiful, serene place to escape from your normal routine, perfect for single visitors or couples.   Smoking only permitted outside and please be aware we are in a high fire risk area. We will not tolerate the use of drugs on our property.  We do not rent our place for weddings, birthday parties, engagement parties, baby showers, film shoots or any other kind of event. Check In is 3PM unless other arrangements have been made.   Check out is 10AM unless other arrangements have been made. The property is private and gated.  We will provide a remote control for gate access.  Lost remotes will incur a 50 replacement charge. Additional, unexpected guests who were not included in the original booking will be accepted at our discretion and will incur an additional charge.  Please be sure to notify us if yo
properties.host_about: I'm a busy stay at home mom, who is very active in the community and involved in education and sports.  My husband and I live with our teenage daughter and lazy, spoilt spaniel, and we've lived in this location for nearly 20 years.  We love our neighborhood and can't imagine living anywhere else.  I'm a keen amateur photographer and scrapbooker.  We love to travel the world when time allows and we enjoy sharing our beautiful Malibu environment with others.

properties.name: Serenity in Malibu Park
properties.summary: Total privacy & serenity surrounded by mountains and beaches. Perched above Zuma Beach, this one level newly remodeled, contemporary guesthouse is a self-contained unit with canyon views. There is easy access to activities in Santa Monica, the South Bay, DTLA, and LAX. We are only 1 mile from PCH and public transportation.
properties.space: The unit is approximately 825 square feet with high ceilings and lots of natural light. It has been newly remodeled. It has tile floors throughout and contemporary furnishings.  It is extremely quiet and private, has a full size fridge, four burner cook top, pots, pans, linens, microwave, patio, heat, etc. There is a washer and dryer in the bathroom. The apartment has Cable TV and High Speed Wireless Wi-Fi.

properties.neighborhood_overview: The guesthouse is nestled on a secluded property and you have a complete sense of serenity. It is about 1 mile off of Pacific Coast Highway above Zuma Beach. We are surrounded by some of the best hiking and mountain biking  in LA, some of the best beaches in California, and Malibu's wine country.  We are approximately 1 mile from Trancas Country Mart which includes Vintage Grocers Market, Starbucks, Wells Fargo Bank and Drill Surf and Skate which offers surfboard and stand up paddle rentals as well as lessons.
properties.transit: Parking for one car is available for guests directly in front of the entrance to the unit. The property is located one mile from Pacific Coast Highway and public transportation (the 534 Bus) that runs up and down the coast from Santa Monica to Malibu.
properties.interaction: I'm more than happy to provide help finding local activities. I've lived in Malibu my whole life and can point you in the direction of the tourist attractions or the local spots.

properties.name: Malibu Guest house/ near beach
properties.space: Little, mid century, ranch style, private guest house, on Point Dume peninsula. We are surrounded by Big & Little Dume coves, Westward & Zuma Beaches. Malibu is 27 mi. long and 2 mi. wide. Cottage has one bedroom, kitchen, bathroom, living room,w/ large tv and wifi.  Picture window looks back to mountains, & down to our lovely tennis court. Bring your own or borrow rackets to play. We are 3 blocks to beach in each direction as seen on map. A lovely private tennis-and-beach getaway with lots of open land, set in Maibu's beloved Point Dume neighborhood. The  clean, detached space has a homey feel, smart swing-out windows for fresh Malibu sea air, and the rooms have wi-fi, a desk area, (great for writers), entertainment system, breakfast table,and a full kitchen.We have cultural touches inside the guest-house like the Beatles Anthology, complete cartoons of The New Yorker, a "Far Side" comics collection, new and vintage books. Little Dume beach is a gem for surfers and general beachgoers

Love my hometowns Memphis, Tenn.,Oxford, Miss,and now lovely Malibu, California. Manhattan,N.Y. ,Sweden, Ireland and Montana, are also part of my heart. Also enjoy interesting, kind people.

Beaches are within minutes of the house making this home a perfect retreat for family-friendy activities.   Local restaurants include Nobu Malibu and Geoffries at the Beach. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, and families (with kids).

properties.house_rules: Dear guests we are exited for you to be able to experience the Malibu life. Since we are located in the heart of the Santa Monica mountains i want to remind you that we are in the middle of the country side. Please remember to keep the doors and windows always closed after sundown  so you won't fill the house with mosquitos and moths . If you keep the doors open with the lights on you attract all kinds of insects and critters living in our beautiful  neighborhood . thank you
properties.host_about:
I am an artist and chef originally from Italy living here in Malibu for the past 15 years and enjoying the beautiful Malibu lifestyle.  I designed and built this home myself and put a lot of my years of experience into the details . . . the different mosaic works, paintings and even the layout of the home is quintessentially Malibu with a European feel.  

I am also a avid guitar and bass player.  I first came to LA to study music and I enjoy a jam session on the front terrace with friends.  Its not unusual on a Sunday afternoon to see a group of friends enjoying wine and music while watching the beautiful Pacific ocean.  

I've put a lot of love and care into my music, my food and my home.  Ask me about doing a lunch or dinner for you while you are here!  I'm happy to chef for you while you enjoy the house.  

I am also fluent in German, Italian and English and welcome international guests. 

owner living on premesis always ready
To assist you

properties.neighborhood_overview: Zuma Beach in Malibu is world renowned for its clean water and beautiful white sand beach,  world class surfing, swimming and sun bathing. There are incredible restaurants with full bars within beach walking distance and many more that are a short drive away. We are more than happy to make recommendations and reservations as you direct. We can arrange catered dining on site as well as a fully stocked pantry with all your favorite drinks and foods including the freshest seafood and local produce at an additional cost. The Malibu Wine Trail features numerous local wineries and tasting rooms and is only 15 minutes away. Hiking trails and mountain biking only also minutes away.  Nearby Surf fishing and charter sight seeing or fishing boats are also a option to further explore during your stay.
properties.notes: We have a  German Shepard dog who is a member of our family on the property.  We are able to accommodate 6 guests, however, please be aware you have to either sleep 3 persons per bed or we can supply a tent with air mattress for the additional 2 people. Just let us know when you book that you would like for us to set one up for you. Thanks.  Beach toys for your use during your stay include: Surfboards, boogie boards, cruiser bikes, 10 speed bike, A bicycle built for two, skateboard and skim board. Beach chairs, beach towels and umbrella, etc. Need a place to get married? Go to "Malibu Seaside Weddings" and see what we can do for you!
properties.transit: There is a public bus stop within a quarter mile and it will take you into Santa Monica and beyond. Malibu Taxi cabs are readily available along with Uber or Lyft. Uber and Lyft are subject to availability as anywhere. We will arrange for a Cadillac Escalade with an experienced and knowledgeable local  private driver at extra cost if that is desired.
properties.access: We welcome our guests to feel at home.  You will have complete shared access to the entire property including the gazebo on the bluff overlooking the ocean. PLEASE NOTE: We do NOT allow unregistered guests on the property. Thank you.  Bill and I live on the property with our 18 year old son. The lily pond and the flower garden provide an ideal location for soaking up the sun . You will however have to excuse the brown lawn area, we are in a severe drought in California so we are doing our part to conserve water. There is a shared gym in the garage with weight machine, stationary bicycle and heavy punching bag.
properties.interaction: My husband and I have been residents of Malibu for over 21 years and on this property for about 6 years. We look forward to help make your stay everything you  expect, whether it's privacy and seclusion or suggestions of where to dine or play. We are here to help and are close by,  but not too close if you need anything. If you have any questions or need that extra something please let us know and we will do what we can to make it happen.
properties.house_rules: -Check-in is between 4:00pm and 10:00pm. If you require a check-in  after 10pm, please contact us and we will try to accommodate you.  Check-out is 11:00am.  -Smoking is allowed outside only. Please use ashtrays. -No pets please...we love animals and have a dog and two birds of our own but the Air Stream may have future guests with allergies, hence our concern...sorry. -ONLY Airbnb registered guests are allowed on the property. Please no exceptions! Thanks for your understanding. -Please be respectful of the property and the Air EX Stream. (We worked very hard to create this unique design) A truly one of a kind location and experience awaits your arrival ! -No loud music or noise especially after 10pm

properties.summary: A little gem hidden on a very quiet street, close to the best sport playgrounds in Malibu....Zuma Beach for surfing, and the Santa Monica Mountains for hiking and mountain biking. Indoor/Outdoor living, A fabulous canyon view with a "peek a boo" ocean view . Outdoor hot tub and shower , fire pit and BBQ.  A cosy 3 bedroom , 2 bathroom with warmth and light. Beautiful gardens ,fruit trees, and Zen atmosphere .  Secure yard and so very private!!

properties.name: Oasis in the Malibu Wine Trail
properties.summary: COMPLETELY PRIVATE 2 bedroom unique home in the middle of the Malibu wine trail with GIANT freshwater ozone pool, jacuzzi, water slide, waterfalls and kiddy pool.  Wine tasting everywhere with unique restaraunts and views views views.....
properties.space: Spectacular 2 bedroom 2 bath Oasis in the middle of the Malibu Wine Trail. The !st large bedroom has a king size bed with private bath and large 2 person marble shower which doubles as a steam room. Not only is there a steam room but there is also a large sauna.  The french doors open onto a stone patio with outside slipper tub so you can bath under the stars. A stairwell takes you to a private outdoor shower with outdoor sink and seating area surrounded by bamboo for privacy. There is a large walk in dressing room and large laundry room as well. The second even larger bedroom has double bed with seating room and small office private bathroom with shower. Both bedrooms open on to a cozy living room with real masonry stone fireplace, massive deer antler chandelier with an open kitchen off the living room. There are french doors throughout and stone floors inside and outside surrounding your HUGE private freshwater pool with water falls and stone water slide surrounded by lush vegetation

properties.neighborhood_overview: There is wine tasting everywhere and great unique restarants and bars.  The beach is 10 mins away for surfing, swimming, paddle boarding, boating or just relaxing.  Horse back riding, hiking and mountain biking.  Freeway also 7 mins away if visiting other areas of LA.  Great shopping! Since we are located in the Malibu Wine Trail it would be a good idea to visit some of the vineyards and sample their wines i.e. WINE TASTING!! 1.  Malibu Wines is across the street however you should go to their wine tasting bar located at 31740 Mullholland HWY approx 2 mins drive from the house, easily walkable.  They also have the Malibu wines Safari call (PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN).  Cielo Wines is my neighbor behind the house.  You have to belong to their private club to go to the Barn, however, they make exceptions for my guests. Please let me know when booking if you'd like to go wine tasting there as they will need to know in advance. 3. Malibu Rocky Oaks Estate Vineyard located at 340 Kanan RD Malibu a
properties.notes: Leslie the owner is a certified Yoga instructor!  She teaches Vinyasa flow as well as Ashtanga and Iyengar.  She is the creator and CEO of AROMAYOGA THERAPY which utilizes the use of therapeutic grade essential oils while practicing in order to achieve a deep and profound emotional, physical, mental and spiritual release.  She has also trained with Elise Miller Browning a senior Iyengar teacher and founder of Yoga for scoliosis and back problems.  She has taught a diverse group of people around the world from the Royal Family of Saudi to the girl next door!  She is available to her guests for private yoga lessons by the pool.  She is also available to take her guests on hikes and is available for consultations on health and fitness.
properties.transit: You will need a car to get to the beach or the town of Malibu.  However the Malibu Cafe is across the st and wine tasting at Malibu wines which is walkable.  Cielo Wines is behind the house and a couple mins walk.  Lots of hiking and mountain biking in the general area.
properties.access: Private 2 bedroom home, pool and pool slide, jacuzzi, outside barbecue, fire pit and seating, pool chaises and umbrellas.  Laundry room.  2 mountain bikes.  No access to other house on the property.
properties.interaction: What I like about renting my place is meeting new people!  I'm a people person and a giver so I love to help with events and weddings etc. or just make suggestions so their stay is more enjoyable! If a guests wants to chat I'm always willing and able...
properties.house_rules: 1.  There will be a separate charge for propane usage to heat the pool and jacuzzi.  Upon arrival you'll be asked to sign a document which allows the propane company to charge your credit card directly for your usage.  I will send you a reading of your usage daily so you have an idea of the costs.    2.  We are on a septic system which is very delicate, do not put anything down the toilets but human waste.   3.  Do not put anything down the garbage disposal, put all food scraps into the garbage.   4.  Only use natural biodegradable products for your hair skin etc as anything other than that will ruin the septic system.   5.  Do not leave french doors open unattended as you will have unwanted guests i.e. rodents, (we are in the middle of the wine trail)   6.  Please do not leave the heating and air on if you are not in the house or if the doors are left open.   7.  All doors should be locked prior to leaving the house for any length of time.   8.  There is a basket of beach and pool tow
properties.host_about:
I'm a fun  passionate and exciting woman who loves adventure.  I enjoy traveling to new destinations and meeting new people, my neighbor calls me a pioneer.  I'm passionate about every thing I do.  I'm a very gracious host and I love to entertain and make my guests feel at home.  Some of my favorite books are "Sidhartha"," Mists of Avalon", "Modoc" and "Women who run with the Wolves".  Actually I use to have 3 wolves and was known as the Wolf Woman of Malibu.  I AM a woman who runs with the wolves literally..lol!.  I've lived in London, Paris, Milan, NYC, Toronto, LA and now Malibu and have traveled all over the world.  I have to say I was happiest in Italy and fell in love with Portafino ...loved the cave with the elevator soooo James Bond!!!!!
Some of my favorite movies are Matrix, The Gladiator, Truly Madly Deeply and of course Dances with Wolves...dah!!!  I LOVE ALL MUSIC... the language of the soul and healthy organic food.  Love hanging with friends dancing and YOGA!!!  Life is a roller coaster, the bigger the life the wilder the ride...YEEEEEHAAAAAAAA!!!

properties.name: Malibu Oceanfront 3bd/2ba on SAND!
properties.summary: Two level, Nantucket style chic and modern home, fully remodeled in 2011. All new wood floors, kitchen cabinets and marble counters installed in March 2015.  Located directly on the beach with no public access. You will never want to leave!
properties.space: Malibu 3 bedroom 2 bath Nantucket Style Chic and Modern 1924 Beach Bungalow, fully remodeled in 2011.  All new wood floors and kitchen cabinets and marble counters installed in March 2015. After 5 years of renting beach houses along the Malibu coastline we decided to buy our own piece of paradise and now share it with you. We learned a lot about what we wanted and put it all into this house. We call it "The Bu" and are confident you will enjoy it as much as we do! As you can see in the pictures, the house is on the sand (on a private beach; no public access) and you can surf and paddle board right on our beach.  The house is essentially on a wet/dry beach depending on whether it's high or low tide. properties.neighborhood_overview: Malibu is one of the hottest areas to visit in all of California. Not only does it kiss the Pacific Ocean but it also is minutes from all the downtown attractions. Plus, it is only a few miles from Santa Monica, so the possibilities for activity, adventure, shopping, touring, and relaxation are endless.  Our house is located 2 1/2 miles south of the Malibu Pier/Malibu Country Mart and 8 miles north of the Santa Monica Pier.  About an hour's drive to Disneyland; 2 hours to San Diego (Legoland/San Diego Zoo).  Close to a number of wonderful hiking and biking trails, parks, horseback riding tours, camping sites, and wine tastings.
properties.notes: We do not rent to LA locals for staycations.  No large parties, weddings, bar/batmitzvahs, etc.
properties.access: Paddleboards, boogie boards, beach chairs, sand toys, beach and bath towels, fully stocked kitchen
properties.interaction: Guests will receive a code to gain access to house. No keys necessary.  Guests will receive House Instructions a few days before check in.
properties.house_rules: A rental agreement is required prior to arrival. It will be sent to you after booking the property. We must receive valid identification (e.g. valid drivers license or passport) of all guests prior to arrival. The names on the credit card must match the name on the contract and the name on the identification.   House instructions/rules will be sent to guests a few days before check in. No keys are used as we have keyless entry locks. Dogs are not allowed on furniture - any evidence of dogs (hair, paw marks), there will be an additional cleaning fee TBD based on extent of damage.  All major holiday weekends between (PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN) per night (Presidents, MLK, July 4th, Labor, etc). We do not rent out for events and major parties.

properties.name: MountainStorm-Airstream International 25ft
properties.summary: My place is close to This Airstream can be parked near some of the most desirable beaches and surf breaks in Malibu. Less than 30 minutes (depending upon LA traffic) to Santa Monica/Venice or fly into LAX and taxi up the coast 45 minutes to Malibu RV Park. The closest beach is right across the street. We also offer deliveries all over the Western United States and allow you to tow our Airstreams with a sufficient vehicle and experience. You must reserve space at the RV park prior to booking.

properties.neighborhood_overview: My fleet is going to be based in Malibu from October through March but can be delivered anywhere else you desire for an additional fee.  Malibu hosts some of the best beaches in the country for year round enjoyment, not to mention a plethora of shops and restaurants.
properties.transit: If you don't have a vehicle, using Uber/Lyft or a taxi service is the best way to get around.  Santa Monica/Venice is about 25 minutes from here and LAX is about 45 minutes depending on LA traffic.
properties.access: Guests will be required to reserve a spot at the RV park, state beach or campground prior to booking with me as we need to ensure there is availability, which I can help arrange.  We can also deliver to private property, concert venues or anywhere else you would like one set up.  We have a network of delivery drivers so depending on distance from our base will dictate prior.
properties.interaction: Either myself or one of my associates can be at the Airstream to go through orientation and make sure you're settled in.  We have instructions for each trailer but can also go over it all on the phone as it's quite simple.  We make ourselves available 24/7 via phone/text/email in case you have any issues and all the other RVers, especially Airstream owners, are always more than welcome to lend a helping hand.
properties.house_rules: - - This Airstream can be delivered to any RV park in California for an additional fee, we just ask that you respect park rules as your conduct also reflects on the solid relationships we've established at both privately owned parks as well as state parks
properties.host_about:
Greetings Fellow World Travelers!

I have a growing fleet of Airstreams that triangulate between bases in Malibu (serving from San Diego to Santa Barbara), Sausalito (serving Marin, Sonoma, Napa and the Bay Area) as well as Aspen, Colorado.  After spending the past 15 years in real estate development and representing vacation properties in Aspen, I decided to chase my dream to live near the water so built a fleet of Airstream travel trailers, which I rent to travelers seeking a West Coast adventure.  During my "down" time, I buy, sell and customize vintage Airstreams to be used for corporate events, romantic couples getaways, family vacations, extra guest lodging at your home or winery and just about anything else you can dream of.

The fleet consists of late model Airstreams.  With a proper tow vehicle and experience, we allow you to hitch up and take with you.  If you don't have a sufficient tow vehicle, we can help locate one through a rental company otherwise we have a network of drivers who can delivery/setup/pick up so you have a truly turn key glamping experience.

Please feel free to contact me with any additional questions as look forward to helping you plan your next adventure!

Godspeed,
Christopher

properties.name: Gypsy Cabin nestled in the Malibu Mtn Wine Country
properties.summary: Cozy Gypsy Cabin (camping trailer) on horse property in the Malibu Mtn Wine Country. Get away from the traffic and the city madness and spend some time sipping wine and watching the sunset in the beautiful Malibu Mtns. The Gypsy Cabin is an ideal destination for wine tasting, hiking, mtn biking, street cycling, beach going or just relaxing in peaceful seclusion. Experience the magic of the Santa Monica Mountain Range all year round. We are 10 miles from Malibu and 5 miles from the 101 freeway.
properties.space: The Gypsy Cabin has everything you need! It has a full kitchen (gas oven/stove, fridge/freezer, microwave, toaster, coffee maker, etc.). It has a full bathroom (granted, it's a camping trailer, so the shower and toilet are small). There is a comfy double bed with a memory foam topper and the couch and dining table both fold out into twin beds. Unfortunately there is NO wifi so bring a book and enjoy unplugging from the matrix :-).
properties.description: Cozy Gypsy Cabin (camping trailer) on horse property in the Malibu Mtn Wine Country. Get away from the traffic and the city madness and spend some time sipping wine and watching the sunset in the beautiful Malibu Mtns. The Gypsy Cabin is an ideal destination for wine tasting, hiking, mtn biking, street cycling, beach going or just relaxing in peaceful seclusion. Experience the magic of the Santa Monica Mountain Range all year round. We are 10 miles from Malibu and 5 miles from the 101 freeway. The Gypsy Cabin has everything you need! It has a full kitchen (gas oven/stove, fridge/freezer, microwave, toaster, coffee maker, etc.). It has a full bathroom (granted, it's a camping trailer, so the shower and toilet are small). There is a comfy double bed with a memory foam topper and the couch and dining table both fold out into twin beds. Unfortunately there is NO wifi so bring a book and enjoy unplugging from the matrix :-). You are more than welcome to wander the lower part of the property
properties.neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood, if you could call it a neighborhood consists of homes scattered throughout the mountains. There are a couple homes on adjacent properties but you will feel like you are peacefully secluded and privately tucked away in your own mountain world.
properties.notes: Unfortunately there is NO wifi so bring a book and enjoy unplugging from the matrix :-).  There is one horse that we let wander the property because he is old and doesn't stray far.
properties.transit: If you do not have your own transportation Uber/Lyft or local Taxi companies can pick you up and drop you off. But since I am slightly off the beaten path there can be a 15-30 min wait time for pick ups.
properties.access: You are more than welcome to wander the lower part of the property but there is a small cottage attached to the barn that will most likely be booked so please be respectful of other guests privacy.  I ask that you do not go up to the main house area which starts at the cement driveway and definitely stay out of the main house backyard which is clearly fenced off cause we have big dogs that are aggressive to people they do not know.
properties.interaction: I'll usually give my guests space and let them check in and check out on there own but I am always up for socializing. If I am around when you are I will say hi and see if you need anything. I am available from 9am to 10pm for questions and concerns via airbnb, text or phone. If there is a house emergency please contact me anytime.
properties.house_rules: -No smoking in trailer  -No open flame on the property  -No children younger than 18 (infants by request only) -Do not feed or pet the horses. They are rescues and can be unfriendly to strangers.  -Quiet time after 10pm  -You may stroll the property but please respectful of other guests privacy in barn area.  -You must specify how many will be in your party and if you will be having any visitors.

properties.name: A Surfer and Beach Lover's Paradise
properties.summary: Best value on the beach in Malibu, just off legendary Latigo Point.  Surf, BBQ on the beach, fish, play tennis, enjoy the hot tub and pool - resort living at apartment prices.  Perfect for a couple looking for a great getaway and to test Malibu life!
properties.space: We moved here in 2007 with the intent of just staying a few months.  We now know we could never live anywhere else.  It's such a special space.  If you are a beach lover as we are, you will love this place and our neighbors.
properties.description: Best value on the beach in Malibu, just off legendary Latigo Point.  Surf, BBQ on the beach, fish, play tennis, enjoy the hot tub and pool - resort living at apartment prices.  Perfect for a couple looking for a great getaway and to test Malibu life! We moved here in 2007 with the intent of just staying a few months.  We now know we could never live anywhere else.  It's such a special space.  If you are a beach lover as we are, you will love this place and our neighbors. We have a large closet and all the bedroom dressers available for renters.  The kitchen is small but functional.  If you are looking for luxury, this is not for you.  But if you love the sand and surf, you won't find a better location at this price. We are always available via (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN), text, or phone.  But we also have a dedicated manager, Tony, who owns a surfboard company, regularly teaches on Latigo Point, and lives just up the road who is always a great help.  He can also hook you up with surf l
properties.neighborhood_overview: Latigo cove is one of the last great family hide-a-ways in  Malibu.  On the ocean side of Pacific Coast Highway, just walking down the road gives you the feel you've stepped back into a 60's surf film.  The people here are warm, friendly and helpful.  And as a surf break, Latigo is known for it's welcoming atmosphere.  I lived in Los Angeles for 20 years and never felt I was home until we moved here.
properties.notes: This is our home.  We are musicians and work is taking us away for a while.  We have a 1906 Steinway upright in the bedroom and Gold and Platinum records on the walls.  We are so glad to share this little piece of heaven.
properties.transit: There is a bus stop at the end of the road that can take you up and down PCH, but this is California - a car is needed.  We have one parking spot available, possibly 2 depending on the week.
properties.access: We have a large closet and all the bedroom dressers available for renters.  The kitchen is small but functional.  If you are looking for luxury, this is not for you.  But if you love the sand and surf, you won't find a better location at this price.
properties.interaction: We are always available via (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN), text, or phone.  But we also have a dedicated manager, Tony, who owns a surfboard company, regularly teaches on Latigo Point, and lives just up the road who is always a great help.  He can also hook you up with surf lessons!
properties.house_rules: We all try to be great neighbors.  We all try to be quiet and respectful.  We don't allow smoking in the house.  We also have a no-shoes policy on the carpet as it's impossible to keep clean - off white carpet and the beach doesn't necessarily work well together.

properties.name: *Last Minute Special * Beachfront Home in Malibu!
properties.summary: Romantic and charming beachfront cottage home offers exquisite style and sophistication. Fully stocked kitchen with top of the line appliances and bar countertop, 2 large decks for entertaining, jacuzzi and outside shower. Endless coastline views.
properties.space: The house is located on the sand (on a private beach; no public access) and you can surf and paddle board right on our beach (surfboard, paddle board and boogie boards available for use).   House is located on a wet/dry beach depending on the high and low tides. That means that during high tide, the water will come up to the house and during low tide, you can go for walks along the beach, explore the tide pools, etc.  It's a good idea to check the tide chart at (URL HIDDEN) when planning your trip and days while staying here.  Also, during times of high surf, it can wash away sand, leaving the beach rocky.   Once you get here, you won't want to leave, but in case you do, you are just minutes from the Santa Monica Pier, the Malibu Country Mart/Lumberyard (fantastic shopping and restaurants), the Malibu Pier, Venice, and much more.

A large wrap around porch provides the perfect place to enjoy a morning cup of coffee or sunset glass of wine. Retreat into the beautiful Santa Monica Mountains above Malibu and find yourself a world away from Los Angeles in our comfortable guestroom suite. Private mountaintop guest studio with gorgeous canyon and ocean views, spacious bathroom with shower and Jacuzzi tub, wrap around porch, bedroom with very comfortable queen size bed, walk in closet storage area and private living room with large screen plasma TV. Microwave, mini fridge and coffee maker are also included in guestroom. The guest studio does not include a full kitchen, however, it is equipped with a microwave, refrigerator, coffeemaker and electric tea kettle. We also do not have cable TV. We do have a DVD player and cables for connecting your laptop to the large plasma TV for streaming. We also
properties.neighborhood_overview: Our home is surrounded by nature, located near the top of a mountain. The road up to our neighborhood is a curvy, scenic road with several places to pull over and take pictures of the mountains, canyons and ocean. We are approximately 10 minutes from the Pacific Coastal Highway in Malibu and only 20-30 minutes from Santa Monica and Venice Beach. We are also conveniently located within 15 minutes of Pepperdine University.
properties.notes: Our laundry room is available upon request.
properties.transit: You will need a car. We are located 10 minutes up a scenic, windy road from the PCH (Pacific Coastal Highway) and 20 minutes from the 101.
properties.access: Private mountaintop guest studio with gorgeous canyon and ocean views, spacious bathroom with shower and Jacuzzi tub, wrap around porch, bedroom with very comfortable queen size bed, walk in closet storage area and private living room with large screen plasma TV. Microwave, mini fridge and coffee maker are also included in guestroom. The guest studio does not include a full kitchen, however, it is equipped with a microwave, refrigerator, coffeemaker and electric tea kettle. We also do not have cable TV. We do have a DVD player and cables for connecting your laptop to the large plasma TV for streaming. We also provide seasonal fruit, snacks, soda and yogurt.
properties.interaction: We are world travelers who love to meet new people and introduce them to our warm family. We are happy to point out our favorite hiking and trail running spots and help our guests enjoy the beautiful, peaceful neighborhood that we love so much. Our guestroom is on the lower level of our personal home, but it is set up for privacy with a completely private entrance, bedroom, bathroom, living room and porch.  We also have two teenagers, and we enjoy hosting families with children. We can make suggestions for family friendly outings in the Malibu/ Santa Monica/ Los Angeles area.
properties.house_rules: We love our guests and hope they will feel at home in our home. Don't hesitate to let us know if there is anything you need. Because we live in a high fire risk area of California, we ask that all our guests please respect our wishes and not smoke at all while on the property.  We have a friendly cat who stays inside our house, but he is not allowed into the guest suite. We cannot accommodate your pets at this time.
properties.host_about: My husband Kip and I live in Malibu, California with our two children. I am a writer, a runner and a photographer. I make great oatmeal raisin cookies and love hiking in our mountains. Kip works as a computer engineer. He also enjoys playing guitar, surfing, riding motorcycles and sailing. We both love adventure, traveling and meeting new people.

properties.neighborhood_overview: We Are in Malibu on the La Costa Beach Hillside, a very private and quiet beach community. Malibu (/ˈmælɨbuː/) is an affluent beach city in Los Angeles County, California, United States. As of the 2010 census, the city population was 12,645. Malibu consists of a 21-mile (34 km)[8] strip of prime Pacific coastline. Nicknamed 'the 'Bu' by surfers and locals,[1][2][3] the community is famous for its warm, sandy beaches, and for being the home of many Hollywood movie stars and others associated with the entertainment industry. Signs around the city proclaim '27 miles of scenic beauty', referring to Malibu's original length of 27 miles (43 km) before the city was incorporated in 1991. Malibu's beaches include Surfrider Beach, Zuma Beach, Malibu Beach, Topanga Beach, Point Dume Beach and Dan Blocker Beach; its local parks include Malibu Bluffs Park[9] (formerly Malibu Bluffs State Park), Trancas Canyon Park, Las Flores Creek Park, and Legacy Park,[10] with neighboring parks Malibu Creek Stat
properties.notes: We have many local insider tips to the best beaches, the best hikes, the best places to eat.  We can give you tips for whats fun with kids, to where to go for the best drink, or the most romantic dinner.  We live near the home so if any issues come up we will be close by to help you as well.
properties.transit: A car is recommended.  We can arrange for you to be picked up and dropped off at the airport.
properties.access: As a guest you have full access to the entire home. The location of this home makes it highly desirable as well. It is 8 mile from Santa Monica, 3 miles to the large shopping area in Malibu, walking distance to the beach and a handful of delicious restaurants. It's the perfect balance of serenity and civilization.
properties.interaction: My grandfather built the house 'Eagle's Watch', that was designed by legendary architect Harry Gesner, so I take great pride in the home and take pleasure in others being able to enjoy such a marvelous location. I have been living in Malibu for 10 years, now with my husband and 3 children. My husband and I manage rental properties, we take pride in our properties and are responsive to any of our renters needs. Since we are local, we deal with our guests directly – from key exchanges, to cleaning, to repairs, and anything in between. All of our properties are fully furnished and have all the luxuries of home! We also have great local tips to help you make the best of your stay.
properties.house_rules: We have a document for house rules that must be signed as part of conditions of the stay.

properties.interaction: As much or as limited as the guest would like. This location offers the ultimate privacy. I'm 'unfamiliar places' and 'new things" challenged. Being thus 'challenged,' I'm aware of the frustrations that can accompany a vacation. So, I set things up so vacationers can 'hit the ground running.' My photos are unembellished. My video is unembellished. My booking process is dunce level simple. My follow up is compulsive every step of the way. I'm always accessible by phone, text or email. I provide a comprehensive printout for arrival. I've labeled light switches, fans, heaters and remote controls. I oversee cleaning. I oversee every turnover. I make certain everything is re-stocked, fully equipped and working. I refund security deposits promptly and make certain they clear. And I offer a 'repeat offender' discount for returning vacationers. My insight? It must be working because 25% of my vacationers are 'repeat offenders.'
properties.house_rules: There is a 300 party fee (per party) (7 or more adults including vacationers). Parties must be pre-approved and neighbors advised thereof. Otherwise, neighbors complain and/or call Sheriff's dept., Malibu City Licensing Dept. Pets are welcome, but there is a pet fee of 225 or 35/day, whichever is less (175 or 25/day if paid at booking). If you bring a pet, it is imperative you provide notice as cleaning regulations are substantially different.
properties.host_about: I reside in Venice and I'm referred to as a neighborhood developer. When I purchased the property in 1979, my friends thought I was crazy. Back then, Venice was a high crime, blighted area with little prospect of improvement. Now, everyone says I'm brilliant!. The truth is, I was simply lucky. The one thing I've learned over the years is if you have your choice between smart and lucky, take lucky.

properties.neighborhood_overview: This is Malibu! It's gorgeous. It has the most beautiful beaches and scenery. The people are lovely and friendly. You will likely see celebrities here - as well as dolphins, sea lions, pelicans and even whales (depending on season). Malibu has a small town feeling. Yet there are great restaurants and shops nearby. This house is located in the La Costa Beach area. Carbon Beach aka "Billionaires Beach", starts just 1 block away. Public access to Carbon Beach is just .2 miles away. Nobu is 1.2 miles away, Malibu Pier is 1.7 miles away. Malibu Lagoon State Beach is 2.0 miles away. Pepperdine University is 3.7 miles away (8 minutes drive).  Local farmers market is held each Sunday with wonderful fresh fruits and vegetables and another chance to rub shoulders with celebrities.
properties.notes: This house sits across PCH from the beach - it is an unobstructed view - please note it is not ON the beach. Getting to the beach requires crossing PCH and using public access to go to Carbon Beach (close, but no amenities), or Malibu Lagoon State Beach aka Surfrider Beach (2 miles away, with amenities: bathrooms, lifeguards, etc - Cost 12 admission)
properties.transit: Malibu has some limited public transportation, having your own car is recommended.
properties.access: Entire house, deck and yard as well as seperate studio below main house.
properties.interaction: I'm pretty "hands-off" but available by text, email or phone. I try to leave things set up and provide all info needed via email or in the FAQ binder you will find in unit.
properties.house_rules: We will email the rental agreement upon confirmed reservation.  Please respect our gorgeous house as you would your own. Absolutely No smoking, No pets, No parties. Special events: We have a strict no parties’ policy, and having a party will forfeit your deposit and possibly cause us to ask you to leave.  Additionally, the City of Malibu requires special event permits for any event if 15 or more people are anticipated to attend.  Failure to obtain a special event permit is subject to code enforcement and loss of security deposit. Check in after 4pm, checkout by 11am. 12% City of Malibu TOT tax will be added to quote.
properties.host_about: I've lived in Santa Monica since the mid 1990's.  I've always enjoyed the perfect weather, walking around the Promenade, and exploring great restaurants.

The pool is heated and you have what seems like your own walkway just a few steps to the pool. The tennis court is perfect and I play there often myself!

properties.host_about:
After numerous entertainment and consumer product innovations, Terence Davis opened Great Music Studio in Malibu, California in 1998. Terence became a composer of music scores and songs for movies, television and commercial jingles.  He is the owner of Great Music and Media recording studios and a full-service media corporation.  He was the founder of the Malibu Music Awards and the Malibu Symphony Orchestra. 
    Among Terence’s film credits are six songs and score music for National Lampoon’s “Holiday Reunion” starring Bryan Cranston and Judge Reinhold, “The Gift”, and “The Gambler, The Girl and The Gunslinger” which starred Dean Cain on the Hallmark Channel and the 2014 film “The Voice.”  His theater credits include the Malibu Stage Company’s production of “The Side Man” directed by Chris Hart in 2004, for which he received an Ovation Award Nomination from the LA Stage Alliance. He also produced Joan Steiger in “Collected Stories” in 2005, and was composer and sound designer for the Malibu Stage Company productions of “Glorious!” in 2008, “Diva” and “Looking For Normal” in 2010, and Three Tall Women, and “A Ride Down Mount Morgan” in 2011. He scored the musical “Mrs. Scrooge” for West of Broadway Productions 2010, and created music and sound design for “A Night at the Oscars” world premiere 2011 which featured his theme song “Night at the Oscars”, and the earlier Malibu Stage production of the “The Scene”. He created sound design for Victor Victoria, also at the Malibu Stage Company. He recently recorded the life story of Dick VanDyke for Random House as well as Ryan O’Neal’s “Both of Us”.  He also recorded with Kris Kristofferson, and performed the voiceovers for the last nine episodes of America’s Most Wanted with John Walsh. He’s worked with Meatloaf, Johnny Mandel, Cheryl Bentyne of Manhattan and recently is credited as a producer of Sarah Barielles and The Back Beats of NBC’s “Sing Off.” Terence worked with Lou Gossett Jr. and produced the music for the 2013 production of Blood Knot that Lou directed at the Malibu Playhouse. In 2015, he recorded and sang on Tim Janis’ The Button Girl for PBS, starring Dick VanDyke, Jane Seymour, and Kate Winslet.  
     Terence served 12 years on the board of directors for the Malibu Stage Company. He also served on Pepperdine University Crest Associates, and is the Chairman of the Malibu Symphony Association. He served on the Arts Task Force for the City of Malibu. He founded the Malibu Music Awards and the Malibu Music Festival. 
      In addition to his music career, he recently received a Master’s Degree in Nonprofits and Grant Writing. He has helped numerous nonprofits receive funding. Recently Terence brought a 125,000 Mobile Spay and Neuter Veterinary Bus to serve ten desert cities in California to reduce the numbers of unwanted pets and save animals from kill shelters. His motto is: “you work to earn a living, you give back to have a life

properties.neighborhood_overview: We are located in a high end, prestigious, peaceful, beachy and star studded neighborhood. We are just a short 10 minute walk to Point Dume State Beach, Zuma Beach, and a few minutes drive to some amazing hiking trails. There are many delicious restaurants, wineries and nightlife spots in the area.
properties.notes: Malibu has a very strict noise ordinance that prohibits loud noise after 10pm. Please do your part in respecting the communities wishes as well as keeping our neighbors happy, by keeping your noise to a minimum.
properties.transit: Parking includes 1 spot in our gated driveway. Any additional cars can park across the street - you'll get a ticket if you park on our side of the street! Keep in mind we live in a very safe neighborhood. There is a local bus that can take you through Malibu or in to Santa Monica, Venice or throughout Los Angeles. The bus stop is just around the corner.
properties.access: Our Guests will have access to the entire bungalow, yard, garden, and private patio.
properties.interaction: We are available to come and meet you, let you in and show you around...if you wish. Otherwise, we will respect your privacy and have a secured lock box with the keys to let yourselves in and a welcome booklet to inform you on everything you need to know, see and and do.
properties.house_rules: - Check in: 3 PM, Check out: 11 AM No parties. No more than the agreed amount of people at the house at any time. No loud music or noise (particularly past 10pm and in front). No smoking. No pets. You must rinse all sand off with a hose before entering. Please ensure front and side gates are closed at all times.

properties.house_rules: CAMPFIRES ARE NOT PERMITTED BY LAW DUE TO HIGH RISK OF WILDFIRES. SMOKING IS ALSO NOT PERMITTED. UNREGISTERED GUESTS or friends are not permitted to visit or 'hang out' on the property with guests without prior approval by hosts. Unfortunately we are not insured for unregistered guests. The short access road may not be suitable for all vehicles, especially in rainy weather, in which case we will be happy to drive you to/from the venue.  Pick up your groceries before you leave the center of Malibu at Ralph's ( Webb Way), Pavillion's (Heathercliff), or Vintage Grocers at Trancas Canyon (Best). If coming from 101 shop at Trader Joes on Thousand Oaks Blvd, or Vons and Sprouts on Agoura Road/Westlake Blvd.  We are 6.5 miles from any grocery stores and the fresh air WILL make you hungry! If you plan on eating prior to arrival there are lots of choices in Thousand Oaks and Westlake Village.
properties.host_about:
My wife and I are Christian, semi-retired film industry people who thrive on adventure and meeting interesting people. Over the past 15 years I've restored several vintage Airstream trailers and consider them the ultimate in camping comfort. One of my restorations now actually resides in Japan! 
We used to love to travel and camp in our 1957 'FLYING CLOUD' AIRSTREAM but now enjoy allowing others to share the experience without the hassle of driving, towing and fighting for a spot in a crowded and noisy campground. We live on a 40+ acre ranch property (with some overly friendly dogs and horses) in the Santa Monica Mountains- surrounded by thousands of acres of open space and direct access to the famous Backbone Trail, which is renowned for hiking, horseback and mountain bike riding. We are also only 6 miles from the glorious beaches of Malibu. Our hilltop location is the perfect deluxe camping experience, with ocean views, and base to enjoy this unique mountain range and Mediterranean climate which occurs in only 6 places in the world.

Throughout your huge beach home are beautiful wood floors and tasteful furnishings The Gourmet kitchen is a chef's delight. Explore the many places to gaze upon the Ocean or Stars above.

properties.name: Beachfront Luxury Romance, Near Santa Monica
properties.summary: Perfect for romance, creative inspiration & biz folk wanting to be close to Santa Monica. Watch seals and dolphins play, enjoy photo-op views to Catalina. At night, lights twinkle along SM Bay. Fireplace, large deck, all premium channels, fiber optic 'net, fast WiFi. High / low tides, tide pools and sand. Neighborhood beach access nearby. Private, serene. Beautifully maintained, full amenities, Frette robes, King and Queen beds. PCH turn lane to 2 parking. Keypad entry, no key to lose.
properties.space: This is a quiet place, not a party pad. We want you to relax and absolutely enjoy yourself and take in that beauty out there. Know that depending on the moon, the tides, and the seasons, the ocean is constantly changing. Sometimes she comes in a like a whisper, other times she's a powerhouse.  Sometimes the tide's out, and you can walk along the sand, other times it's rocks and surf. The kitchen is bright and spotless, with full appliances, stocked with basic spices and coffee, trash bags and paper towels. Bathroom is a brand new remodel. Dedicated washer/dryer in garage.

properties.neighborhood_overview: Big Rock and Tuna Canyons are just across the street, with miles of hiking trails that offer full-on 200 degree ocean views. Cholada Thai has some of the best Thai food in LA.  On low tide days, walk to Moonshadows. Uber to Nobu, Soho House, Mastro's. Rent kayaks, surf / paddle boards at Surfrider Beach.  PC Greens for nearest grocery shopping, AM/PM minimart at corner of PCH and Topanga, Cross Creek / Malibu Country Mart for celeb sightings and upscale shopping or surfers and tacos. (URL HIDDEN)
properties.transit: Pacific Coast Highway is busy, and turning left to the beach can be tricky.  Not so tricky here -- there's a turn lane just out front, and a nearby stoplight.  Much safer and low stress to wait for a red and make your move.
properties.access: This is the fully separate ground level residence in a 2 unit duplex, with it's own entrance. You come in from the street through gray gates, your front door is toward the ocean on the left. Keypad is left of door.
properties.interaction: Your call.  Glad to help and available reasonable hours, but we do not contact you unnecessarily.
properties.house_rules: - This is a low volume environment, working writers nearby! - 4 overnight occupants maximum, 3 additional  guests permitted to visit. - Ask about children & pets.  - No cigarette smoking inside or on deck.
properties.host_about:
I'm still awed by dolphins swimming by though I see them nearly every day. I love watching the seals come close to the house to watch us. And there's nothing like looking up from your computer to see a boat sailing by, folks kayaking or paddle boarding. I never tire of this living, constantly changing sea.

I'll do my best to make your stay just what you hope it to be.

properties.neighborhood_overview: THE LOCATION Perched right on the golden sands of Malibu, you’d be forgiven for not wanting to be anywhere but home! When you do wish to wander, why not start by heading down to Malibu Pier, 2.7 miles along the coast, where you can charter a fishing boat, whale watch, or simply kick back in the restaurant and admire the view. Shops and cafes abound just 2 miles along Malibu Road. Head further afield to Getty Villa, which shows off stunning architecture and justly famous gardens 9 miles away. Malibu’s beaches attract everyone from Hollywood stars to international surfers. properties.name: Glamping in Malibu ~ Travel Trailer
properties.summary: Stay in our comfortable travel trailer which has private parking inside a gated Estate with 360 views of the Malibu Mountains. It has a new shower, new toilet, new mini blinds, carpet, double bed & two bunk beds. It is an older model but spotlessly clean. If you are the sort of guest who is looking for something more sophisticated we have other suites, an apartment and guest house on same property. It is typically suitable for couples with kids who want an upgrade from a camping in a tent.
properties.space: This travel trailer is small but comfortable and you will enjoy as much privacy as you wish. You access the trailer through the main gates and it is parked in a tree shaded spot at the North end of the property. The trailer has shared Wi Fi and we can provide you with a hard telephone line if you need one. We ask that you be respectful of our older very friendly dogs who live on the property. You are well away from the main residence and the guest house but our house manager lives in the adjacent trailer and is there to help out if you need anything.  On another note is this is an older camper and as such it doesn't have all the bells and whistles of new RV. It's clean and well kept and has heating and AC and yes a radio! how quaint.
properties.description: Stay in our comfortable travel trailer which has private parking inside a gated Estate with 360 views of the Malibu Mountains. It has a new shower, new toilet, new mini blinds, carpet, double bed & two bunk beds. It is an older model but spotlessly clean. If you are the sort of guest who is looking for something more sophisticated we have other suites, an apartment and guest house on same property. It is typically suitable for couples with kids who want an upgrade from a camping in a tent. This travel trailer is small but comfortable and you will enjoy as much privacy as you wish. You access the trailer through the main gates and it is parked in a tree shaded spot at the North end of the property. The trailer has shared Wi Fi and we can provide you with a hard telephone line if you need one. We ask that you be respectful of our older very friendly dogs who live on the property. You are well away from the main residence and the guest house but our house manager lives in the adjacent tra
properties.neighborhood_overview: Corral Canyon is a very close knit neighborhood and we all look out for each other. Malibu has world class dining, shopping, art galleries and we are next door to Pepperdine. There is a gas station and a mini mart at the bottom of our street. The beach is 9 minutes away. We are in the Malibu wine tasting  zone and we can suggest tasting rooms and wine tours plus of course we have many family friendly cafes and coffee shops. Ask Geraldine for suggestions and she will steer you well. There is the Getty Villa, iconic Malibu Pier, Point Dume and Zuma beach for frolicking in the surf or walk along the sand.
properties.notes: This travel trailer is very comfortable but small and cozy. Best for a couple with 1-2 children. It is very tight for 4 adults but it has been done before. Convenient meals or use of the microwave is prefect. The kitchen is too small for gourmet cooking. The shower and bathroom are very small (think airplane sized) but the water is hot and plentiful. Great spot for a home base after a day at the beach, wine tastings etc, and at the fraction of the cost of a hotel. We also have a guest house and two private suites on the property available through Airbnb but at a much higher price. Just to give you an idea the RV park close by charges 130 plus plus per night and you have to bring your own RV. If you are the type of person who is "allergic" to wildlife or used to staying at the Ritz Carlton, this is not the place for you. Our neighborhood is home to deer, raccoons, foxes, rabbits, hawks, coyotes, hummingbirds, crickets, butterflies, and other critters.
properties.transit: You will need a car to get around Malibu.Its so rural that public transportation doesn't really apply. Just another note we had a recent guest who thought that she was renting a trailer to drive around in and of course this is not the case.
properties.access: You will have access to the hiking and walking trails on the 250 acres property. There is a citrus orchard so help yourself to fresh lemons. You do not need to get into your car to go hiking as we are on 250 acres of pristine land. There is a picnic area. Feel free to walk around the hiking trails on the property.
properties.interaction: Your interaction with our family will be limited as we are all very busy. Our property manager lives in the RV next to the travel trailer. He is very quiet and private. That said we are very friendly and welcome a friendly chat over coffee or a glass of wine. We do not smoke and since we are in a high fire zone we do not allow smoking. Geraldine owns several restaurants so please feel free to ask about dining and wine tasting attractions and activities. Two property managers are usually around to help out and answer questions.
properties.house_rules: I am delighted you have chosen to visit, whether it's business or vacation, I want you to enjoy your visit and the beautiful 250 acre property.  I have a few reqhttps://www.airbnb.com/helpuests and a few suggestions to make your stay the best it can possibly be.  First and very important is check in. Once I send you the directions please actually read them before you get into your car because the Corral Canyon part of your drive does not work too well with GPS or WAZE. And I promise you will get lost.  Another consideration is that once we agree on an arrival window of time to please honor that as this is not the kind of Estate where we can leave out a key in a lockbox.  We need to check you in personally, so if we agree you're arriving between 4 and 5 pm can you please do that unless you've hit murderous traffic or your airline was delayed which we totally understand. We do make special arrangements to greet you so please respect that we have other things to attend to and our staff ha
properties.host_about: I am a chef, author, restaurateur and philanthropist, and I arrived in Los Angeles from Northern Ireland in 1975, to begin my career in the culinary industry.  My  culinary expertise encompasses an international diversity including Indian, Chinese, Mexican, Japanese, French and, of course, Contemporary California and Irish. I have been featured in the L.A. Times, Fine Cooking Magazine, and Bon Appetit Magazine named (URL HIDDEN) of the top six chefs in the United States”. Today, I own two  distinctively different restaurants on Main Street in Santa Monica,California: Lula Cocina Mexicana, a bold, bright and colorful cantina famous for its murals painted by artist Eloy Torrez, and Signature Lula Margaritas;and Finn McCool's Irish Pub, boasting a beautiful bar shipped painstakingly over from Ireland through the Panama (URL HIDDEN) 1995, I  built my dream home, Rancho Chiquita, nestled high in the Malibu Mountains.  Rancho Chiquita overlooks a spectacular panoramic ocean view and 250 acres of rolling hills, and is host to many Charity Fundraising Events, Weddings , Private Cooking Classes , and Film and Movie Shoots. I am an avid advocate on behalf of the protection and rehabilitation of animals, and I share my home with a multitude of Rescue Dogs.

Take in the beautiful ocean view from the front balcony while enjoying the fresh ocean air. Or relax in the back patio where you can take in the view of the Santa Monica Mountains while enjoying a meal or glass of wine. And it's only a 3 minute walk to the beach.

The Master bedroom is a Queen size Reverie Adjustable bed with tempurpedic Cloud mattress. This room also conveniently has a newly renovated bathroom attached to the Master bedroom. The second bedroom has a Full tempurpedic Cloud mattress. The second bedroom has a detached bathroom which is a bath/shower.

properties.name: The Outpost Malibu
properties.summary: The Outpost Malibu is an expansive 1.5+ acre multi-dwelling estate on one of Malibu's most coveted & private locations, Encinal Bluffs. The 3 bedroom, 2.5 bath ocean view upper residence with a pool is positioned at the top of the bluff & is nestled amongst lush landscaping. When you're ready to hit the beach just enter the funicular tram which will transport you to a magical Polynesian beach house. The 2 bedroom, 2.5 bath indoor/outdoor beach house. The beach house has its own pool & spa.
properties.space: Amenities include a resort style pool, spa, sauna, organic vegetable garden and championship tennis court. The beach itself is one of the most exclusive and private coves on the west coast and is perfect for swimming, surfing, kayaking or lounging on the sand. The Outpost Malibu offers full time maid service, a specialized vegetable gardener growing a wide variety of up to fifty vegetables, on-call maintenance man & a local concierge service who can arrange for a private chef, event catering, yoga instructors, beauticians, massage therapists and tennis and surf instructors.

properties.name: Paradise Cove View Guest house
properties.space: Private upstairs guest house overlooking Paradise Cove, Malibu.  One bedroom, full bath and well equipped kitchen.  Two balcony patios overlooking rolling hills to the ocean. Have your morning coffee on the balcony and then wander off to explore beautiful Malibu and the greater Los Angeles area. You will be about a half mile walk to Paradise Cove Beach, or from 2 miles (Zuma Beach) to 7 miles (Malibu Beach) from world famous beaches.  If you like to hike, we are walking distance from California State and National parklands that offer beautiful and varied terrains for hiking or biking (or horseback riding). We are a mile or less from restaurants, and grocery stores, and 6 miles from "downtown" Malibu, where you will find movie theaters, shops and restaurants. Two large comfy couches in living room can be made up as beds for two additional guests (total max 4 guests) and would be approximately twin bed sized each.
