You will be about a half mile walk to Paradise Cove Beach, or from 2 miles (Zuma Beach) to 7 miles (Malibu Beach) from world famous beaches.  If you like to hike, we are walking distance from California State and National parklands that offer beautiful and varied terrains for hiking or biking (or horseback riding). We are a mile or less from restaurants, and grocery stores, and 6 miles from "downtown" Malibu, where you will find movie theaters, shops and restaurants. Two large comfy couches in living room can be made up as beds for two additional guests (total max 4 guests) and would be approximately twin bed sized each.
properties.house_rules: We live nearby on the same premises, and would expect that guests maintain the courtesy and quiet that we enjoy now.  There is no smoking, no pets allowed. We would appreciate beach sand being washed off in the outdoor shower so as to avoid clogging the drains.  Guests would have their own hours and will have their own key and parking space.
properties.host_about: My husband and I like to be outdoors...hiking, riding, playing beach volleyball take up much of our free time.  We like to travel, and have had fun meeting people from other places who come to stay at our guesthouse. While we like to visit the city, we enjoy the peace and quiet of living in a more rural area full time.

properties.access: Guests have complete, exclusive access to the three buildings in this gated property: main house, guest house (30 ft from main house) and detached gym. There is private parking for 10 cars around the house.
properties.interaction: Guests have total privacy and exclusive access to the three buildings: main house, guest house and detached gym. We live in Los Angeles and are available 24/7 if guests need assistance. Many celebrities have stayed at this very private property. Guests check in and out on their own at their convenience, without us being there. We leave the gate controller and keys to the house for guests in a secure spot.
properties.house_rules: Malibu City hall has a strict noise ordinance: no noise after 10 PM, and they enforce it. Thank you for your cooperation! One party for up to 15 is allowed without written permission from the Owner. For larger parties, let's talk before you book!>
properties.host_about:
I came from France to the US in 1979. and moved from Manhattan to Malibu in 94.That year, I bought a beautiful celebrity house  in Malibu and remodeled it in a style of "South of France meets old Malibu". I lived 13 happy years there. In 2007, I moved to Los Angeles.  I own a digital marketing agency here in Los Angeles, and enjoy the terrific weather and nature around this vibrant city. Since 2005, more than 200 guests have stayed at the Malibu property, including many celebrities, and left many positive reviews.
In 2015, I acquired 2 properties in LA, one in mid-City and the other near the Culver City Arts District. Both are beautiful homes, available for short-term rental. I very much enjoy welcoming guests from all around the world, and hearing that they enjoyed their stay!
I look forward to your visit!

properties.space: This studio suite is roomy and comfortable, freshly remodeled, well-lit, clean and airy.  It has plenty of closet and drawer space.  It is complete with a new, luxurious King-sized bed & bedding.  The 3/4 bath includes a beautifully designed spacious shower, big enough for 2! The unit opens onto a delightful and secluded, sunny patio, ideal for relaxing (or the computer, if you've brought the office with  you), dining, BBQing, etc. Overall this is a wonderful spot to enjoy the art of relaxing!

properties.neighborhood_overview: Welcome to the quiet and old-established neighborhood of Malibu Park.  Enjoy a world of tree-lined streets, horse properties and awesome hiking/biking/running trails.  This well-known portion of Malibu, just a 1/2 mile uphill from Pacific Coast Hgwy. overlooks the 2-mile stretch of world-famous Zuma Beach.  Multiple other renowned beaches, Surfrider, Little Dume, Westward, Matador and Leo Carillo are nearby. We are within 1-2miles of 3 West Malibu shopping centers, which include markets, cafes, restaurants, coffee shops, gyms, ocean sport equipment rental, and other misc. small businesses.
properties.notes: There are no laundry facilities available.
properties.transit: If you'd like the option to avoid driving, the public Metro bus stop is located at the bottom of nearby Busch Dr. and Pacific Coast Hwy. You can bus the entire P.C.H. from Trancas Cyn. to downtown Santa Monica. Of course, there is plenty of Uber service available in Malibu.
properties.access: Begin your visit by parking in your designated parking spot.  Follow the brick garden path directly to your suite.  Although this studio suite is attached to the far end of a private home, guests will enjoy their own secluded entrance and patio, complete with a 36" Weber BBQ.
properties.interaction: Both Dana and/or Cynthia are available when needed throughout your visit.

The Grotto is a lovely studio apartment which comes complete with queen sized bed, private patio, full kitchen, full bathroom, fully private.   The Grotto is a dwelling on a 10 acre property with other homes. The property offers a beautiful and inspirational landscape surrounded by gardens and hillsides with spectacular ocean views. Your stay in The Grotto affords you access to much of the grounds, to maximize your experience for peaceful thought, romance, artistic pursuits and your enjoyment of the beauty and tranquility that surrounds. properties.name: Secluded Malibu Guest House
properties.summary: This peaceful guest house, with separate access from the back road through the luscious serene garden is a cherished tucked away paradise away from the crazy crowds and traffic, yet just 3 minutes away from the beach.
properties.space: Beautiful waterfall and ocean view hiking trails start right from the gate. Hike, mountain-bike, kayak, SUP, surf  or just bask in the sun and then enjoy the delicious and varied Malibu restaurants or go on wine tasting adventures.
properties.description: This peaceful guest house, with separate access from the back road through the luscious serene garden is a cherished tucked away paradise away from the crazy crowds and traffic, yet just 3 minutes away from the beach. Beautiful waterfall and ocean view hiking trails start right from the gate. Hike, mountain-bike, kayak, SUP, surf  or just bask in the sun and then enjoy the delicious and varied Malibu restaurants or go on wine tasting adventures. You can also enjoy the hot tub set on the lower deck in the back yard. We are a call away if you need anything during your stay. We want you to enjoy your experience here and fall in love with Malibu just like we did many years ago. You have 1 parking spot, next to the gate leading to the guest house. Please park as close as possible to the fence in that carved up nook. There's no public transportation up in the canyon, but uber/lyft/taxi can easily get you where you need to go.

properties.host_about: Cristina and I have been living in Malibu for a long time and we've seen it change through the years. We love the water and spend a lot of time at the beach with friends and family, and we also enjoy our time away from the crowds in our serene home and neighborhood. Good music, great wine and fun company!

properties.name: Relaxed Family Home on Pt.Dume
properties.summary: A comfortable family home with key to private beach on Pt. Dume. On 1 acre surrounded by trees. Lots of windows and 2 large sunny decks. Short walk/ drive to Paradise Cove, Zuma Beach, stores, restaurants, markets all within 5 min.drive. Perfect !
properties.space: This family-friendly home is comfortable, private, and full of windows and light. Blend of inside and outside living spaces, lots of  birds, trees , flowering shrubs and tranquility.  *Two bedrooms with one queen-sized bed in each bedroom and a narrow child-sized window-seat bed in one of the rooms.  *Large sun room with sound system, television, and picture window . *Redwood sun deck adjacent to sun room.  *Living room with twin sofas, swing bench, piano, and desk.  *Dining room with wall of windows and seating for six.  *Kitchen with new stove, microwave and dishwasher.  *Second larger redwood deck with two tables and seating for 8 off kitchen - wonderful spot to drink morning coffee surrounded by trees, flowers and birds.
properties.description: A comfortable family home with key to private beach on Pt. Dume. On 1 acre surrounded by trees. Lots of windows and 2 large sunny decks. Short walk/ drive to Paradise Cove, Zuma Beach, stores, restaurants, markets all within 5 min.drive. Perfect ! This family-friendly home is comfortable, private, and full of windows and light. Blend of inside and outside living spaces, lots of  birds, trees , flowering shrubs and tranquility.  *Two bedrooms with one queen-sized bed in each bedroom and a narrow child-sized window-seat bed in one of the rooms.  *Large sun room with sound system, television, and picture window . *Redwood sun deck adjacent to sun room.  *Living room with twin sofas, swing bench, piano, and desk.  *Dining room with wall of windows and seating for six.  *Kitchen with new stove, microwave and dishwasher.  *Second larger redwood deck with two tables and seating for 8 off kitchen - wonderful spot to drink morning coffee surrounded by trees, flowers and birds. Guests have acces
properties.neighborhood_overview: Guests can walk to Paradise Cove Beach or Pt. Dume Beach Preserve when the tide is low. There are many hiking trails within minutes of the house in the Santa Monica Mountain National Recreation Area. Find maps of this area in the house.
properties.notes: We ask that you use the outdoor heated shower to rinse off sand from the beach before entering the house . We have sand toys and small boogie boards available for kids.   We enjoy living in a rural neighborhood. We often hear coyotes howling at night and roosters crowing in the morning. Our neighbor keeps chickens and sometimes has fresh eggs and vegetables available for purchase.
properties.transit: Plenty of parking in driveway. Easy drive to grocery, shops, cafes (5 min), Santa Monica (25 min), the Getty Villa (10 min) and the Getty Museum (45 min), and LAX (45 min). There is a Rapid Transit District bus stop on Hwy 1 near the top of our cul-de-sac for easy public transportation. Uber, taxis, car rental are also plentiful.
properties.access: Guests have access to entire house as described. There is a storage area and private rooms which are locked. Our manager who lives next door can open the storage room where we keep boogie boards and beach toys. 200 will be deducted from the security deposit for lost beach key. Please leave the house , beach key and decal on the kitchen window sill when you leave. There are also close by public beaches. Paradise Cove, Zuma Beach and Westward Beach are a 5 min drive away. Malibu Lagoon and Malibu Pier are 10 min. drive as are the Country Mart with high end shopping and Pepperdine University with concerts, plays and other cultural events. The Getty Villa and the historic Adamson Beach House are close by.
properties.interaction: Our neighbor manages our property and will be able to answer any questions and assist you if any problems arise.  There is an additional guest house on the property. It is occupied and we ask you to respect our tenants privacy. Please keep quiet hour after 10 PM. Absolutely no loud late night parties. Our neighbors love the peaceful, quiet serenity of this unique neighborhood.
properties.house_rules: We belong to a homeowners association which has rules regarding access to  the private beach lot and safety at the beach. These rules are posted in the kitchen. Please be sure to read them before enjoying the beach. Absolutely No Smoking on premises. Fire danger is very high in Malibu. Although we have a fire place and a wood burning stove they may not be used because of safety and air quality issues.  Lost beach key will result in in 200 deduction from your security deposit. We have another guest house on our property which is rented full time. We ask that you keep quiet hours after 10 PM. and respect the privacy of our tenants. Beach Key and Decal  must be left on kitchen window sill when you leave to avoid 200 key loss fee.  During the summer there is a guard at the gate to the beach you will need to show decal and key and identify yourself as a guest giving the name of your host and lot # No pets are allowed at my home or on the beach.
properties.host_about:
I am a retired school teacher and my husband Tom is a retired physicist. We enjoy travel and often stay in air bnb homes.
 Our home in Malibu has been in my family for more than 50 years. It was built in the 1940's and we have added rooms as our family grew. We enjoy swimming, tide pooling and snorkeling at  the beach and hiking the near by trails, when the house is not occupied by guests we enjoy visiting with our grand daughter and family.

properties.name: Malibu Beach Charm
properties.summary: An easy way to have an amazing local Malibu experience!  We are a vibrant, artistic household and love to meet new people.  We will welcome your into our family.  This is a place to relax, to surf, to hike, or to join us for a meal.
properties.space: This is a large bedroom/bathroom in a charming, bohemian home. Julia and her family will be your host in their artsy home, which includes a large kitchen, dining room, and lots of outdoor living in a great atmosphere.  Please note, this is an older home - an original "ranch style" Malibu house.  Everything is perfectly clean and well maintained with love, but is not a "Holiday Inn."   Julia will make sure you are comfortable and have everything you need for a relaxing stay at our home. There is a small refrigerator, coffee maker and set up in your room.  I will supply you with beach towels and an umbrella - even a stand up paddle if you want to give it a go.

Julia will make sure you are comfortable and have everything you need for a relaxing stay at our home. There is a small refrigerator, coffee maker and set up in your room.  I will supply you with beach towels and an umbrella - even a stand up paddle if you want to give it a go. You will have access to the kitchen and laundry.  There is wifi.  We don't have regular TVs in this
properties.neighborhood_overview: There is nothing quite like Malibu.  A small, very exclusive community with incredible beaches and amazing mountains close by.  Fantastic restaurants and a very unique beach scene.
properties.notes: A special treat is that we have a professional licensed massage therapist in the house who can be booked for massages, if desired.   (Of course, this is not included in the price of the room, but can be booked directly with her based on her availability.) You are welcome to use our beach umbrella, towels, blankets and baskets for beach picnics.  Don't forget your bathing suit!
properties.transit: There is a bus that travels up and down Pacific Coast Highway every half hour, and then every hour on the weekends.  People are very successful staying here using Uber Cars to get around, as well.   And, if I'm available, I'm happy to drop anyone off anywhere if they don't have a car.
properties.access: You will have access to the kitchen and laundry.  There is wifi.  We don't have regular TVs in this house, but I can make available a large iMac if you would like to stream movies or TV shows with our Netflix account in your room.
properties.interaction: My family and I live in the house so there will be someone here most times, however we can interact with you as little or as much as you would like.  We love to visit with our guests, and learn about them, maybe over coffee or a glass of wine, and breakfast can be a spontaneous combustion of fun.  I am always available to help find things to do in the area - great restaurants, the best surf breaks, hiking trails, shopping, etc.    We have a small, very friendly dog who adopts all those who visit and a cat who lives both outside and inside, and is also very affectionate.  You might be surprised to see a California desert tortoise roaming around the backyard in the summer time. She is also friendly and will come over for a visit if she thinks you might have something for her to eat. I teach music and singing for a living and typically teach in the afternoons, so there is usually music in the house.  This has never bothered any guests so far, because usually they are out and about during
properties.house_rules: There is no smoking inside the house, but there is an area where we absolutely don't mind. The beach rules have to be strictly observed which includes a limited number of guests, etc.

properties.name: 5 bd Malibu waterfront
properties.summary: Due to the place and manner in which the property is situated, this villa is almost totally private and secluded, despite being directly on the beach and water.

properties.host_about: Hi, I'm Mary. My focus is always on guest satisfaction.  I have over 14 years in the hospitality industry, and want to assure a personalized, guest-centered vacation for you.  I love the Miami area and can't wait to welcome you to share in the sun, fun, food and shopping that is Miami-and that I can share with you from personal experience.

properties.name: Malibu Luxury Retreat
properties.summary: Need a couple days away? An executive in town for a few days and could use some brain space between meetings? This part of Malibu is only 20 minutes from Santa Monica or a hop over the hill to the 101 Corridor (Woodland Hills, Agoura, Westlake) and will astound you with pure rural mountain magic you never knew existed in Los Angeles. Gourmet kitchen, quiet decks. Sprawling lawns under ancient oaks. Truly.
properties.space: For just a weekend away or for the executive who comes to Los Angeles often, this is the perfect luxury respite. Only a 20 minute drive from Santa Monica, this is the most accessible part of Malibu to Los Angeles. Owned by an executive who travels to NYC often and craves a space of her own when traveling, this private entranced downstairs room in a contemporary Malibu 5000-square foot home features a beautiful king size bed, warm wood floors and a sliding glass door that opens to pastoral mountains views. Includes a private bathroom with huge European-styled shower, antique fixtures in a super high ceiling contemporary styling. Wake to the sound of birds, lull to sleep listening to frogs and coyotes; the two acre property under a canopy of ancient oaks is in a canyon 2 miles from the beach. Share the magnificently spread out and gourmet kitchen and living space and fireplace. The kitchen features gourmet accoutrements, Subzero fridge and cooks stove and eating area looks through high c

properties.neighborhood_overview: This property is across the canyon from a tiny neighborhood of about 10 houses, yet it's only 2 miles from PCH. Super accessible, yet feels like a million miles away.
properties.transit: You'll need a car, or you can use Uber, but you'll appreciate having your own wheels to tool around Malibu, find hiking trails or get down to the Malibu Kitchen or Sunlife Juices for an awesome breakfast, a power lunch at Nobu or dinner at Mastro's Ocean Club just down the street.
properties.access: A full gourmet kitchen, private entry, washer/dryer, covered parking.
properties.house_rules: Absolutely no smoking - under any circumstances. This is a highly flammable rural area.
properties.host_about: Alyson Dutch is a product PR launch specialist. The author of the PR Handbook for Entrepreneurs, she has launched everything from fingertip toothbrushes to bras that eliminate visible bra lines. She’s also worked with many brands you know from Metabolife to Mrs. Fields Cookies, Perrier Jouet Champagne to Swatch. She is the CEO of Malibu California based Brown + Dutch Public Relations, the founder of “speed dating for products and press,” Consumer Product Events and author of the (URL HIDDEN) In her spare, time, she serves as a mentor to entrepreneurs as a board member of the Small Business Association's SCORE program and is a ski patroller in the local mountains of Southern California.

properties.name: Enjoy Malibu, newly remodeled home
properties.summary: Everything brand new, including all bathrooms and kitchen. House has lots of light, ocean view, in/out living, new saline pool, play bocce in front yard. Fantastic location, 5 minutes from beach, shopping, center of Malibu, right next to Pepperdine.
properties.description: Everything brand new, including all bathrooms and kitchen. House has lots of light, ocean view, in/out living, new saline pool, play bocce in front yard. Fantastic location, 5 minutes from beach, shopping, center of Malibu, right next to Pepperdine.
properties.host_about: We are a family with 2 kids, one in college and one in High School.  We have lived in Malibu for 16 years and love it here. We work hard and in our free time love to travel, entertain, spend time with friends, play tennis, do yoga, go to the beach, and hike in the Santa Monica mountains.  My husband is from Italy so family, friends, good food, and travel is important to us. We just finished remodeling the house and love the way it came out. Our home is important to us. We rented our house out only once before, before the remodel and had a very positive experience. Looking forward to another chance to share our home with other great people.

properties.name: Zuma Sanctuary Malibu Retreat: Excela Airstream
properties.summary: Our most luxurious and recently remodled 1974 Airstream sits looking over the Pacific Ocean in the front and a beautiful canyon in the back. Only a short walk to Malibu's best (and some secret) beaches and short drive to amazing parks for hiking and exploring.  Our property has 2 Aistreams and 2 Lotus Belle tents that can be rented separately or all together.  We have a BBQ deck for grilling, yoga deck, hammock zone, sunset chairs and hot outdoor shower.  Search Zuma Sanctuary to see them all.
properties.space: We invite you to stay in our 1974 luxury 31ft remodeled Airstream Excela (1 queen sized bed in a private back bedroom and one king size bed in the front when you drop the table down.  Complete with a roomy bathroom, ocean view couch/lounge/dining area, refrigerator, gas range and even the kitchen sink.  Located on our ocean view lot you'll be fully surrounded by nature: the Pacific Ocean out front and Santa Monica Mountains behind you.  You'll arrive to a decorated and equipped space to offer you an amazing time: cotton sheets, kitchen utensils, our favorite organic Dr. Bronner's soaps.  You'll also enjoy watching Malibu's landmark sunset from our magical yoga deck located in front of your airstream, or from our easy accessed mountain deck. Plus, a lounge deck can be used as you wish: to practice yoga, to read on a hammock or to just enjoy some downtime under a beautiful ficus tree.

properties.neighborhood_overview: Our 16-acre Sanctuary offers privacy and proximity to the best beaches Malibu has to offer.
properties.notes: We will assess an EXTRA 50 cleaning fee if the trailer and space is not left clean (as it was found).
properties.transit: We are just a few miles from Zuma Beach where there is bus service from Santa Monica, but most of your time here you will be on foot exploring local beaches and mountains or going to close destinations by car. You call it!
properties.access: The entire 31 foot trailer will be yours for your rental. You'll be instructed on how to enter our property through our private gated entrance.
properties.interaction: If possible we'll greet you to give you the lay of the land, beach access, local state parks for hiking, biking, local stores, restaurants  and other tips and we'll assist you if you have any questions.
properties.house_rules: Our House Rules: - Please leave the trailer in the condition you found it- clean!  -No extra guests without permission and payment; -No photo or video shoots without permission and applicable fees (contact us to discuss); -No smoking inside the trailer - Absolutely no fires  - No parties without our consent and applicable fees (contact us). - No shoes worn inside the trailer please; - No chemicals or objects beyond toilet paper are allowed flushed down the drain or toilet (We - and Malibu - run on a delicate septic system so please just TP down the toilette); - If you intend to go to the beach, please bring your own beach towels (or let us know if you need anything last minute). The ones we offer are not meant to be sandy.  We do offer rental beach chairs and towels for 25.  - Please wash off the sand before going inside the airstream in the outdoor shower.  - Any violation of the above rules can result in a loss of up to your complete security deposit  Thank you!
properties.host_about: Jeremy is an entrepreneur and surfer; Luiza is a Brazilian journalist and together they are lovers of life, yoga, the environment, sustainability and adventure travels of all sorts.

properties.name: Malibu Townhouse - Right On The Sand
properties.summary: Hello and welcome to Malibu!  Enjoy this contemporary oceanfront townhouse on quiet Malibu Rd. with amazing views. Granite and limestone kitchen & bathrooms, living room with fireplace, spa tub, BBQ on oceanfront deck, 2-car parking, lounge/recreation area with bar, ping-pong and dart board. A short drive or bike ride to all the great shopping and dining Malibu has to offer.  In addition to the beach, there are lots of hiking/biking trails and wine tasting nearby.
properties.space: You'll love this townhouse as it is spacious, quiet and private with sounds of the rhythmic surf in every room.  It's laid out like a house and the master bedroom is amazing with huge picture windows that look out to the ocean.  And at night, you can see the moon and the stars without even lifting your head off your pillow!
properties.description: Hello and welcome to Malibu!  Enjoy this contemporary oceanfront townhouse on quiet Malibu Rd. with amazing views. Granite and limestone kitchen & bathrooms, living room with fireplace, spa tub, BBQ on oceanfront deck, 2-car parking, lounge/recreation area with bar, ping-pong and dart board. A short drive or bike ride to all the great shopping and dining Malibu has to offer.  In addition to the beach, there are lots of hiking/biking trails and wine tasting nearby. You'll love this townhouse as it is spacious, quiet and private with sounds of the rhythmic surf in every room.  It's laid out like a house and the master bedroom is amazing with huge picture windows that look out to the ocean.  And at night, you can see the moon and the stars without even lifting your head off your pillow! The townhouse has a keyless entry, which enables 24-hour check-in and the freedom from having to manage keys.  Included with your stay is access to our beach level recreation area that has a lounge, bar, p
properties.neighborhood_overview: This townhouse is located on quiet and star-studded Malibu Road.  Most beachfront residences are on the Pacific Coast Highway, a four-lane highway that is both noisy and dangerous.  Whether you choose my place or another, I highly recommend you choose somewhere on Malibu Road.  Enjoy a short walk down the beach to Malibu Seafood where they serve the best fish & chips I've ever had!  Or check out the tide pools on Flat Rock, just a few hundred feet away.
properties.notes: If you have a baby, the townhouse comes equipped with a crib, play pen, high chair and gate for the top of the stairwell.  However, the place is not baby-proofed, so your baby must be supervised at all times
properties.transit: Uber is the best way to get around if you don't have a car during your stay.
properties.access: The townhouse has a keyless entry, which enables 24-hour check-in and the freedom from having to manage keys. There is also a restroom and outdoor shower for washing off after a swim in the ocean. In addition, we have mountain bikes for hitting the trails or riding into town.
properties.interaction: Co-host Waverly will check you in upon your arrival. She will be be looking out for you during your stay and is available by cell phone.

properties.neighborhood_overview: Malibu Canyon is one of the most secluded and prestigious regions of Southern California home to local wineries and celebrities alike. Our property has an amazing mountain and ocean view of the Malibu coastline with Santa Monica to the South and the Channel Islands off the coast.
properties.notes: Access info:  The property is on a private dirt road with a dirt driveway expect dirt on your tires and shoes and nature settings.  4x4 or all wheel drive is recommended. We are not liable if you have issues such as getting stuck in mud etc. but will do our best to help. If there's expected rain for your booking dates it will likely be cancelled due to safety. There's mudslides and rockslides when it rains hard and we have to cancel all bookings during heavy storms. Lyft or uber is NOT AVAILABLE. This property is quite far up the canyon and phone reception is spotty.  About phone service up in the canyon. Verizon works best, At&t next best but T-Mobile and many others don't get reception at all. If you do rent a car and don't want to worry about the possibility of muddy tires etc. there's always the option of walking in from the main road which is only a 3-4 minute walk. There is wifi in the airstream through a Verizon hotspot. It's great for checking email and social media.  Expect to
properties.transit: This area has NO public transportation other than taxi therefore is NOT accessible by Uber or Lyft BUT we can pick you up and drop you off from LAX or around LA for a small fee. Uber and Lyft will not pick you up in the canyon. DO NOT PLAN ON UBER OR LYFT PICKING YOU UP. A taxi MIGHT but you'll have to meet them at Latigo Canyon at the mailboxes and taxi service can be hard to deal with. We STRONGLY recommend you have your own vehicle. WE WILL NOT APPROVE YOUR BOOKING OR WILL CANCEL YOU IF YOU DO NOT HAVE A CAR OR MOTORCYCLE OR WE DRIVE YOU IN AND OUT.  While secluded, we are easily accessible by major roads. A 7-10 minute drive down the canyon takes you to Pacific Coast Highway’s most pristine beaches in southern California. It’s just a few more miles to beautiful Malibu and the pier with shopping, dining and recreational opportunities. A 12 minute drive in the other direction takes you to the 101 Ventura Freeway for easy access to LAX, Burbank airport, Downtown L.A., Disney land and
properties.access: Full access to the property and basic amenities and full privacy for guests.
properties.interaction: We will be there to greet you and show you around then you will be left to your own section of the property. There is another vintage trailer on the property that may or may not be in use but you have a full half acre of private land around the airstream with absolute privacy.  World famous wine tasting at Malibu Wines just a 10 minutes drive to Mulholland.  Whether you wish to retreat to Nature or explore the surroundings, you have a wide choice of activities. Our canyons and beaches boast world-class mountain biking, hiking, horse-riding, wine-tasting, surfing and sunbathing. Nearby are local restaurants and hangouts while the towns of Westlake Village & Thousand Oaks are just 15 miles away. There are hiking trails right out your door and throughout the canyons. Famous "Backbone Trail" Just a few minutes away. Down Mulholland is the scenic Malibu Lake as well as Leo Carillo State Park just up PCH (Highway 1). We can arrange trail guides, horseback lessons and trail rides locally, as
properties.house_rules: If you want to alter or change your booking date within 5 days of the booking up to the day of the booking you'll be charged the same 50% cancellation fee as cancelling (or minimum of 50 whichever is greater). Airbnb sets the policy to 50% otherwise we would charge the full booking amount for changes/cancellations.  No early checkin ins as we are booked 7 nights per week and we allow our guests to stay til noon and enjoy the late morning. If our guests happen to check out early and we get all of our cleaning done early we will let you know the day of.  Photo shoots/Filming can be arranged for a reasonable additional fee but a maximum two cars allowed during day/shooting and only two registered guests allowed overnight unless otherwise arranged. Prices include the rental and use of a porta potty toilet and other amenities necessary.  Photo: 300 Video: 500 Events/Parties:500 to 5000 (wedding) Do not attempt to have a photo shoot or event without scheduling. You'll be fined double th
properties.host_about: California Native. Optimist. Naturalist. Minimalist. Single Dad. I am a professional photographer and writer born in Los Angeles but grew up all over California and have lived in Hollywood and the greater Los Angeles area for the last eleven years. I have travelled the world and enjoy surfing, snowboarding and other outside activities. I am excited to use this network as a side business but also to meet new friends and travel the world. So far I've met such cool guests! Thanks to Airbnb!

properties.notes: We do have Malibu wildlife, so we ask NOT to leave out food anywhere openly, it must be in closed zip locks or containers, as it can attract ants and other existing wildlife. We also do NOT take responsibility for any incidents that happen thru wildlife approach and thru negligence of guest. We gladly give rides to beach, grocery store, restaurants, and back for a small fee. We have a washer that can be used as well for a small fee of 10 per load Guests with pet's: Dogs: If you bring a dog, it is an additional 45 for pet fee cash upon check in! Please talk to us so we know there will be pets on main site. We do have pet products if needed for accidents for a small fee to clean up after our loved ones.
properties.transit: by car 6 minutes to Zuma beach, THE best beach on the whole west coast :) We gladly give rides to beach, grocery store, restaurants, bars, and back for a small fee.
properties.access: You have access to the 1 acre yard if desired. Parking space is right in front of guesthouse allowing for one car. There is room for a second car 30 seconds up the hill on a cul-de-sac, please respect our parking rules as there are other's using existing spots.
properties.interaction: I help with the check in or if I am at work, a key will be left for easy access. If you need anything, I am always there for my guests if I am around.
properties.house_rules: Our rules are just appealing to the common sense as you can see, that has been a little bit lost these days, but I know OUR guests are the most respectful out there and in harmony with surrounding and nature :) - Only people on the booking are allowed in the private serene secluded property. We refuse the right to cancel the booking with no refund if additional people are showing up that are not on registration. - We apply a late check in fee of 25 for anyone checking in past 10.30pm as it inconveniences owners plans and work schedule. - Smoking allowed right outside, please put butts. If we have to clean them up for smokers we will charge a deposit. Evidence of 420 will be a deduct of complete security deposit (if its inside the bungalow :)  - Please take out your OWN trash from bath room and kitchen, and just leave it in 1 consolidated bag outside of front door when checking-out. If we have to take out trash for you we have to deduct 18 from deposit - Loss of key will be charged 4

properties.summary: Nestled at the end of a private driveway on 5 acre horse property, 3 bdrm/1 bath ultra modern guesthouse with detached studio, sleeps up to 6 people. All amenities. Walk or bike to beach, market, restaurants. Steps to hiking trails. Serene retreat.
properties.space: With soaring ceilings and natural light, this pristine architectural gem is an eco-friendly oasis, complete with solar electricity and hot water, energy efficient appliances including washer/dryer. Two generous bedrooms grace the main guesthouse, while the third bedroom offers additional privacy in the adjacent studio steps away through a quaint zen garden.  Wifi + Direct TV with thousands of free movies. Well stocked kitchen with dishes, glasses, utensils plus cookware to prepare all meals. Full size refrigerator, stove/oven, dishwasher along with toaster, coffeemaker, electric tea kettle and even a Vitamix for smoothies. Linens include brand new luxe sheets, comforters and bath towels. Anti-microbial pillow and mattress covers to ensure ultimate cleanliness and prevent bedbugs. Six plush beach towels also included. The bathroom is stocked with quality toilet paper, soap, bath salts, cotton balls, Q-tips, shampoo and conditioner, should you forget your personal toiletries.  Welcome ba

properties.neighborhood_overview: The house is located on a private road among multi-million dollar homes. While the canyon provides a rural escape, access to boho chic Malibu juice bars, coffee houses, restaurants and shops is a 1/2 mile walk away. Cross Creek and Malibu Lumber Yard shopping/dining areas are a 10 minute drive down the coast. Zuma Beach or Paradise Cove is a 3/4 mile walk or bike ride from the property. And Point Dume is located just across the highway - perfect for exploring by bike. Hikers, runners and nature lovers will be in heaven with access to the Santa Monica Mountain trails just steps from the property.
properties.notes: The guesthouse faces a pristine canyon, so signs of the natural world can be expected. Sometimes coyotes can be heard at night, however the guesthouse has double paned windows to ensure uninterrupted slumber. And please don't leave food outside the house, unless you want a visit from some unexpected four legged critters. We're conveniently located near Pepperdine University, just 7 minutes by car. We offer the perfect family location for college tours or graduation celebrations.
properties.transit: Guests can get around by public transportation (metro bus 534) with a pick up point one block away at Kanan Dume and Pacific Coast Highway. Everything is nearby – walk, bike or drive anywhere within 10 minutes.
properties.access: The guesthouse is situated at the end of its own private driveway on a larger 5-acre property. Over an acre away from the main house, guests can come and go freely without accessing the rest of the property. To respect privacy and ensure safety, guests are not permitted to explore the grounds around the main house or visit the animals unless arranged with and supervised by the host.
properties.interaction: The guesthouse is a self contained jewel with all the amenities and comforts of home. There are detailed instructions in the guesthouse on how to operate the appliances, movies on demand, etc., as well as suggestions for recreational activities, beach access, restaurants and shopping. The host can always be reached via text message should questions arise.
properties.house_rules: The guesthouse is like new, appointed with a combination of collectable mid-century modern and new furnishings, including all new sheets, towels, kitchenware and the like. We ask that guests remove their shoes upon entering the house to maintain cleanliness. This is a no-smoking property. Guests are not permitted to  smoke in or near the guesthouse + studio or anywhere on the property as Malibu is susceptible to fires, particularly in the dry months. Because the property has many animals including horses, pigs, goats, chickens and dogs, no visiting pets are allowed. While the guesthouse has its own brand new septic system, please refrain from throwing anything in the toilet except for what naturally comes out of your body + toilet tissue. Septic systems are sensitive. Late check out requests must be made 24 hours in advance of departure date and approved by host. An additional 50 fee will be charged.
properties.host_about:
Avid equestrian, surfer and yoga practitioner committed to animal welfare, environmental sustainability and social justice. 

As a host, I'm available whenever you need me, otherwise, you'll never see me. This is your private vacation. Enjoy!

properties.name: Bungalow 8 ~ Oceanfront in Malibu

properties.space: Located at ground level on the sands of private Carbon Beach, this beautiful beachfront bungalow has sunrise to sunset panoramic views from Santa Monica to the Malibu Pier and beyond. The living area and private deck provide a pristine front row seat to watch the waves, surfers and sail boats with no one above or below.   The best restaurants and shopping in Malibu are within easy walking distance as are movie theaters, the historical Adamson House, water sports and the world famous Surfrider Beach… And when you're ready to take a break from the beach, just minutes away you'll find some of the best hiking and biking in Southern California in the parks of the Santa Monica Mountains.  A lovely one bedroom/one bath bungalow beautifully furnished with king bed and down bedding, queen size pull out sofa sleeper, a fully appointed kitchen, AC, washer/dryer, Wifi, cable, large HD flat-screen TVs in both the bedroom and living room and Apple TV. properties.neighborhood_overview: An affluent beach town west of downtown Los Angeles, Malibu consists of 27-miles of prime Pacific coastline. The community is famous for its warm, sandy beaches which include Surfrider, Zuma, Malibu, Topanga and Point Dume to name just a few. The best restaurants and shopping in Malibu are within easy walking distance. As is the Malibu Pier, movie theaters, the historical Adamson house, water sports and the world famous Surfrider Beach…  With a short car ride you will find some of the best hiking and biking in the Santa Monica Mountains.
properties.notes: Santa Monica pier is just over 11 miles, Venice is a little more than 13 miles, centrally located it provides easy access to the (phone number hidden) and on the famous Highway 1 (pacific coast highway).
properties.transit: There are several restaurants, shopping, bike/surf rentals, fishing, swimming, surfing, paddle boarding and much more within walking distance.  There is ample public transportation via bus, taxi or personal auto.  Santa Monica is only 11 miles, Venice is 13 miles, and most of Los Angeles is within a 1/2 hr to hour drive depending on traffic.
properties.access: Guests have direct access to exclusive Carbon Beach. Walk out the front door and you're on the sand.
properties.interaction: There is not an on-site property manager but we are available via phone, text or email.
properties.house_rules: Smoking is prohibited in both in the suite and the outside deck.  Check-in is 4 PM and check-out is 10AM on the day of your departure.  Our off-site cleaning service will arrive short thereafter and will need to utilize the parking for this unit. Please respect our neighbors and keep noise to a minimum.  Reservations with Pets are not permitted.  Parties are not allowed.

properties.name: ONLY Malibu Home Ocean Side of PCH!
properties.summary: Beach access is scarce in Malibu so if u want to get your toes in the sand, this IS your property - unlike if u stay in the hills." We are just steps from El Matador, the most photographed beach in all of California. Entire 900 square foot cottage.
properties.space: Location, location, location! And very, very clean. This home is on the ocean side of Pacific Coast Highway --- one of the only on Airbnb. It is literally steps from the beach, 4 lots off of the ocean. The beach on which the property sits is called El Matador. It is the most photographed beach in all of California, and has a spectacular large rock formation with caves. The property has numerous surf breaks within minutes, including County Like Leo Carrio, Zeros, Zuma Beach, Latigo, Topanga, Big Dume, Little Dume,  and a bunch of secret spots!  **** Many homes in Malibu have an ocean "view" --- but beach access on private beaches is impossible in the Bu. Our home is actually ON the ocean side of PCH, with beach access at El Matador. Location, location, location!

properties.name: Panoramic Ocean View | Malibu Mtns
properties.summary: Watch spectacular orange-purple sunsets over the ocean & mountains. Catch sun with views of the LA skyline & Bay of LA. Eat fresh eggs from our chickens & fruit from our trees. Drive a fun 8min down to the beach. Relax on a private mountain ridge.
properties.space: Welcome to our home! Where ocean, mountains, trees, sun, animals, and cozy furniture collide. Huge View: watch the sun rise over Los Angeles (the big city) in the east, travel above the Bay of Los Angeles (& Palos Verdes peninsula), and then set over Malibu Surfrider Beach in the west. For Loungers: living room with fireplace, chez lounge, couch, chairs, art books, carpet. catch sun rays on our big deck around all 3 sides of the house.  For Hikers: private hiking trails go deep into our nearby canyon & creek. For Farmers: The 11 chickens (10 hens, 1 rooster) will give you 2-5 fresh eggs a day! For Chefs: fruit & herbs from our own trees, 6 stovetop burners, 2 ovens, toaster, coffeemakers, hot-water-heater, sink, dishwasher. For Music-Fans: KRK Rockit VXT6 high-end speakers, desk, mac & iphone charging cables. For Readers: massive library of philosophy, history, thrillers. For Good-Sleepers: King sized master bed, skylight, panoramic view. For Artists: artist easel, canvases, oil & acry

properties.neighborhood_overview: It's just a few minutes of a fun mountain drive down into Malibu. Beautiful beaches & cliffs around Pt Dume. Legendary beach-front deck fine dining at Nobu. Casual pier-dining at Malibu Farm. Cut through squiggly neighbourhoods into Topanga for a charming 60's hippy vibe; yoga retreats & organic farms.
properties.notes: This house is has many loving, hilarious, adorable pets. 11 Chickens, 2 cats, 3 dogs. They are all stranger-friendly, well-behaved, potty-trained, outdoor-friendly, low maintenance.  To give you the most joyful stay, please choose from 3 options. Let us know which one you prefer in your message! 1. Our pet-sitter will quietly feed everyone each morning. You won't have to do anything.  2. We'll send the dogs & cats off on their own vacation. You'll just feed the chickens each morning.  3. You love animals and are a highly responsible person & promise to take care of them.
properties.transit: Our mountain roads attract hardcore cyclists, sport car drivers, and motorcyclists for their fun curves and big canyon views. You can cut easily into The Valley / Calabasas over the mountain, in addition to accessing LA via the Pacific Coast Highway.
properties.access: You & your friends/family will be king of the entire castle. 1 Master King Bed & Bath, 1 Twin Bed, 1 Guest House with a king bed&bath, 1 pullout Sofa Bed & downstairs bath. Private covered parking area.
properties.interaction: We love providing tips on getting the most adventure (or relaxation) out of your time in Malibu / Los Angeles. Don't hesitate to message us.
properties.house_rules: Treat the home, garden, and animals with love & calm. Pets are allowed if they would be extremely kind to 3 labradors and 2 cats. Again, please message us :)
properties.host_about:
I'm a Stanford product design student, a UX Designer at a mid-stage startup, and a long-time lover of Japanese aesthetics. Every day, I brew great chinese tea, cook something delicious, and learn something about philosophy, psychology, design, or art. 

I've produced music, DJed many parties, turned wood and metal, silversmithed, thrown ceramics, dined at top restaurants, interviewed top designers, and continue to explore the world and the beautiful experiences it offers.

Want to make sure we were accurately setting expectations and you have read through the entire listing. We have access to multiple properties where we can host large groups.  We do not like surprises, and want to ensure all expectations are clear so everyone can enjoy their stay! PARTIES AND NOISE: Amplified music is not allowed outside the unit. Tenant agrees not to bring speakers outside and to not crank up the music playing inside so it can be also heard outside. Part

properties.name: Relax in the Santa Monica Mountains
properties.summary: Relax in your private room after a long day of hiking or fun in the city.  Our house is located in the Santa Monica Mountains with beautiful canyon views and a short walk to sweeping views of the ocean.  We are located 2.7 miles off the Pacific Coast Highway and close to Malibu's best hiking, beaches and restaurants.  The large private room with comfy bed has own bathroom with shower right outside the room.  Enjoy a glass of wine on the decks or a Nespresso in the morning.  We look forward to sharing our space with you!
properties.space: Very quiet, beautiful views, tranquil yet close to everything Malibu.

We look forward to sharing our space with you! Very quiet, beautiful views, tranquil yet close to everything Malibu. As frequent as the guests are comfortable with. House is ~3 miles off the PCH (pacific coast highway) and in the Santa Monica Mountains.  Some guests who are not familiar with California topography might be uncomfortable with the drive up - there are a couple hairpin turns.  However, the roads are good and most people have no issues.  It is a bit secluded but that's what makes it beautiful and unique.

properties.notes: Some cellular networks do not get service up at house - we have land line and great wireless but some networks go in and out of service.

properties.interaction: As frequent as the guests are comfortable with.

properties.name: Private Broad Beach Malibu Home -
properties.summary: My place is close to the beach and organic food market . You’ll love my place because of the views, the beach, the people, the coziness and all that Malibu has to offer..... My home is great for couples and families (with kids).  Cozy, clean, and relaxed.  This house sleeps 8 comfortably (each person has a bed)....We have a brand new state of the art studio apartment also available for rent should you need it.  King bed and sofa - complete with EVERYTHING!! You will never want to leave......
properties.space: All beds are tempur pedic king/queen beds.  Fresh linens/towels etc. Very clean ....you will sleep like a baby and wake up like you were in your own bed!  Our home has everything you need for a perfect getaway.... Each Bedroom has its own full bathroom. Each room has queen or king sized bed. Just bring your bathing suits/clothes....leave the rest up to us!! We are so blessed to call Malibu our home and are so happy to give fellow travelers the experience we have every day!  :) While you are here....take your family picture at the beach....priceless!

properties.neighborhood_overview: Most coveted beach in all of Malibu.  Private on one side; public on the other.  Gorgeous views and nice long walks await you.  You don't need a thing when you come here to stay.  The house is fully loaded with anything and everything you need to have the perfect beach getaway.  We love that we can offer other people the magic that we have here every single day!!!
properties.notes: A walk away from Zuma Beach (only 72 steps from our Front Door to Broad Beach - more private)....If you love celebrities, just take a walk to Starbucks and you will see plenty....many live in our neighborhood. Maxfields, Madison, Planet Blue, Yoga, Cafe Habana, Nobu, Mr. Chow, and more are a ten min. drive to Malibu Country Mart is a favorite place families to bring their kids and shop.
properties.transit: Plenty of parking in our cul de sac and two cars in driveway.  Buses are available also; of course there is always UBER....pick up your groceries on the way (not regular items: condiments, spices, pantry items - there are all there for YOUR use); and never leave the house!
properties.access: Full access (except for garage/office).
properties.interaction: Owners will be able to help you (via phone and text) and cleaning person comes once per week for every day cleaning and/or laundry; but is available for other days should you need her.
properties.house_rules: Welcome your best beach experience....    :)  Brand new carpeting (April 2017); hotel luxury feel, clean, open space, steps from beach..... Check-in is at 12 PM and check-out is at 12 PM. Landscaper comes on Thursdays, as well as the cleaning lady (yay!). Friday is trash day, so please make sure no cars are parked in front of trash cans on Friday - as they do come early. The outdoor shower is located in the back yard across from hot tub.  **Please do not rinse off the ocean & sand in the hot tub as it will damage it.  Malibu city noise ordinance : No loud noise or music after 10 PM strictly enforced by sheriffs, so please be considerate of the neighbors, thank you :) Leaving the house: Please leave the house the way in which you received it.  All used towels can be left on floor.  Sheets do NOT have to be removed from bed; cleaning lady will do that..... If you break something, please advise me immediately so the next guests will have the same consideration of things working properly,
properties.host_about: Fun loving hard working family that enjoys life to the fullest!

properties.name: Room For Rent near Malibu
properties.summary: Charm and Peace in the Malibu Hills!  Older home, wonderful place to rest your head after a busy day in the surrounding areas of  Los Angeles and Malibu. Explore vineyards, beaches and our very nearby state parks (3!)
properties.space: We are offering a room in a nice 3-level home in the unincorporated area of Agoura Hills/Malibu Hills. The room is on the third level and offers  privacy from the rest of the house. There is a large TV room on the third floor as well, shared by everyone, with a huge couch and 55" LED Samsung TV. The room itself contains a small dresser, desk and 2 beds- one bed is a Full, the other is a twin. Perfect for a couple with a child.  You will have your own private bathroom with tub and shower on the first floor as well as access to a shared bathroom on the third floor. The kitchen is located on the first floor and is newly remodeled with marble counter tops and new appliances.  We offer breakfast foods, coffee and various teas for our guests. Shampoos, lotions and soaps are provided, as well as a hair dryer, in your private bathroom.  The house is located in the Santa Monica Mountains, 6 minutes from the 101 freeway and 14 minutes from Pacific Coast Highway and the Malibu beaches. Pepperdine

properties.neighborhood_overview: We live in a quiet, peaceful neighborhood in the Santa Monica Mountains - walking distance to wineries and 10-15 minutes from many good restaurants, live entertainment and shopping. Our area is known for weddings and we have many staying with us that are attending events in the local area. Parking: Parking is on the street or in front of our gate/house.  Please do not park in front of our neighbors house or block their driveway.
properties.notes: Washer and dryer can be used within reason and on request. FYI: Due to water restrictions and the environment, we no longer wish to book 1 night stays.
properties.transit: Nature lovers can stroll out the door for walks, birding and hiking. *There is no public transportation in the mountains and a car is required to get around surrounding areas.
properties.access: Please park in front of the white wooden gate which is directly in front of the house. The house numbers are on the pillar gate and on the mailbox. (The house is somewhat pushed back from the street and not easily seen.)  You can text me on arrival and I will come out to greet you. The house is set back from the street.
properties.interaction: We interact as much or as little as our guests need, want or require. We respect your privacy but are available to answer questions and give suggestions.
properties.house_rules: No smoking inside the house- But we have a large deck and backyard where you are welcome to smoke.  Please give us advanced notice if you plan on cooking regularly. Although we love animals, the ones we have are not the best in sharing their (URL HIDDEN) we request your pets stay at home. We assume you will be reasonable in your behavior while here in the house - while here, you are free to come and go whenever and at whatever time you'd like- we do not have a 'curfew'.
properties.host_about:
Hi!
We really enjoy hosting  with Airbnb and hope you enjoy your stay with us.
We are friendly and easy-going and we love living here. We'll give you a tour of the house and answer any questions you may have about the area. It's very special!
Our goal is to make you feel at home, safe and cared for:) so you can spend your time and energy enjoying Southern California!

properties.name: Malibu Escapes -Garden Studio Suite
properties.summary: Fabulous privacy & serenity surrounded by State & National Parks. Perched above a split level contemporary home lives a self-contained suite with canyon and ocean views. Yet easy access to activities in Santa Monica, the South Bay, DT LA, and LAX.  (Only 3 miles from PCH however map apps inaccurate in area - Driving directions required reading.)
properties.space: The unit is approximately 760 square feet (HUGE for a studio) with high ceilings and lots of natural light. Everyone says it's bigger than they expect! The unit has carpet and tile floors, it's extremely quiet and private, a mini-fridge, two burner cooktop, pots, pans, linens, microwave, patio, air/heat, etc. Laundry is available on site. The apartment has TV, High Speed Wireless Wi-Fi, Cable & Netflix, AT&T Cell Booster.

properties.neighborhood_overview: The property is about 3 miles up a canyon road from the coast. It's right in between some of the best hiking, biking and horse riding in LA (state and national parks), some of the best beaches in California (Zuma beach and surfrider beach), and Malibu's wine country (which has tours). Almost anything you could want to do is accessible from here, but the property itself is nestled in the canyon and you have a complete sense of serenity.
properties.transit: Off-street parking (for two cars) is available for guests approximately 250 yards from the entrance to the unit. Temporary parking is available for guests approximately 70 feet from the entrance to the unit. Uber is available in the area as well.  Please select Uber drivers that are familiar with the area and also read and speak fluent English.  The canyons are not for someone that is "already lost or unfamiliar with the area," particularly after dusk.    While we are only 3 miles off PCH, it is a world apart!  Rural - ie, few street lights, no sidewalks, windy canyon.  Please select  your driver carefully and provide him with the detail directions to get here successfully.  Only 3 turns and only 3 miles off of PCH, but it can feel disorienting, especially in the dark.  Thank you.
properties.access: The unit can be accessed from a private entrance.  There is an exterior stair case on the canyon side of the residence that provides ingress/egress to all four levels of the home.  A photo is provided for your review.
properties.interaction: I'm more than happy to provide help finding local activities. I've spent 20 years living in the area and can point you either to touristy stuff to do or hidden gems. If you like nature, I can help you find anything you want. I'm also happy to let you enjoy the peace and solitude on your own.
properties.house_rules: No smoking.  I love my property, and hope you will too; please respect my belongings.  In keeping with the quiet of the canyon, I ask that you keep conversation/music/etc. at a low volume.  Please tread softly. Exterior lights extinguished by 10 PM, please. Film shoot inquires should be directed to the Site Manager to arrange for shoots on the grounds.  Contact Host to arrange for bookings.   This property is not appropriate for running commercial ventures that involve client visits.
properties.host_about:
I am an outdoor, nature enthusiast! Having lived in Malibu for more than 20 years I have deep knowledge of and can recommend beautiful equestrian and mountain bike trails as well as some of the best and/or most challenging hikes in the Santa Monica Mountains.   

It would be my pleasure to introduce you to the benefits of nature and what this community has to offer.

I have three gated horses - two Rocky Mountains and one Missouri Fox Trotter, all with excellent credentials work & knowledge of the Santa Monica Mountains.  For experienced riders, feel free to contact me if you are interested in working out an add-on riding experienced overlooking the Pacific of exploring the largest urban park in the US ... just out of your back door!

Your first evening welcomes you with a bottle of fine wine from one of Malibu's local wineries. Should you want to tour the wineries and experience an afternoon of wine tasting, they're but minutes away.

A barbecue on a lovely outdoor private patio is yours to use while you are a guest here at the 'Angels of the Oaks'. We are in a California Shenandoah Oak Preserve surrounded by national and state parks. Caution with sparks required.

Should you be interested in being pampered, massage therapists, aestheticians, yoga instructors are only minutes away. 

I would be very happy to make the arrangements for you.

For those evenings that you simply want to cozy up and enjoy the movies or a premium series, Netflix is available for you to enjoy.

I look forward to welcoming you to what guests have said is a magical, energizing, and beautiful place to call home for as many days as you choose to stay.

properties.name: Beautiful Poolside Cottage near Zum
properties.summary: The cottage is ideal for two with a garden over-looking a lovely pool, waterfall and jacuzzi all on a gentle hillside over-looking Pt. Dume, Zuma Beach and Broadbeach.  Amenities include the heated jacuzzi, parking, phone, wireless internet and internet TV.  I've lived in the main house on another level of the property since '77.
properties.space: Small cottage over-looking pool in garden setting, one small bedroom with queen-size bed, (a single bed may be added in the living room), closet, shower, kitchen off small living room, W/D, one parking space (more easy parking on safe street), private entrance in a lovely, quiet neighborhood.  My family has lived on this property since ''77, enjoying its relaxed, 'old Malibu' elegant/rustic feeling.  We are 5 minutes by car to Zuma Beach, market, gas stations, banks, restaurants and bus stops, close to hiking trails, and main freeway access to Hollywood, Universal Studios, Venice Beach, Santa Monica and Channel Islands Harbor.  For a great description see Laura Hobbs' magazine article:

properties.host_about:
Hard working guy (and gal)  that LOVES Malibu and all it has to offer.
We love our property, our dog, and the ocean view. Having wine at sun down and watching great movies after dark. We have traveled extensively and feel this is one of THE best places to visit.
We hope to share our Malibu experience with people who are interested in a unique California city.

properties.name: Guest house with beautiful view
properties.summary: Be surrounded by lovely hills with a view of the ocean. The guesthouse is a fully self-contained accommodation with two bedrooms, a living room, a kitchen and bathroom as well as a private terrace with a view. The guesthouse is located in a very calm and serene environment in a gated community. It feels remote, but there are restaurants, a supermarket and  beaches in close proximity. The closest beach is a 5 minute drive; it's also possible to walk there on back trails in about 30 minutes.
properties.space: The guesthouse has two bedrooms, living room, kitchen and bathroom. Surface area is about 800 sq feet (75 sq meters). The terrace is about 300 sq feet (27 sq meters). One bedroom has queen bed; other bedroom has full bed and twin bunk beds. Sleeps 6.

properties.summary: If you ever wanted to be as close to the ocean as possible - then this is the perfect location for you. You will be part of the ocean with all your senses.  Enjoy Malibu's beach life !
properties.space: You literally live above the the ocean the seascape is endless and awe inspiring. One sunrise or sunset is all it takes to fall in love with a Malibu. Through the spacious living and dining area (furniture by CB2) you have access to a large sunny wrap deck for relaxation, dining and BBQ. Deck is facing south and west. Fresh linen, towels and beach towels as well as shampoo, shower gel toilet paper and more essentials are provided free of charge. Drinks in the fridge are complementary! properties.notes: Please note that the beach is a WET beach and access is subject to the natural daily tide cycles. Sand levels also may vary and the beach may only be accessible at low tide. Private Beach - no public access - no lifeguard - swimming, kayaking and all other water activities at your own risk! The ceiling of the lower unit has limited insulation, so you might hear walking sounds etc. from guests in the upper unit. This place is flanked by the Pacific Ocean and the Pacific Coast Highway, directly above the water. Living so close to the ocean is a very unique and fascinating experience, but there are a few important things to note: Malibu's stretch of the Pacific Coast Hwy is very dangerous due to its fast moving traffic. Always use extreme caution when entering, exiting or crossing PCH. Also, PCH and the Pacific Ocean create constant background noise. properties.transit: Traveling time from/to LAX international airport is about 40 min. Public bus stop to Santa Monica and Malibu town center only minutes away. Moonshadow's  and Duke's restaurants are just a stroll down the beach..

There's lots of great outdoor activities to enjoy nearby or you can just relax & enjoy the ocean views and the peaceful surroundings.

There are also so many great hiking and dirt biking trails nearby, some you can walk & bike to from our house. Others you can drive to such as Sycamore Cyn.
properties.notes: Our garage will not be accessible, sorry.

properties.name: Malibu Mountain Retreat/Guest House
properties.summary: We are on 4.0 acres, secluded, sitting on a hilltop surrounded by oak trees. We are in well water conservation mode so you are always welcomed with wine or beer to make you feel at home!
properties.space: You are always welcomed with treats to make you feel at home!  The property is on 4.0 acres, secluded, sitting on a hilltop surrounded by oak trees. We designed and built the guest house (2nd floor) with our visiting family and friends in mind.  The tall ceilings, big beautiful windows,and oversized french doors allow lots of natural light in. The floors are solid maple.  There is a full kitchen, a walk in closet, a large shower, and  balcony so you can enjoy dining al fresco. The furniture inside and outside are beautiful and comfortable.  WE live on the property about 40 feet away from the guest house.  We are available if you need assistance.  We typically do our grocery shopping at the Trader Joe's because they have everything we need on a daily basis.  It is about 8 miles away, so you need a car!! We are in the Santa Monica Mountains National Recreation Area, about 5 miles from Pacific Coast Highway, Zuma Beach, and Westward beach. It is a great outdoorsy and nature-full area. The

properties.neighborhood_overview: Malibu is a jewel for those that love outdoors, hikes and bike rides, ocean walks, yoga, it is a wonderful place to do cleansing, to emerge with nature, you can chose to be as isolated from civilization as you would like, we are located 3 miles up the hill. I personally feel there is nothing better than to wake up here in the morning to a rooster call, to open the windows and smell the scent of wild lands, although this area looks a lot like Amalfi Coast, I have not experienced this amazing scent anywhere, its kind of a mixture of wild flowers and something clean and fresh, vergine, i imagine this part of the world smelling exactly like this when we were not species we are now. At night millions of bright stars and sounds of crickets, frogs and wildlife keep you entertained, should you chose a peaceful informal dinner on the patio, after watching the sunset, and then again, there are lovely Continental, Italian, Japanese, and fusion restaurants around to cater to vast variety of taste,

properties.name: Colorful and Cozy Beach Condo
properties.summary: Our colorful and cozy 3 bedroom condo is a relaxing place to get away from it all and enjoy the laid back Malibu lifestyle.
properties.space: Our colorful and cozy 3 bedroom condo is a relaxing place to get away from it all and enjoy the laid back Malibu lifestyle. The Space was completely renovated last year and has a clean and calming vibe through out. The condo has two master bedrooms with en suite master bathrooms. The house will very comfortably fit 4 adults plus children or a group of 8 friends.  There is a 2 car Garage as well as ample guest parking during the day. The two master bedrooms have cable as well as the downstairs living room. There is a community pool as well as a jacuzzi and a sauna.  We will be nearby to answer any questions that may arise or help you make the best out of your stay.  Malibu isn't just a destination its a way of life. The condo is located across the street from Paradise cove. Paradise Cove is the only beach in all of Southern California that allows alcohol. Has a private picnic area with tables and chairs, no need to purchase food from the restaurant. You can pay to park or walk in to go

properties.interaction: As much or as limited as the guest would like. This location offers the ultimate privacy. I'm 'unfamiliar places' and 'new things" challenged.  Being thus 'challenged,' I'm aware of the frustrations that can accompany a vacation.  So, I set things up so vacationers can 'hit the ground running.'  My photos are unembellished.  My video is unembellished.  My booking process is dunce level simple.  My follow up is compulsive every step of the way.  I'm always accessible by phone, text or email.  I provide a comprehensive printout for arrival.  I've labeled light switches, fans, heaters and remote controls.  I oversee cleaning.  I oversee every turnover.  I make certain everything is re-stocked, fully equipped and working.  I refund security deposits promptly and make certain they clear.  And I offer a 'repeat offender' discount for returning vacationers.  My insight?  It must be working because 25% of my vacationers are 'repeat offenders.'
properties.house_rules: There is a 300 party fee (per party) (7 or more adults including vacationers).   Parties must be pre-approved and neighbors  advised thereof.  Otherwise, neighbors complain and/or call Sheriff's dept., Malibu City Licensing Dept.  Pets are welcome, but there is a pet fee of 225 or 35/day, whichever is less (175 or 25/day if paid at booking).  If you bring a pet, it is imperative you provide notice as cleaning regulations are substantially different.
properties.host_about: I reside in Venice and I'm referred to as a neighborhood developer. When I purchased the property in 1979, my friends thought I was crazy. Back then, Venice was a high crime, blighted area with little prospect of improvement. Now, everyone says I'm brilliant!. The truth is, I was simply lucky. The one thing I've learned over the years is if you have your choice between smart and lucky, take lucky.

properties.name: Oceanfront Celebrity: 115271
properties.summary: Enjoy unparalleled views of the Malibu coast from Oceanfront Celebrity. Since the villa is set right on the sand, there’s nothing between you and sunset views over the Pacific except glass—or the railing of one of your private balconies.
properties.space: *All credit card holders must be aged 25 years and older at the time of booking. Enjoy unparalleled views of the Malibu coast from Oceanfront Celebrity. Since the villa is set right on the sand, there’s nothing between you and sunset views over the Pacific except glass—or the railing of one of your private balconies. With six bedrooms spread over a main house and guest house, the property has plenty space and privacy for large families or groups of friends. Soak in the California sun from balconies on each of the villa’s three stories, where you’ll find outdoor sofas, chaise longues and daybeds, along with a grill. If you’re not content to just watch the water, take the private staircase down to the beach. After you’ve watched the sun set over the ocean, turn on the TV, watch a DVD or connect via Wi-Fi while cozying up to the fireplace. For your comfort, the villa has heating and air conditioning systems, laundry facilities and garage space for three cars. Sleek and contemporary, Ocean

properties.host_about:
Founded in 1999, Luxury Retreats specializes in personalized villa vacations in over 90 destinations across the world. Our portfolio includes more than 2,800 luxury villas, each hand-picked and personally inspected by our global team of passionate travel enthusiasts, who work to ensure our guests are offered the very best. 

Our team of well-travelled Villa Specialists are dedicated to helping our customers find the perfect villa in the right location.  

We provide every guest with worldwide support while on vacation. Our guests can relax knowing that there’s a team on standby, should anything require immediate assistance.

To make each vacation unforgettable, our guests also enjoy the complimentary services of a dedicated concierge, who will gladly arrange for a private chef, pre-stocking a villa with provisions or anything else that they desire. And all this without charging any membership fees.

properties.name: Bungalow 10 ~ Oceanfront in Malibu
properties.summary: Quintessential Beach Bungalow seated ocean front on the sand of Carbon Beach, Malibu. Features: 1BR/1BA, queen bed and a queen size sofa sleeper, fully appointed kitchen, washer/dryer in unit, A/C, gas fireplace, large private deck, & smashing views!
properties.space: Located at ground level on the sands of private Carbon Beach, this beautiful beachfront bungalow has sunrise to sunset panoramic views from Santa Monica to the Malibu Pier and beyond. The living area and private deck provide a pristine front row seat to watch the waves, surfers and sail boats with no one above or below.   The best restaurants and shopping in Malibu are within easy walking distance as are movie theaters, the historical Adamson House, water sports and the world famous Surfrider Beach… And when you're ready to take a break from the beach, just minutes away you'll find some of the best hiking and biking in Southern California in the parks of the Santa Monica Mountains.  A lovely one bedroom/one bath bungalow beautifully furnished with queen bed and down bedding, additional queen size pull out sofa sleeper in the living room, a fully appointed kitchen, AC, washer/dryer, Wifi, cable, large HD flat-screen TVs in both the bedroom and living room and Apple TV. properties.neighborhood_overview: An affluent beach town west of Los Angeles, Malibu consists of 27-miles of prime Pacific coastline. The community is famous for its warm, sandy beaches which include Surfrider, Zuma, Malibu, Topanga and Point Dume to name just a few. The best restaurants and shopping in Malibu are within easy walking distance as is the Malibu Pier, movie theaters, the historical Adamson house, water sports and the world famous Surfrider Beach…  With a short car ride you will find some of the best hiking and biking in the Santa Monica Mountains.
properties.notes: Santa Monica pier is just over 11 miles, Venice is a little more than 13 miles, centrally located it provides easy access to the (PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN) and on the famous Highway 1 (pacific coast highway)
properties.transit: There are several restaurants, shopping, bike/surf rentals, fishing, swimming, surfing, paddleboarding and much more within walking distance.  There is public transportation via bus, taxi or personal auto.  Santa Monica is only 11 miles and Venice just 13.
properties.access: Guests have direct access to exclusive Carbon Beach. Walk out the front door and you're on the sand.
properties.interaction: There is not an on-site property manager but we are available by email or telephone to answer any questions or concerns you may have.
properties.house_rules: Smoking is strictly prohibited in both the suite and the outside deck.  Check-in is 4 PM and check-out is 10AM.  Please respect our neighbors and keep noise to a minimum.  Reservations with Pets are not permitted.  Parties are not allowed.  Occupancy of more than 4 people is strictly prohibited.

properties.name: Bohemian apt w unbelievable views
properties.summary: There is no other place in Malibu with views like this -from the lights of Santa Monica in east to the Channel Islands in west. Just look at the pictures. Romantic and private with a great kitchen.
properties.space: It's all about the views. The space is one big bright room (about 1000 sqft/90 m**2), with large windows to south and east. The view is 180 degrees -Santa Monica to east, Channel Islands to the west. You'll see Palos Verdes peninsula, Santa Catalina Island, Channel Islands. On a very clear day you see Santa Barbara Island 40 miles south, San Nicolas Island 66 miles SW, and even San Clemente Island 71 miles away. There is TV. There are no music players or loudspeakers. You have very fast WiFi access (50 Mbps up/down). There's a ink-jet printer. Note: no visitors without my written permission. No parties without my written permission. It is a very quiet neighborhood.
