properties.neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood is rural residential -tranquil and quiet. We are at 700+ ft / 230m elevation.  Environmental noise pollution consist mainly of the surf at Zuma Beach and coyotes howling in the night. One sees coyotes a few times every week -and you may see skunks and raccoons and tons of squirrels on the yard.
properties.notes: This is my bohemian home -you will find my books and magazines on the shelves, my stuff in drawers etc. Don't expect a sterile hotel room. Do not panic if you find cartoons on my fridge door.
properties.transit: You need your own transportation. There is no reasonable public transportation -the is USA after all. One bus (534) goes to Santa Monica every half and hour or so in daylight hours.
properties.access: You have access to this space as well as to the outside decks. There is a gas grill outside. You are also free to use the washer and dryer without charge. Professional Wolf 6-burner stove with oven. Toaster oven, microwave, dishwasher, large fridge with freezer You also get my printed guide (you'll get it also via email when book) to the apartment and Malibu which lists restaurants, groceries what to see and so on. It is guaranteed not to get ever approved by the Malibu Chamber of Commerce.
properties.interaction: I am pretty much available to help and assist you -text messaging me is the best way to get hold of me.
properties.house_rules: HOUSE RULES: It is quiet and tranquil neighborhood -you are expected to behave accordingly.  No more than 4 people at any time -except by my written permission. One car only. No motorbikes. No parties. Only very quiet music. NO SMOKING. Ask if you want any written rule exceptions.
properties.host_about:
I am interested in making my apartment a good experience for you -all the while I stay out of your way. You are here to enjoy your stay -not to deal with me.   I don't like hotels. So I stocked the apartment with stuff I would like to have -fast internet, printer, TV with a gazillion of channels (even if why on earth would you want to watch TV here?), all the kitchen appliances I can think of, grill on deck, etc. Blah blah. Within reason you should find pretty everything you can think of for you here. If you don't, it can probably be arranged.

I have been writing a guide "what's interesting for me in Malibu". It's now 30 pages long and it's yours to keep.  So far my guests seem to like it.

You'll find more on me on that famous "book with faces" if you search for "heikki malibu" -most likely I am the only one you find.

properties.name: Malibu Dream House
properties.summary: Malibu Maison de Reve, or Malibu Dream House, is a little closer to heaven than most places.  From its location up in the Malibu hills & its secluded niche at the end of its own private road, the estate overlooks a vast swath of the Pacific, stretching from Catalina to Santa Monica Bay. The house & grounds are sprawled across 3 acres of beautifully landscaped gardens, organic citrus trees, lush plant & forest life, heated pool & golf green.  An easy 10 min drive to Nobu & 30 to Santa Monica pier

properties.host_about:
Welcome to our Airbnb profile!  We are Sean & Sanne from DreamHaus.
 DreamHaus is a boutique vacation rental and lifestyle company based in Los Angeles, California. How many times have you gone on vacation and ended up doing exactly what everyone else does? You ate at the same restaurants, shopped at the same stores, and went to the same beaches as everyone else. Sure- it was fun and all but you probably went home wondering what else there was to see and do. Where are the private beaches? Where do the locals hang out? The friendly faces at DreamHaus are here to tell you. The concept was hatched when two former colleagues at a large, luxury vacation rental company noticed something was missing- that personal touch. Sean Greiner and Sanne Hamers quickly bonded over their common vision and created something a little different. They wanted to offer homeowners and guests alike a friendly, dependable, welcoming way to experience vacation rentals. They created DreamHaus to connect gorgeous, unique, upscale homes across L.A. with those who wish to visit them. Sean and Sanne are Los Angeles locals themselves and know all of best things to do and see. Attention to detail is their specialty- you can expect personalized communication before and during your stay to ensure your vacation is fantastic. L.A. is a big city with a lot to do- so having a friendly local host will ensure you experience the scene like a true local.

properties.name: Tranquil, Private Malibu Suite
properties.summary: Welcome!  Come and enjoy this quiet 700 sq ft private suite surrounded by lush gardens where you can relax, swim, or play tennis inside a beautiful gated estate.... and only 3 minutes away from famous beaches, shops, cafés and restaurants!
properties.space: This grand suite with private outside entrance is located in Point Dume, one of Malibu's most exclusive neighborhoods where you’re only 3 minutes to famous beaches, shops, cafés and restaurants.  It features a queen bed and queen sofa-bed, high speed wi-fi, a 42" flat screen TV with DirecTV (Satellite), large selection of DVD movies, private bathroom with sink and shower, refrigerator, Keurig coffee/tea bar, french windows and doors with spectacular garden and pool views.
properties.description: Welcome!  Come and enjoy this quiet 700 sq ft private suite surrounded by lush gardens where you can relax, swim, or play tennis inside a beautiful gated estate.... and only 3 minutes away from famous beaches, shops, cafés and restaurants! This grand suite with private outside entrance is located in Point Dume, one of Malibu's most exclusive neighborhoods where you’re only 3 minutes to famous beaches, shops, cafés and restaurants.  It features a queen bed and queen sofa-bed, high speed wi-fi, a 42" flat screen TV with DirecTV (Satellite), large selection of DVD movies, private bathroom with sink and shower, refrigerator, Keurig coffee/tea bar, french windows and doors with spectacular garden and pool views. You will have access to enjoy the whole backyard... Patios, large Pool, Spa, Tennis Court, Gazebo with lounge chairs, and the tranquil gardens. We give our guests total privacy but are available if they need anything! Unlike most neighborhoods in Malibu, you would not only be stayin
properties.neighborhood_overview: Unlike most neighborhoods in Malibu, you would not only be staying in a private, gated estate but conveniently located near a large grocery store, restaurants, cafe's, (Starbucks!), shops (hair salon, yoga studio, pharmacy & more), gas station, and famous beaches.
properties.notes: If you are highly allergic to dogs or cats, even though we never allow them into this Suite, you might not want to stay here.  I've never had a problem in the past, I just wanted to put it out there just in case.  :) To keep our costs affordable for all guests, the large swimming pool is not heated during the cooler months.  However, we will be more than happy to heat the pool if you're interested in paying an additional 75 a day, for 8 hours to 80 degrees.  The spa is heated at no charge.
properties.transit: You're only 2 minutes away from the beach by car, and 2 minutes walking distance to shops, cafés and restaurants!  But if you don't feel like driving and want to explore more of Malibu, then jump on the Metro Bus!  It's only a 3 minute walk and it runs up and down Pacific Coast Highway (PCH) and even goes into Santa Monica and Los Angeles!  Be sure to check the Metro schedule online to get accurate dates and pick up times and see a full list of destinations.
properties.access: You will have access to enjoy the whole backyard... Patios, large Pool, Spa, Tennis Court, Gazebo with lounge chairs, and the tranquil gardens.
properties.interaction: We give our guests total privacy but are available if they need anything!
properties.house_rules: - House Rules:    We feel our home is a very special place, so we ask that you treat it accordingly.  It is not a party house and we respect our neighbors' right to peace and quiet, please no loud music or excessive noise.  Additional guests are not allowed on the property without our prior approval, otherwise additional charges will apply.  This is a non-smoking environment, smoking is not allowed in the home or on the grounds.  Like most in Malibu, we are on septic so please only use the toilet paper provided (nothing else down the toilet please).  Most importantly we hope you enjoy your stay so don't hesitate to ask for our help if you need anything!
properties.host_about:
Greetings!  Thank you for taking the time to look at my property and considering me as a host.  I was born and raised in a wonderful small town in Texas and made my way to the Los Angeles area 29 years ago.  I can't believe it's been that long!  During that time I got married, opened a business with my husband, raised children and settled in Malibu where I've lived now for 16 years.  It's amazing that a lifetime can be summed up in a small paragraph.  :)

I love movies, nature, gardening, animals, traveling, museums, people, visiting with friends, and mostly spending time with my family.  And I'm addicted to Mexican food which I could eat every day! 

To my surprise, I've thoroughly enjoyed the whole experience I've had renting our house, meeting so many different people from all over the world, hearing their stories,  and especially seeing their smiling faces before and after they've stayed here.  It's such a great feeling, after all the years of serious hard work I've spent on the house and garden, knowing I've helped create a lovely memory for them.

properties.name: Luxury barn w/ stunning ocean views
properties.summary: Enjoy peace and tranquility in our Mediterranean-style barn, overlooking the magical pacific ocean. Our secluded and private space is the perfect place for couples, creatives, families, and nature lovers.
properties.space: We invite you to come for a few days, relax, enjoy and recharge yourself in our charming barn located on a 3 acre property filled with fruit trees, and native plants. This cozy two bed, two bath barn is designed to take advantage of the ocean views and perfect for indoor/ outdoor living. The living areas are open plan, with a well equipped kitchen (oven with a vent on top, a dishwasher, a beautiful copper kitchen sink, and a side by side refrigerator), a dining area with a round table and 4 chairs, and a living room with the most confortable leather couch you ever sat on before, all in one space facing the ocean views. Both bedrooms and bathrooms are designed with simplicity and comfort in mind. The master has a king sized bed with soft designer linens and a floor to ceiling reclaimed wood closet with shelving and hanging area. The 2nd guest bedroom has a queen sized bed also with soft designer linens and also a reclaimed wood closet with shelving and hanging area. Both bathrooms have

Both bedrooms and bathrooms are designed with simplicity and comfort in mind. The master has a king sized bed with soft designer linens and a floor to ceiling reclaimed
properties.neighborhood_overview: Our neighborhood is quiet and tranquil, yet only minutes to the hustle and bustle of Los Angeles. We have a lovely hike right at the beginning of our property, and a 1255 acre park only two minutes drive up the hill. Both of these hikes see little people or traffic and give you a sense of how Malibu would have been before 1850. You will hear the sea from the barn and many times Whales, Seals and dolphins can be spotted. If you love nature, this is the place for you!
properties.notes: We are happy to have children on the property, but we must inform you that as the space is on a hillside, there are areas that may not be safe for children. Although we are close to Santa Monica and Malibu town, our area feels secluded and away from it all. This is perfect in every way except one - cell phone reception! Unfortunately it is spotty in this area. If you can use web based communication - (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN)/ (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN) it is better.
properties.transit: We are four minutes uphill from the Pacific Coast Highway. You will have the most freedom if you bring a car. We have two parking spaces available for the guests. There are so many things to do on the 17 miles of coastline of Malibu, you will want to have a car to go everywhere. From our pristine public beaches, surfing, boogie-boarding, wind and kite sailing, paddle-boarding and laying out on the clean white sand, Malibu boasts 5-star eating establishments and great high-end shopping opportunities. Amazing options for hiking trails (one right next to the barn) and parks. There are public buses that travel up and down the Pacific Coast Highway, taxi services are available by telephone, and Uber.
properties.interaction: Our house is next door, we will meet you at our mutually agreed arrival time. You will be shown through the barn and made familiar with how it all works, as well as the garden areas at your disposal. Even though we are close to each other we won't disturb your visit unless there is anything you need.
properties.house_rules: Malibu is in the middle of an historic drought and Fires are a real danger Therefore Smoking is strictly prohibited on the property. There are steps behind the barn that lead up to a vista. Some of them are loose. We ask that you not walk up the steps as we cannot take responsibility for your safety. Our neighborhood is quiet and tranquil. For this reason we do not allow large groups of people, or parties on the property, due to limited parking space extra guests are not allowed.
properties.host_about:

My family and I love Malibu and are happy to share our magical view with you!

properties.neighborhood_overview: Explore a fabled beachfront town with real star power. Stretching for more than 32 miles/51 kilometers along the Pacific, Malibu is a beach town like no other. Hollywood stars and top athletes escape to oceanfront homes on long strands of beach with front-row seats of surfers and unforgettable sunsets. Considered to have some of the most perfect waves anywhere, Malibu’s Surfrider Beach was named the first World Surfing Reserve; nearby Zuma Beach is a sun magnet for locals and families; aim for quieter weekdays if that’s your style. You can shop for beach fashions, and maybe even spot one of local celebs, at the Malibu Country Mart and Malibu Lumber Yard, two adjacent and upscale retail centers. There’s dining and fishing on Malibu Pier (a great place to watch the action at Surfrider), and in winter, Point Dume at Malibu’s north end provides an ideal perch for spotting migrating gray whales. Tough as it is to drag yourself away from the ocean, head inland a short distance and you can al

Incredibly peaceful and very quiet, your privacy and comfort is of utmost importance to us, we welcome you with open, friendly care and service.
properties.space: We invite you to go off-grid for a few days, chill, revitalize and restore yourself. A spacious large one room cabin features a California King Bed with designer linens. A small but cozy table with chairs to the side of a sink area with cappuccino/coffee maker, electric teapot and modern toaster oven. Real dishes, glasses and silverware provided. Small refrigerator, high speed wireless internet and Free Netflix on streaming television or bring your own CD's to use on the TV's player. A real fireplace with an electric heater that you can turn on for ambiance alone or for heat. An attached alcove space has a large built-in writing desk, an air conditioning unit that keeps the entire space cool, and plenty of plugs for all your personal devices. Windows look out into the garden with mature trees and bird feeders that attract an incredible and diverse array of aviary visitors, we consider our location a bird sanctuary. properties.neighborhood_overview: Driving up to the property is exciting and beautiful as you wind your way up our 2.7 mile two-lane (very safe and well-paved) road in Corral Canyon. The views are spectacular and you will become familiar with the wild nature of Malibu. Up above the glitterati of the city you will experience the real appeal of our famous location. Pull over in a turn-out and watch listen, smell and breathe. Our small, tight knit neighborhood of single family homes is quiet, peaceful and very safe. Go for a walk in any direction and be greeted by friendly faces and open attitudes.
properties.notes: Our daily lodging price include cleaning fees and 12% TOT taxes we are required to collect for the City of Malibu. There will not be any extra charges to you after booking from US your host. We can make special request accommodations if you give us enough time. Once you have booked your room let us know your special needs and what you'd like to do when you get here and we will be happy to help facilitate.  Once you get here, we will not be available 24/7 but you will be able to call us with questions or an emergency. When you check in we will respectfully ask for your personal information to be kept on record during your stay for this purpose.  You may use credit cards or cash for souvenirs or anything we can provide that you may want to purchase during your stay. We have lived in Malibu 40 years and we are experts on having fun and enjoying the area. We have endless ideas and recommendations to share with you!  We will appraise you of any payment you may need to make based on a specia
properties.transit: You'll have the most freedom if you bring a car because there are so many options of things to do, Malibu spreads along 17 miles of coastline. There is one car rental business in Malibu, Hertz-Rent-A-Car. Besides our pristine public beaches, surfing, boogie-boarding, wind and kite sailing, paddle-boarding and laying out on the clean white sand, Malibu boasts 5-star eating establishments and great high-end shopping opportunities. Amazing and endless options for hiking trails, parks, spa services, classes and unique events. Don't forget our historic Adamson House Museum on famous Surfrider Beach and the elegant Malibu Racket Club for tennis. 30 minutes to an hour to drive into surrounding areas, such as Santa Monica, Beverly Hills, Hollywood, Downtown Los Angeles, Westlake, Agoura and Calabasas. Drive to the city for Music Venues, Theater, Shopping, Golf, Sporting Events and so much more. There are public buses that travel up and down the Pacific Coast Highway and taxi services are avail
properties.access: From your single private parking space on the property you will have several separate access ways to the guest cabin via stone stairways and gravel pathways. You will have 2 driveways to enter and exit the property. The garden and cabin area are situated on a 3/4 acre property and we only rent to one set of guests at a time.
properties.interaction: Your host will meet you at your mutually agreed arrival time. You will be shown through the cabin and made familiar with how it all works, as well as the garden areas at your disposal. We make a point of not disturbing our guests once they have checked in, we maintain enormous respect for your privacy. Our checkout time is 11:00am on the last day of your stay.  Please let us know if you'd prefer an afternoon check-out time, if we do not have guests coming in later that day, we'll be happy to accommodate you.
properties.house_rules: We do not accept more than 2 guests per booking (a child counts as one guest we are not age discriminatory), NO exceptions. We do not allow you to have visitors during your stay, NO exceptions.  The property will be locked closed to anyone other than you, our very special and valued guests. This is our practice for yours and our security. We do not accept pets on the property, we advertise as "Pet Free" so we can host everybody, NO exceptions. We do not allow smoking in the cabin, smoking outside only. We only accept one vehicle per booking, or two motorcycles maximum. NO motorhomes. We expect our guests to maintain respect for their hosts and neighbors by keeping noise to a minimum and caring about our property, storing trash, keeping your personal items together in your rented space, and returning in same condition anything that you borrow or rent from us.  We maintain a  conscious "small footprint" mentality lifestyle. In California we are experiencing drought conditions and are on
properties.host_about:
Resident Artist in Malibu since 1974. I've maintained a successful business  for over 40 years in the same location. My host property hovers above the ocean vistas in a classic chaparral/canyon setting. We are members of a small and tight knit neighborhood of single family dwellings, seven minutes from the main traffic artery, Pacific Coast Highway.



While vacationing at our peacefully engaging cabin and gardens you may want to visit "Leather Waves", my on site custom leather working  studio where you can see me creating my globally coveted one of a kind leather goods, specializing in clothing and accessories of renown style and elegance.

You will be viewing my beautiful printed photography and original artworks used to decorate the cabin, capturing some of Malibu's most intriguing landscapes, the surf culture, and our native plant and wildlife. In fact you might like to book a session with me to be photographed right here on the property or in one of Malibu's famous locations.

I'm a "devoted lover" of Malibu, my chosen home for life, and I will share as much of my knowledge, memories and recommendations as you wish to know. I love good fresh and heathy food, I grow many things in my extensive gardens which I will be excited to share with you in the appropriate season. I'm inspired by beautiful sunsets and clean ocean waves. I'm passionate about peacefully quiet environments filled with singing birds, expansive cloudscapes, and fresh air. Being a lifelong practitioner of Yoga you will find my rental to be an extension of my calm and serene attitudes about a compassionate and caring lifestyle. 

Like many a traveler I value a great meal at the local bistro, a cozy elegant bedroom where I can spend special romantic moments with my loved one, sitting comfortably outdoors feeling an unexpected breeze while sipping a glass of wine and hearing the birdsong of many a wildlife visitor or cozying-up at the fireplace and watching my favorite movies.

I look forward to meeting you and making your stay at the "Robbins Nest Retreat" one of your cherished memories.

properties.name: Malibu Estate-Pool/Spa/Tennis Court
properties.summary: Come enjoy this private sanctuary surrounded by lush gardens, mountain and ocean views where you can relax, swim, and play tennis inside this beautiful gated estate located in prestigious Point Dume, where you're close to everything... 2 minutes walking distance to shops, grocery store, cafés and restaurants, and 2 minutes by car to Malibu's famous beaches and even more shops, cafés, restaurants, hiking trails, horseback riding and more.
properties.space: This colonial estate sits on an acre of lush manicured grounds that include a full-size tennis court, gazebo with seating area, and a large 40 foot pool and spa. The warm, inviting traditional charm of the house is reflected through the comfortable furnishings, wainscoting, built in cabinetry, custom walnut hardwood floors and spacious rooms that effortlessly flow together offering endless panoramic views of the lush gardens, lawns, mature trees and swimming pool from the 1st floor, plus mountain and ocean views from the 2nd. There is also secure parking on the premises for up to 8 cars. This 5 bedroom, 5 bath home features a large entertainment room with several comfy sofas and chairs, living room, dining room, kitchen, laundry room, office and fitness room. This tranquil haven is located in Point Dume, one of Malibu’s most exclusive and coveted neighborhoods. ROOM DETAILS: Bedroom #1 (upstairs) The expansive Master Suite is located upstairs and has beautiful views from every window (

There is also secure parki
properties.notes: If you are highly allergic to dogs or cats, you might not want to stay here.  I've never had a problem in the past with anyone staying in the house, I just wanted to put it out there just in case.  :) EXTRAS -  Boating trip for the day, or a Sunset Sail on board a 45ft Sailboat(URL HIDDEN) Please inquire 48 hours in advance for info and rates.
properties.transit: We're close to everything!  A 2 minute walk to Point Dume Plaza where there is a grocery store (Starbuck's inside!), cafe's, restaurants, hair salon, banks, etc., and famous beaches are 2 minutes away by car.  Or you can catch the Metro Bus #534, a 3 minute walk, that runs up and down PCH to explore all the other parts of Malibu (corner of PCH and Heathercliff).  The #534 also gives you easy access to Santa Monica and Los Angeles. There are taxi services here as well OR call Uber, which is usually the cheaper option, especially if you need transportation to or from the airports.
properties.interaction: I am always available and very happy to help in any way I can to make sure you're stay here is as wonderful as possible!
properties.house_rules: - No extra guests are allowed on the property, only the number of people listed on the reservation unless you get prior approval.  Otherwise an additional charge of 100 per person per day will apply. - Like most people, we feel our home is a very special place, so we ask that you treat it accordingly.  It is NOT a party house and we respect our neighbors' right to peace and quiet, so please no loud music or excessive noise.   - We are on septic like everyone else in Malibu so please only use the toilet paper provided (nothing else down the toilets please), and no left over food, solid or partially solid, down the kitchen sink/disposal. - No smoking - No pets Most importantly we hope you enjoy your stay so please don't hesitate to ask for our help if you need anything!
properties.host_about:
Greetings!  Thank you for taking the time to look at my property and considering me as a host.  I was born and raised in a wonderful small town in Texas and made my way to the Los Angeles area 29 years ago.  I can't believe it's been that long!  During that time I got married, opened a business with my husband, raised children and settled in Malibu where I've lived now for 16 years.  It's amazing that a lifetime can be summed up in a small paragraph.  :)

I love movies, nature, gardening, animals, traveling, museums, people, visiting with friends, and mostly spending time with my family.  And I'm addicted to Mexican food which I could eat every day! 

To my surprise, I've thoroughly enjoyed the whole experience I've had renting our house, meeting so many different people from all over the world, hearing their stories,  and especially seeing their smiling faces before and after they've stayed here.  It's such a great feeling, after all the years of serious hard work I've spent on the house and garden, knowing I've helped create a lovely memory for them.

properties.name: Beachfront 2BD, 2.5BA Malibu Condo
properties.summary: Beautiful Condo right on Latigo Beach in Malibu. 2 Bedroom, 2.5 Bathroom with a full kitchen and balcony overlooking the ocean. The Condo provides access to a private beach, pool, hot tub, sauna and gym. Great surf and SUP spot. Comfortably sleeps 4+

properties.name: La Cima - Cozy, Retro Mountain top with ocean view
properties.summary: Can't afford AJA Sanctuary? At La Cima we breath the same mountain air, share the same view, and hike the same park trails. We offer privacy, serenity & nature.  We have an ocean view, private entrance, full bath, king/twin beds, kitchenette, wi-fi, Direct TV, heating, A/C, garden area, BBQ, off-street parking.  We are up a winding canyon road, adjacent to Santa Monica National Park, near Malibu wine trail, 20 mins to Zuma Beach, 20 mins from Malibu Pier and Agoura Hills.
properties.space: We are located between the City of Malibu and the City of Agoura Hills - 3 miles of canyon road to Kanan Road which will get you to the 101 Freeway or PCH, or 7 miles of canyon road to PCH.  Your accommodation is comfortable and equipped with mini-frig, microwave, coffee maker, toaster and toaster oven, hot plate, individually controlled heating and A/C unit, and internet access.  Cell service is usually available, with At&T being the most reliable.  T-Mobile does not work here.  We provide, coffee, tea, and bottled water.  Please bring breakfast essentials, snacks, microwavables, etc. Enjoy the serenity of the Santa Monica Mountains, it's animal life, and beautiful vistas from the privacy of your own retreat.   We are adjacent to the Santa Monica National Park trails, 10 mins by car from the Malibu Wine Trail, and 20 mins by car from Malibu Civic Center, Surfrider Beach, Zuma Beach, Agoura Hills, and Westlake Village.   Enjoy your brew in the morning and pour yourself a glass of local

Cell service is usually available, with At&T being the most reliable.  T-Mobile does not work here.  We provide, coffee, tea, and bottled w
properties.neighborhood_overview: We are located off a public, paved road at an elevation of 2100 feet with an ocean view.  We are what most people would consider "remote."  Our nearest neighbor is about 800 feet away and the road, although paved,  is winding and does not have street lights.  However, we are only a 15-20 mins by car to the beach, restaurants, movies, and only 10 mins to the Malibu Wine Country, and adjacent to the trails of the Santa Monica Mountains.  During the right season, you will see citrus and roses outside your door, and maybe even hummingbirds or an oriole or two.  The crows may wake you in the morning, and if you are lucky you will see our resident fox or bobcat at night.  At the right time of year, you will also hear the owls.  We built the house almost 40 years ago, and have lived here ever since, as have the owls.  This is not a new property nor are  we "glamorous" but this is life in the Malibu Mountains.  We are very comfortable here and we think you will be too.  We hope you enjoy your
properties.notes: You will have coffee, tea, and bottled water supplied.  Please bring other drinks you may wish to have, as well as breakfast items or snacks with you because we do not have stores nearby, however, no matter how you get here, you pass grocery stores, so do pick up supplies.  Any additional items, if requested at least 48 hours prior to arrival, can be arranged at a surcharge.  There are dishes, glasses, and other utensils in the kitchenette.  Shampoo, hair dryer, soap, and other essentials usually supplied in a hotel, are provided.  Hangers are in the closet.  Cleaning service and renewal of linens is provided once a week, unless requested more often, at an additional charge.  If you wish to do bird watching or star gazing, please bring your own binoculars and/or telescope.  We are not suitable for pets or small children, and only allow a maximum of 2 people in the room.  Minimum stay is 2 nights.  Maximum stay is one week.
properties.transit: Having your own car is recommended.  There is no public transportation even remotely nearby.  If you don't want to drive, we can provide airport transfer for 75 each direction from LAX or BUR, and car and driver for 250 a day, plus gas, no more than 2 people, .  Or, you can hire a limo, taxi, or Uber as needed on your own.
properties.access: Your entrance is private and your parking is off-street and inside the property.  Parking is restricted to guest's vehicle only.
properties.interaction: We will meet you at a pre-arranged time when you arrive to show you how things work, the garden area at your disposal, provide safety instructions, and a list of attractions in the area.  Like a hotel, we will need driver license for registration.  After that, we will make it a point not to disturb you.  We respect your privacy and want you to respect our privacy.  Part of the joy of being here is the solitude and the remoteness of the mountains, the peace, serenity, and privacy that comes with the place.  If you have an emergency, we will be available but other than that, we want you to enjoy the natural surroundings, although civilization is just a hop, skip, and a jump away, as is the glamour of Malibu and its beaches.  We are only an hour from LAX but an eternity away from the hustle and bustle of the city.  It is unique.  You won't believe you are in L.A.!
properties.house_rules: If guests smoke, we must be notified prior to arrival, and all smoking must be done outside in a restricted smoking area.  We are in a fire area and smoking can be dangerous.  Guests must respect all wildlife on the property and should not leave any food items outside, nor leave the door open when they are not present, do not leave trash outside, even in a plastic bag, as critters will probably sniff it out.  Due to safety reasons children and pets are not allowed.  No parties or additional guests are allowed on the property.  Maximum 2 guests.  No pets or children. Minimum stay of 2 nights.  Maximum stay of 7 nights.
properties.host_about: I built the house 40 years ago and have never left.  I enjoy gardens, music, wildlife, good food, and fine wines.  My favorite travel destination is Africa, perhaps which is why I have been on 18 safaris!

A romantic weekend getaway for couples, a quiet place during the week for business travelers, or a base camp for all of your ocean and mountain adventures. A short walk to great restaurants such as Duke's, Moonshadows, and Nobu. We are also ideally located next to Malibu Divers. It's all about the location, the outdoors, and of course, the beach!

As guests, we are clean and respectful of the homes we stay in. Many good experiences as guests on Airbnb have encouraged us to share our home as well. We love hosting and look forward to meeting new people and making friends. We hope you will enjoy our home!

There is a private entrance, bathroom and large bedroom with queen bed, parking..Wi-fi, tv, coffee maker, mini fridge, microwave.  We are surrounded by an ampitheater of mountains and beautiful nature views.
properties.space: The space including the bathroom and entrance. is very nicely separated even though in the main house.  There is nature all around, with beautiful oaks everywhere.  We will help you find your way around if you need us.  There are french doors opening to a small private outdoor space for guests.

properties.notes: We provide little amenities like shampoo, conditioner, soap, towels, hair dryer, iron, coffee, and tea.  If you have special requests, no promises, but we will accommodate when possible.

properties.interaction: We are happy to chat when we're available and to help with referrals to restaurants, sightseeing locations, hikes, and to answer any questions you might have about the area.
properties.house_rules: -Guests are provided with private mini fridge, microwave, and coffee maker for their own use. -Guests provide their own transportation to and from this location.  A car is strongly advised as we are not near public transit. Uber is available. -Doors are NEVER to be left open to outside.  We have a cat and this is coyote territory.
properties.host_about:
My husband and I are teachers, musicians and coaches.  We value the beauty and comfort of our mountain refuge. We have one cat named Lucy who you will probably never see because she hides from people
  Our space is beautiful, tranquil and serene, ten minutes up a fairly windy mountain road from the beach in the middle of Malibu.  The bedroom/bathroom space is separated in a way that makes for a lot of privacy..we've made our college age son's space into a little sanctuary with everything you could need, a cozy queen bed with full private bathroom, private entrance, easy parking,extras like microwave, mini fridge, coffee maker,..flat screen with cable,..down quilt,..we love it up here and hope you will too!

properties.name: Malibu Escapes - Cloud Studio Suite
properties.summary: Perched atop a stunning Malibu Canyon Home is a unique studio ideal for a elusive, healing or very romantic getaway. Those seeking a special environment with open vistas, fresh clean air, expansive & elevated ocean views, and access to the Coast & Wine District in less then 3 miles will appreciate the turn-key commodities this space offers. You can "escape" and turn if all "off"  OR you can elect Uber and WiFi phone if you need to be "on."  (NOTE: Driving directions are required reading.)
properties.space: The suite is approximately 780 square feet. It includes a walk out patio veranda that is the perfect place for either an evening barbecue or to connect with the sun in the eastern horizon as it comes up in the morning. It has a Mediterranean aesthetic and a broad vista architecture. Truly a unique space that reminds me of a tree-house because of its elevation and seclusion to the main house. The property is a working Ranchitta with goats, chickens, and horses.  A generous private bath with a jet bath tub & walk-in tiled shower is what sets this space a part from the rest. This space is perfect for the environmentally conscious and those looking for healing. If you are interested in serenity and opportunities to go hiking, ride horses, relax, and enjoy your own space, this is the perfect spot for you. I'm equestrian and enjoy several horses, goat and chickens on my property and private trail access in the Santa Monica Mountains.  Mountain & street biking opportunities abound.  The infam

You can "escape" and turn if all "off"  OR you can elect Uber and WiFi phone if you need to be "on."  (NOTE: Driving directions are required reading.) The suite is approximately 780 square feet. It includes a walk out patio veranda that is the perfect place for either an evening barbecue or to connect with the sun in the eastern horizon as it comes up in the morning. It has a Mediterranean aesthetic and a broad vista architecture. Truly a unique space that reminds me of a tree-house because of its elevation and seclusion to the main house. The property is a working Ranchitta with goats, chickens, and horses.  A generous private bath with a jet bath
properties.neighborhood_overview: This neighborhood offers a unique Native American history that supports spirituality and a connection to nature. There is plenty of fresh air and natural lighting. You will find peace and inspiration of all kinds. It is perfectly situated between the Pacific Coast Highway and Interstate 101, giving you wide access to the Greater Los Angeles Area. You may hike, bike, surf, swim, boogie board, go wine tasting, and visit Pepperdine University all within 10-15 minutes. There is also a beautiful creek walk along the property.
properties.notes: Unique characteristics to the area:  California is in drought and ask that you are considerate of all resources especially water.  There is off street parking available. ALL of Malibu is on a septic system and requires your cooperation.  There is "on site" laundry for emergencies and extended bookings. Please note it is very quiet in the neighborhood. Our "white noise" is owls, coyotes, and bobcats and when there is water in the stream, frogs!   We appreciate your keeping it that way.  Thank you.
properties.transit: A car to get around provides flexibility.  However, Uber access is generally available.  The property is located up through the canyons, inland from the coast.  Approximately 3 miles from PCH. Uber is available in the area, which is recommended if you are going wine tasting.  Please select Uber drivers that are familiar with the area and also read and speak fluent English.  The canyons are not for someone that is "already lost or unfamiliar with the area," particularly after dusk.    While we are only 3 miles off PCH, it is a world apart!  Rural - ie, few street lights, no sidewalks, windy canyon.  Please select  your driver carefully and provide him with the detail directions to get here successfully.  We are only 3 turns and only 3 miles off of PCH, but it can feel disorienting with canyon roads, especially after sunset.  Thank you.
properties.access: You have your own private access to the suite with your own set of keys. You will take a flight of stairs down from the main street to the entrance of the suite. There are lights that serve to guide your steps if you arrive past sunset. Malibu lights operate from dusk to dawn.  You have complete access to the perimeters of your suite and adjacent outdoor barbecue patio.  I request that you please respect the personal boundaries of the two lower floors of the main residence where I reside.  Please understand, you are ALWAYS encourage to contact me by phone, text or simply ringing the front doorbell.
properties.interaction: I honor your space & time during your stay in the Cloud Suite. If you need recommendations I am available and open to helping you.  As an equestrian, I also can provide guided horseback trail rides through the private park trails adjacent to my property (additional cost to your stay).  Experienced riders only please.  Additionally, if you would enjoy a massage therapist and esthetician, yoga instructor or coach to visit, I can arrange that for you.
properties.house_rules: No parties or loud music -  this is a quiet retreat space. Please be respectful of your noise levels and footprint.  Large exterior lights are extinguished by 10 PM to allow us all to enjoy the  amazing star display in our black (non-city) sky.   No smoking of any kind, as Malibu has fallen victim to fires in her past.  Will consider small pets on an individual basis for 20/night.  Feel free to inquire. Film shoot inquires should be directed to the Site Manager to arrange for shoots on the grounds.  Contact Host to arrange for bookings.   This property is not appropriate for running commercial ventures that involve client visits.
properties.host_about:
I am an outdoor, nature enthusiast! Having lived in Malibu for more than 20 years I have deep knowledge of and can recommend beautiful equestrian and mountain bike trails as well as some of the best and/or most challenging hikes in the Santa Monica Mountains.   

It would be my pleasure to introduce you to the benefits of nature and what this community has to offer.

I have three gated horses - two Rocky Mountains and one Missouri Fox Trotter, all with excellent credentials work & knowledge of the Santa Monica Mountains.  For experienced riders, feel free to contact me if you are interested in working out an add-on riding experienced overlooking the Pacific of exploring the largest urban park in the US ... just out of your back door!

Your first evening welcomes you with a bottle of fine wine from one of Malibu's local wineries. Should you want to tour the wineries and experience an afternoon of wine tasting, they're but minutes away.

A barbecue on a lovely outdoor private patio is yours to use while you are a guest here at the 'Angels of the Oaks'. We are in a California Shenandoah Oak Preserve surrounded by national and state parks. Caution with sparks required.

Should you be interested in being pampered, massage therapists, aestheticians, yoga instructors are only minutes away. 

I would be very happy to make the arrangements for you.

For those evenings that you simply want to cozy up and enjoy the movies or a premium series, Netflix is available for you to enjoy.

I look forward to welcoming you to what guests have said is a magical, energizing, and beautiful place to call home for as many days as you choose to stay.

properties.name: Peace, Beauty & Ocean View, Malibu
properties.summary: This beautiful home has little traffic with panoramic ocean views of the Santa Monica bay, Catalina island and beyond.  The guest room is gracefully furnished and inviting.  The private bath features bright lighting, onyx tile work and modern fixtures.  Enjoy Wi-Fi, kitchen access and patio dining, Jacuzzi.  Relaxing with the view during the day and the stars at night.
properties.space: We loved this house and property from the first moment we saw it many years ago!   It is a place to relax and refresh from the activity of the city and enjoy the peace and beauty of nature.  Just stretch you eyes over the Santa Monica Bay and take a deep breath!   We are a family of three in residence, please come join us!
properties.description: This beautiful home has little traffic with panoramic ocean views of the Santa Monica bay, Catalina island and beyond.  The guest room is gracefully furnished and inviting.  The private bath features bright lighting, onyx tile work and modern fixtures.  Enjoy Wi-Fi, kitchen access and patio dining, Jacuzzi.  Relaxing with the view during the day and the stars at night. We loved this house and property from the first moment we saw it many years ago!   It is a place to relax and refresh from the activity of the city and enjoy the peace and beauty of nature.  Just stretch you eyes over the Santa Monica Bay and take a deep breath!   We are a family of three in residence, please come join us! You will have a lovely guest room and private on-suite bath and are welcome to use the outdoor areas, living room, kitchen and laundry.  Please feel free to make basic meals if desired, or bring in take-out.   You may park in the driveway and we have level 2 charging for electric vehicles.  If you are
properties.neighborhood_overview: We live in a quiet neighborhood with no through traffic.  There is a private security patrol that comes by at lease twice a day.  There are some rural trails close by if you would like to do some hiking.  The best thing though is lying on the chaise lounge and gazing upon the beautiful blue Pacific ocean with a glass of wine in hand!
properties.notes: We have two small dogs that will greet you with a bark.  They are friendly and always looking for a pat on the head or a treat.   In the morning we provide a continental breakfast of coffee, tea, juice, fruit, bakery items and cereal.  If you have special requests or dietary needs we are happy to oblige, just let us know. If you require a second room there is one available.  It has a queen sized bed and is available for 50 per night for each additional guest.  So parties of 3-4 are welcome!
properties.transit: Uber and Lift both readily patrol Malibu so a car ride is never more than a few minutes away.   There are taxi companies that serve Malibu and a bus stop on PCH at the bottom of our road, about a 1 mile walk from our home. (URL HIDDEN) is a directory for everything in Malibu!
properties.access: You will have a lovely guest room and private on-suite bath and are welcome to use the outdoor areas, living room, kitchen and laundry.  Please feel free to make basic meals if desired, or bring in take-out.   You may park in the driveway and we have level 2 charging for electric vehicles.  If you are planning a day at the beach we  have towels and beach chairs for your use.   The Jacuzzi overlooks the ocean and is a great way to end the day.  There is also a water filtration system to provide soft water throughout the house.
properties.interaction: We're delighted to tell you everything we can and know about our beautiful Malibu area.  Having lived here 21 years gives us a unique edge as to best values for shopping, eating, beach activities, traffic patterns, and more.  Meeting new people is one of the most exciting ways we enjoy being hosts.  Any questions, just ask!
properties.house_rules: Please no smoking in the house, only in the designated area outside.  No pets (although some exceptions might be made if it's a small pet, friendly with other dogs, and willing to pay an additional fee).  Please no additional outside guests or overnight guests without discussing it with us first.  We love children!  Babies and older children are easy guests but small children must be carefully supervised as there are many breakable objects within the reach of little hands.
properties.host_about: We are a quiet behind the scenes, let's make everyone happy, family.  We both work full time.  Our quiet 15 year old son is home during the summer when he's not off with the boy scouts.  We're looking forward to sharing our beautiful environment with you and believe you will find the serenity you seek. Of course the night and day life of both Malibu and Santa Monica are just moments away and all the beautiful beach you want.  Come and join us

properties.name: Malibu By The Sea Beachfront Apt
properties.summary: Spring has arrived and Malibu is more beautiful than ever with wildflowers everywhere!  It's a wonderful time to walk on the beach and watch for passing whales from the deck.  Take in the sunset.  Fall asleep to the sound of ocean waves. This quiet and private apartment with elegant rustic charm and comfort is right above the sand, with a living and dining area, a fully equipped kitchen, cozy bedroom, and beautiful marble bathroom and shower.
properties.space: This beachfront apartment is right above the sand and surf.  At night the sounds of the sea will lull you to sleep.  During the day, you can watch the sea lions sunning on the rocks and dolphins and whales swimming by or go for a walk along the water's edge and dive in yourself.  This is an amazing place to have a glass of wine and watch the sunset and relax!  In the evening, the lights of the "Queen's Necklace" glimmer in the distance and the moonlight shines on the water.   The living room is cozy with two loveseats to snuggle in and watch a movie on the 50" flat screen TV.  Three large sliding glass doors open up if you want to let the ocean breezes blow through.   The kitchen is small but fully equipped with an apartment size stove and oven, a microwave, a Keurig coffee maker and a French press, tea kettle, toaster and all the dishes and pots and pans you need.  A round table with linens provides a beautiful spot for morning coffee. The bedroom has a queen bed with a new organic ma

This beachfront apartment is right above the sand and surf.  At night the sounds of the sea will lull you to sleep. The living room is cozy with two loveseats to snuggle in and watch a mov
properties.neighborhood_overview: This quiet neighborhood, perched between the ocean and Pacific Coast Highway has two excellent restaurants.  Moonshadows is within walking distance and has delicious food and drinks!  Duke's is a bit farther down the highway with a Hawaiian theme.  Both restaurants have beautiful ocean views!
properties.notes: At high tide, the ocean may come right up to the seawall limiting beach availability.  This all depends on the moon, the tides and the amount of sand that we have.  This can really vary from day to day and depending on the season.  This winter, rough seas washed away our private stairs to the beach, so guests need to use the public access stairs just a few houses away and a very short walk.
properties.transit: There is bus service available just a minute from the apartment that will take you into Santa Monica or the center of Malibu, or farther north to some of Malibu's more remote beaches.  Uber is readily available.
properties.access: Two-person kayak (life jackets available) Boogie Boards and a surfboard Television with premium channels (HBO, Showtime, etc.) Wi-Fi  Shared entry gate with one other unit.
properties.interaction: My husband and I live in a small cottage above the apartment but the only shared space is the entry door.  We rarely even see our guests. However, I am always available to answer questions or concerns but almost no one has them!
properties.house_rules: No smoking inside the house but if you do smoke, feel free to smoke outside.

Private, garden view home that is walking distance to a grocery store, coffee shop, smoothie shop, yoga studio and restaurants. You are also close to one of the most beautiful hikes in Malibu, Zuma Canyon Trailhead. Zuma is a great surf spot with its endless beach for you to enjoy!

We are a down-to-earth couple that loves to travel. Jane works as a professor and Mike is in the entertainment business. In our spare time, we love to swim, surf and play water polo. We also love the arts and culture!

As guests, we are clean and respectful of the homes we stay in. Many good experiences as guests on Airbnb have encouraged us to share our home as well. We love hosting and look forward to meeting new people and making friends. We hope you will enjoy our home!

A truly unique Malibu location with a special neighborhood feeling.

properties.transit: Close to shops, restaurants of all price levels and grocery stores.  A minute to PCH and close to Escondido Beach and the Santa Monica Mountains hiking trails including the Escondido Falls waterfall trail.   Easy, safe access to everything from the home.....not up the canyon.

properties.neighborhood_overview: We are located at the end of a quiet cul-de-sac in a high end, prestigious, peaceful, beachy and star studded neighborhood. We are just a few minutes walk to Broad Beach and a few minutes drive to some amazing hiking trails. There are many delicious restaurants, wineries and nightlife spots in the area.
properties.notes: Malibu has a very strict noise ordinance that prohibits loud noise after 10pm. Please do your part in respecting the communities wishes as well as keeping our neighbors happy, by keeping your noise to a minimum. Malibu offers so much to do during the day to exert your energy. Go hiking, surfing, walking, biking, do yoga with the locals, run the beaches...then come home make a delicious dinner, sit by the fireplace or soak in the spa under the stars.
properties.transit: Parking for 3 cars in our driveway and an additional car can be parked on the street in front. Uber is available in the area. There is a local bus that can take you through Malibu or in to Santa Monica, Venice or throughout Los Angeles. The bus stop is just a couple of miles away.
properties.access: Our guests will have access to the entire home, yard, spa, patios and deck.
properties.interaction: We are available to come and meet you, let you in and show you around...if you wish. Otherwise, we will respect your privacy and have a secured lock box with the keys to let yourselves in and a welcome booklet to inform you on everything you need to know, see and and do. We are born and raised Malibu locals, so we have a lot of wonderful suggestions for food, drinks, beaches, hiking trails, shopping, exercise spots and things to do.
properties.house_rules: Please treat us, our home and neighborhood with respect.  No parties. No more than the agreed amount of people at the house at any time. No loud music or noise (particularly past 10pm and in front). No smoking. No pets. Respect your neighbors. Try to conserve energy and water by turning off lights and keeping baths and showers short and sweet. Please keep the house clean and organized...leave the sand at the beach and out of the house as much as possible. Most importantly, enjoy, relax, get inspired, rejuvenated and have a good ol' time.

properties.house_rules: 1. No smoking of tobacco products or fires of any kind on the Property.  Property is located in an extreme fire zone area. 2.Do not touch or approach the two Wild Mustang horses, on the Property.  Horses are in fenced pastures.  Do not enter pasture areas.  3.Drive out of driveway/parking area in a forward direction.  Do not back onto Mulholland Highway.  Bicyclists, motorcycles and cars unexpectedly come around the bend.   4.Close all gates you walk through.  Gates are intended to keep domestic animals inside the Property and wildlife outside the Property. 5.Keep water usage to a minimum.  Home is on a well and excessive use of water is discouraged because of drought in the state of California. 6.Do not approach natural wildlife that may wander on the Property (e.g., coyote, rattlesnake, mountain lion, bobcat, deer, raccoon and fox).  Animal wildlife can be dangerous to humans and can cause injury to those that approach them.   7.Refrain from the use of harsh chemicals (e.g., hair dye
properties.host_about:
We are longtime Malibu mountain dwellers.  We raised our family here and  are happy to welcome visitors into our Malibu mountain retreat where we enjoy hiking the 70 miles of the Santa Monica Malibu Backbone Trail, our wild mustang horses, jogging at sunset on beautiful Leo Carrillo beach and countless outdoor activities in Malibu.  
Guests will enjoy our home's wonderful peace and quiet as well as comfortable accommodations in our architecturally unique space.

properties.summary: Dreamy Malibu getaway nestled in the canyons. Perfect for a family or group getaway, or even a couples retreat. Peaceful setting, ranch style property provides perfect escape from a hectic city. Great launching point for exploring Malibu, enjoying the beach, or hiking and wine tasting (5 min from Malibu Wines).  Relax by a gorgeous pool, stay connected with fast wifi, and live in style with luxury furnishings. Available for long term and short term stays. You will never forget your time here!

This 3 bedroom and 3 bathroom house with its large windows makes the house naturally well lit, especially the living room and bedrooms. The house has a spacious living and dining area, a fully functional kitchen, washer, dryer in the unit, free high speed internet and 3 large bedrooms and bathrooms. Two out of the three bedrooms have king sized beds, the other has 2 single beds, a couch that can turn into an extra bed making it ideal for a family or a large group staying. Surrounding the house is a large open space and a pool and jacuzzi to relax by.  A peaceful location if you are looking for some quiet time but don’t want to be too far away from the city life. The house has a very modern look from the inside yet the overall property has a ranch style look to it. Perfect place for exploring Malibu and neighboring areas. Take a drive down pacific coast highway, or g
properties.notes: This gorgeous 3 bedroom and 3 bathroom ranch house is nestled in the hills of Malibu, a perfect getaway location if you’re looking for some peace and quiet yet not completely hidden from the city life. With natural light filtering through the large windows, gives the place a very bright and yet homely look to it. Large living and dining area and a full kitchen to make you feel right at home. Three spacious bedrooms and bathrooms makes it an ideal place for a family or large group to stay comfortably. The house contains free high speed internet, two large king size beds, two single beds, a couch that can turn into an extra bed, washer and dryer in the unit, and a fully functional kitchen. Location is ideal, 5 minutes from Calamigos Ranch, Malibu wine tasting, Malibu beaches and pier and great restaurants to try out around Malibu.
properties.interaction: The property is private, but it is located on a ranch estate so do not be surprised if an occasional gardener or pool man is on the property! There are also other houses on the ranch, but this home is a separate structure on it's own.

(thats in winter, spring and fall usually) The beach is very often totally empty and theres hardly ever more than a few people on it .    Also note , the second bedroom is more of a universal room that converts into a second bedroom or whatever guests want it to be, It works very well , and still gives you an ocean view .  I have been doing it for my guests for years and everyone has always been very comfortable and happy.

properties.neighborhood_overview: This is a special part of Malibu, I like to call it the "pre-Bu"  Its just barely inside Malibu city limits, making it an easier commute. Also most of the people in this area are great. just really nice quiet people, not too fancy, but very very beachy and cool.
properties.notes: great neighborhood, friendly fish , shy lobsters , quiet birds, playful dolphin silly seals and hardly any people.
properties.transit: there is a public bus stop 3-5 minutes away ,and the world famous beautiful Pacific Coast Highway is the route to everywhere   No matter where you stay in Malibu,  Please take PCH seriously,  she is as dangerous as she is beautiful, maybe more, too much going on and too many beautiful things to look at, whether its the sea or mountain or sunset or surfer girls/guys or fancy car or maybe a celebrity,  so just please be safe on PCH !!
properties.access: Two exits from house to the  beach , Kayaks, paddleboard, fishing gear, boogie boards, surf boards, snorkle gear and other various recreational goodies.  telescopes, books, and lots of fresh air and sunshine!There are tons of great hiking trails nearby, and only 12-15 minute drive to the  Santa Monica pier, great shopping and sights .
properties.interaction: Check in time is the standard 3pm but I am flexible and will arrange check in anytime after that as well.  Sometimes I have guests checking in hours after guests check out and housekeeping can run late once in a while. I am  around if needed for any reason to make your stay better if anything were to come up, such as a maintenance issue or questions you may have , other than that,ill be leaving guests alone, just like I would want to be if I were the one on holiday:) perhaps I may call to give you a heads up that  a whale is going by , Only for the really  important stuff like that  tho.
properties.house_rules: Rule #1 and the most important rule is : Just enjoy yourself  ! there will be absolutely no stressing allowed in my house. Only good times are permitted here.  You are here to relax , please do. Check in time is the standard 3 pm.  I have it posted as 8-10am on the listing  because the payment goes through 24  after  check-in time. I am flexible and the house has  keyless entry so late night check-ins are fine too. .Some pets are allowed but must be approved by me beforehand, not all pets will be approved and there will be an additional cleaning fee and possibly an increased security deposit as well.  Bringing pets or having parties  that have not been  approved will result in your reservation being terminated without refund  .  Phone coverage here is pretty lousy, and the internet goes down from time to time, between the salt  water corroding everything and being surrounded by mountains it can be tough, I love it like that, peaceful and sometimes cutoff . there is only one TV which is
properties.host_about: I am a commercial diver by trade. I did underwater construction for the oil co.s in the Gulf of Mexico for 12 years.  The sea is the first thing I ever loved . There is a romance between us that can not be explained This area I live in is special and has very special energy that heals and restores ones mind body and soul like no other place, and I just feel it needs to be available for others to benefit from.  I just want  the same thing for everyone, myself included. To enjoy life , and be well.

properties.neighborhood_overview: Big Rock Beach in Malibu is truly a unique place. There is so much marine life right at your door steps along with activities of all types. From Dolphins & Whale watching on the patio, to strolling along the beach in this very secure & dog friendly stretch of sand. You can take part in Paddle boarding & sunning just steps from the house... This neighborhood is one of a kind & the beach life is like no other! Centrally located near Moonshadows, Dukes, Mastros Seafood, Geoffrey's, Nobu, and other restaurants, along with local grocery stores, gas stations, quick marts, the Malibu pier, & more!  Malibu along PCH is not typically a street you would walk. I would suggest a car or Uber to get around. Within 1 mile there are restaurants and gas stations & within 6 miles are a majority of Malibu's greatest restaurants and spots to visit.
properties.notes: Pets must be approved prior to arrival and there is an additional pet and cleaning fee No more than 2 guests are included in the reservation without prior consent  No parties or events No smoking inside the house but if you do smoke, feel free to smoke outside.
properties.transit: Your best option will be renting a car if you don't have one. Uber frequents this area so that is an option too. There are bike paths close by within 10 minutes driving distance & bike rentals as well. It's not safe to walk along PCH due to the amount of cars and the speed way of the street.
properties.access: •Guest(s) may use all the rooms in this home. •No closets are available but there is shelving to store your personal items if needed. •Private beach access stairs located at this home (below the home the stairs lead directly to the sand/beach)
properties.interaction: Please contact me directly & I will assist with all your needs. There are others who live on the property in other units but please be mindful & do not disturb the neighbors. Thank you!
properties.house_rules: Think of this stay as your personal retreat: calm, relaxing, & tranquil! Enjoy your time but also be considerate of the neighbors & respectful of my home. No parties, houseguests, or pets allowed without prior written consent by me.

properties.interaction: Owner will greet and be in adjoining house if assistance is needed.  You will be left to your privacy.
properties.house_rules: 1. No smoking of tobacco products or fires of any kind on the Property.  Property is located in an extreme fire zone area. 2.Do not touch or approach the two Wild Mustang horses, on the Property.  Horses are in fenced pastures.  Do not enter pasture areas.  3.Drive out of driveway/parking area in a forward direction.  Do not back onto Mulholland Highway.  Bicyclists, motorcycles and cars unexpectedly come around the bend.   4.Close all gates you walk through.  Gates are intended to keep domestic animals inside the Property and wildlife outside the Property. 5.Keep water usage to a minimum.  Home is on a well and excessive use of water is discouraged because of drought in the state of California. 6.Do not approach natural wildlife that may wander on the Property (e.g., coyote, rattlesnake, mountain lion, bobcat, deer, raccoon and fox).  Animal wildlife can be dangerous to humans and can cause injury to those that approach them.   7.Refrain from the use of harsh chemicals (e.g., hair dye
properties.host_about:
We are longtime Malibu mountain dwellers.  We raised our family here and  are happy to welcome visitors into our Malibu mountain retreat where we enjoy hiking the 70 miles of the Santa Monica Malibu Backbone Trail, our wild mustang horses, jogging at sunset on beautiful Leo Carrillo beach and countless outdoor activities in Malibu.  
Guests will enjoy our home's wonderful peace and quiet as well as comfortable accommodations in our architecturally unique space.

properties.name: The Malibu on the Ocean Lifestyle
properties.summary: Impossible to be closer to the Pacific Ocean without being on a boat! Directly Situated hovering a Wet Beach in South Malibu, close to Venice + Santa Monica. Very Bright with tons of natural light, sundeck directly over the water, 2 clean bathrooms! If you are looking for profile picture worthy photos that will impress all your friends - this is the spot you want! You won't find better views than this place. Two big bedrooms with comfortable beds, clean bathroom, and an amazing location!
properties.space: Our place is very unassuming from the outside, but when you enter, you are transported to an amazing oceanfront experience. The living room, kitchen, dining area have a great indoor/outdoor feeling to them and this is where we like to spend most of our time when we are home. We have a sweet sun deck where you can catch some sun, enjoy a drink, or just lose yourself in the sights, smells, and sounds of the ocean.  Our place is about 1100 Sq Ft. It has two separate bedrooms and two full bathrooms. We LOVE to travel and love having our friends stay with us so have tried to design the place to maximize sleeping solutions for guests. The master bedroom has a king size bed, a closet, and an attached full bathroom. The second bedroom has a queen size bed, a dresser, and a closet. There is a full bathroom down the hall from the bedrooms. There is a big sectional as well as a comfortable queen size air bed. There is a dining table with an unbeatable ocean view that isn’t available at Nobu unles

properties.neighborhood_overview: Malibu is a dream.  There are celebrities everywhere, the weather is perfect, and everybody is nice.  Your neighbors on this property will likely be dolphins, pelicans, and seagulls, as you're at the beach! A dream location with breath taking views. It starts from the moment you enter your Malibu getaway, from early morning sunrise, to spectacular sunsets and magical moon beams across the ocean floor. High ceilings and a wood burning fireplace enhance the romance of your relaxing vacation. A well equipped kitchen, outdoor grill, large outdoor deck, and the ocean view dining promise great meals and quality moments together. Dolphins, seals, pelicans , sea gulls, and if you're lucky a whale, add to the magical natural setting. Relax on the deck, walk on the sand, surf, kayak, and swimming are steps from your front door. Be one of the first to spend time in this truly different and unique beach home that represents the 'old Malibu vibe,' yet renovated for your every comfort. The view usua

We provide a beginning supply of bathroom tissue and hand soap!

properties.summary: Get a taste of the tropics in sunny southern California at Malibu Tropical Retreat. Inspired by the architecture of Bali and built to LEED platinum standards, this stunning four-bedroom vacation rental in the Point Dume neighborhood combines breezy island style with eco-friendly luxury.
properties.space: *All credit card holders must be aged 25 years and older at the time of booking. Get a taste of the tropics in sunny southern California at Malibu Tropical Retreat. Inspired by the architecture of Bali and built to LEED platinum standards, this stunning four-bedroom vacation rental in the Point Dume neighborhood combines breezy island style with eco-friendly luxury. While it’s just minutes from the beach, it’s also within day-trip distance of the shopping and nightlife of downtown Los Angeles, giving you access to the best of the area. Whether you’re bringing the kids for a family vacation, or just your sweetheart for a honeymoon or romantic escape, Malibu Tropical Retreat has everything you need for a memorable getaway. properties.host_about:
Founded in 1999, Luxury Retreats specializes in personalized villa vacations in over 90 destinations across the world. Our portfolio includes more than 2,800 luxury villas, each hand-picked and personally inspected by our global team of passionate travel enthusiasts, who work to ensure our guests are offered the very best. 

Our team of well-travelled Villa Specialists are dedicated to helping our customers find the perfect villa in the right location.  

We provide every guest with worldwide support while on vacation. Our guests can relax knowing that there’s a team on standby, should anything require immediate assistance.

To make each vacation unforgettable, our guests also enjoy the complimentary services of a dedicated concierge, who will gladly arrange for a private chef, pre-stocking a villa with provisions or anything else that they desire. And all this without charging any membership fees.

properties.name: Stunning Oceanfront Malibu Condo
properties.summary: Do you like to awaken right at the beach? We do! Take a peek...and welcome to Malibu...
properties.space: Hello there...we hope this tempts you all!  Beautifully spacious and impeccably appointed, please enjoy our (your) luxe 2 bedroom condo with its massive, unobstructed ocean views from the living room, dining room/kitchen, and the master bedroom. Located on Malibu's famous Carbon Beach, we are within walking distance to the delicious 'Nobu Malibu' and the Malibu pier. It's gorgeous here...and we'd love to have you.  For your further ease and comfort, all of our 3 large wall-mounted TVs are equipped with cable access and AppleTV for streaming. And of course our building has a fabulous ocean-view pool and barbecue area - plenty of lounge chairs, seating, and our private, secured beach access for you. We welcome your family and friends...ALL people from all over this gorgeous world we all share are welcome...thank you. Enjoy this bliss! properties.name: Cabin in the Pines at Sage Hill
properties.summary: The cabin is a secluded & romantic one room cabin with views over the ocean. The wood burning stove & hot tub make it the perfect cosy weekend getaway spot. Close enough to the city but feels a million miles away!
properties.space: Private, secluded ocean view cabin on horse ranch/vineyard estate. Surrounded by National Parkland this romantic cabin is spacious but cosy. It has a full bathroom with a tub, a well equipped kitchen,Queen size bed and sofa bed. The cabin is simply but comfortably furnished There is a wood burning stove and a hot tub with a view of Catalina. Upon arrival you will find a bottle of our own wine - Syrah or Sauvignon Blanc, cheese, crackers & fruit. There will also be eggs from the ranch chickens, muffins etc for breakfast.  We offer surf lessons, yoga, massage & of course wine tasting! We can arrange horse back lessons or trail rides locally. There are hiking trails right out the cabin door which access the Backbone Trail & Malibu Creek State Park. Mountain bikes can be rented locally. We normally have a 2 night minimum stay but over the Thanksgiving & Christmas holidays we have a 4 night minimum stay.

properties.access: Swimming pool, vineyards, horses, trails
properties.interaction: I like to greet my guests & make sure they have everything they need & answer any questions they might have. Then I like to leave them in peace! But am always available if they need something or feel like socializing or would like a wine tasting.
properties.house_rules: No smoking in cabin!  Dogs OK with 50.00 cleaning fee. Maximum of 3 adults or 2 adults & 2 children.
properties.host_about: I'm British but have lived in California for 35 years. I like to go "home" a couple of times a year to stay connected to family & friends but am always so happy to get back to sunny California! I love where I live - Sage Hill Ranch is a 7 acre paradise overlooking the ocean. It used to be a Christmas tree farm & there are hundreds of enormous Pine trees on the property. I have 5 horses & the riding around here is amazing. Miles of ocean view trails - the Backbone trail goes all the way to the beach. I planted a vineyard when I moved here 6 years ago & now we are enjoying our own Syrah, Cabernet Sauvignon & Sauvignon Blanc which we are happy to share with cabin guests! I have loved having Airbnb guests staying in the cabin. Everyone that has stayed has been so nice & many have become friends. I look forward to experiencing other Airbnb accommodations on my travels to Europe.

properties.name: Zuma Sanctuary Malibu Retreat

Please message us for pricing for special events or photo shoots. We also rent each unit individually.  Search Zuma Sanctuary to see all 4 of our listings

The space has a large yoga deck facing the ocean and a separate shaded lounge deck where there is a BBQ and sink that can be used.

properties.host_about:
Founded in 1999, Luxury Retreats specializes in personalized villa vacations in over 90 destinations across the world. Our portfolio includes more than 2,800 luxury villas, each hand-picked and personally inspected by our global team of passionate travel enthusiasts, who work to ensure our guests are offered the very best. 

Our team of well-travelled Villa Specialists are dedicated to helping our customers find the perfect villa in the right location.  

We provide every guest with worldwide support while on vacation. Our guests can relax knowing that there’s a team on standby, should anything require immediate assistance.

To make each vacation unforgettable, our guests also enjoy the complimentary services of a dedicated concierge, who will gladly arrange for a private chef, pre-stocking a villa with provisions or anything else that they desire. And all this without charging any membership fees.

properties.name: Iconic Malibu masterpiece
properties.summary: One of the most beautiful and unique homes in Malibu. One of a kind architecture and furnishings. Far reaching ocean views, yet peaceful and private with wonderful pool and outdoor entertaining areas.
properties.space: 'Ravenseye' is an architectural masterpiece designed by World renowned architect Harry Gesner and is a wonderful fusion of modern architectural style with Gothic castle. Perched on a quiet hilltop overlooking the Pacific ocean, the home is entered through a unique arched doorway. A sweeping staircase leads down to the great room with it's 30ft high vaulted arched ceilings, vast open fireplace and stone mosaic floor. All around are distinctive hand crafted elements and wonderfully eclectic furnishings. There are sweeping ocean views from every room including the three bedrooms. The house is surrounded by lush gardens, several vast decks and patio areas and a pool with a spa. A 1957 Airstream trailer sits among the trees. This truly is one of Malibu's most outstanding and iconic homes. The property is available for long term (furnished or unfurnished) and short term lease.  STRICTLY NO EVENTS OR PARTIES WITHOUT PERMISSION. PLEASE ALERT US PRIOR TO BOOKING IF THIS IS A REQUIREMENT.

properties.host_about:
I am an emergency veterinarian and a writer. I have lived in Malibu since 2005. I love the house and the area: they're all about peace, quiet and simple elegance.
Africa is my favorite place in the world and it is the only destination that offers more peace and freedom than Malibu, in my opinion. I plan to travel to Africa in the summer and look forward to having guests stay at the house while I am gone. 
I will not be here while guests visit, I will take the opportunity to bring my two dogs, a stubborn dachshund and a lovely blue nose pit to the beaches of Santa Barbara for a quick get away. You will enjoy privacy and the use of the entire house and grounds. The horses, Cinnamon and Neptune, a cute mini, stay on the property while I am gone. My gardener will be in charge of feeding them, but you are welcome to interact with them. They love apples, carrots and any fresh greens! :)

properties.host_about: I am a chef, an artist,  a full time mother, and I also created Malibu Family Farm.     I grew up in the scrap metal recycling business and demolition.  I have traveled the country since I was a teen overseeing massive demolition jobs and recovering the metals.  Im the local "handyman" to neighbors.  Im a very down to earth, generous, understanding person.  my childhood was spent in Mexico, so my cooking is based on that upbringing, mixed with my own style and infusions of asian, euro, and american.   I am from Los Angeles, Santa Monica, and other beach areas.  My husband was born and raised in Malibu.  He is a student at Pepperdine and works full time. properties.summary: Impossible to be closer to the Pacific Ocean without being on a boat! Directly Situated hovering a Wet Beach in South Malibu, close to Venice + Santa Monica. Very Bright with tons of natural light, sundeck directly over the water, 2 clean bathrooms! If you are looking for profile worth pictures to send your friends - you are going to love my place.
