properties.space: My home is roughly one thousand square feet of living, with two separate bedrooms.  I travel a lot, and I frequently host large groups of guests, so I have a number of sleeping spaces available for you to use.  The most unique aspect of my home is that it's directly on the ocean.  When I say directly on the ocean, I mean my backyard is the sea.  If you wake up early enough you'll see dolphins while you make breakfast.  If you go to sleep late enough, you'll see the moonlight shimmering over the water.   Enough about that, let's talk about the meat and potatoes of the house.  There are two separate bedrooms.  The guest bedroom has a full over full bunk bed that can easily sleep two couples.  There is a compact ensuite bathroom with a full shower, toilet, and sink.  The bathroom is pretty small, but it gets the job done.   The dining area has seating for six people, and overlooks the ocean.  There is a huge (I mean HUGE) bathroom attached to the living room. properties.neighborhood_overview: Getting to Malibu's six beaches, sunbathed coast, or illustrious university is a once in a lifetime opportunity. Evidence of this small-town's nonpareil respect for nature is everywhere. Malibu's celebrities, surfers, and students bask in its proximity to both the coast and the Santa Monica Mountains. Board, bike, and engage in the 'Bu's favorite community pastimes—judging chili cookoffs, pre-screening films at festivals, and fundraising for local organizations. Malibu is a dream.  There are celebrities everywhere, the weather is perfect, and everybody is nice.  Your neighbors on this property will likely be dolphins, pelicans, and seagulls, as you're at the beach! A dream location with breath taking views. It starts from the moment you enter your Malibu getaway, from early morning sunrise, to spectacular sunsets and magical moon beams across the ocean floor. High ceilings and a wood burning fireplace enhance the romance of your relaxing vacation. A well equipped kitchen, outdoor grill
properties.notes: You can easily walk to Moonshadows bar and restaurant.  The size of the beach is directly impacted by the tide levels.  When the tide is low, there is a lot of beach to walk on.  When the tide is high, there isn't much beach.  I can direct you to larger, more public beaches nearby, but our beach is very secluded and fun when the tide is low. The grill may or may not have a full tank of propane. I do not include propane in my rental. If you need a refill, the gas station at sunset and Pch provides them for a small charge.
properties.transit: Parking provided or uber everywhere!

properties.neighborhood_overview: Malibu is a beautiful town with several different neighborhoods (many of which we have lived in).  We love our current neighborhood because of it's "Real Malibu" feel, horses, hiking and greenery as well as the proximity to Zuma & Westward & Broad Beach. There is also a great organic grocery store 1 mile away called Vintage Grocers. Our part of Malibu is less busy than the more commercialized parts of Malibu, but still just a 10 minute drive away. In the evening you will hear little (if not zero) traffic and only the crashing of the waves at Zuma. There are spectacular hiking & mountain biking trails a 2 minute drive behind the house as well as a great running/walking/bike path along the beach.  If you choose to dine out we can give you a list of great restaurants in the area based on your preferences.
properties.notes: We will only consider guests with previous positive reviews, and the person booking MUST be the person staying at the house, no exceptions. Privacy and confidentiality are very important to us. We are a very neat and tidy household, and the house has recently been remodeled.  We ask our guests to please be mindful of this and to please respect the home as you would your own and leave it in the same condition as you found it. Please let us know in the case of any damage caused as soon as possible so we can work out a solution.   While this house does have 4 bedrooms, it is best enjoyed by families or groups of 4-6 people, and we have implemented different price tiers accordingly for the number of guests staying after 2 people.  Also, as with most of Malibu, we are on a septic system.  For this reason we cannot accommodate more than 6 guests per booking. The pool will be set to 86 degrees for the duration of your stay and the Jacuzzi to 101 (we will show you how to turn it on).  If you r
properties.transit: As with most of Los Angeles, a car is highly recommended. Ubers & Lyfts are relatively easy to call and take between 5-20 minutes to arrive. Walking to the beach is a breeze, and there is a convenient crosswalk located right down the street so you don't have to worry about crossing Pacific Coast Highway to get to the beach. Santa Monica is about a 40 minute drive without traffic, and LA about an hour depending on the time  of day you leave.
properties.access: Guests will have access to most of the house and all of the exterior.  There are 2 master bedroom walk-in closets, one of which we will keep locked as the owner's closet. Guests will not have access to the garage (stays of 1-month or more will), but there is parking for at least 6 cars inside the driveway gates. The pantry closet inside the laundry room will also be locked, but the laundry room itself is totally accessible and quite large with a giant sink and lots of counter space.
properties.interaction: One of us should be able to greet you upon arrival and departure. If not, we will have a friend or relative with an intimate knowledge of the house to show you "the ropes". We will also be accessible by phone or email (or quite possibly in person) throughout your stay.
properties.house_rules: - Please contact us with the details of your stay prior using instant book.  As per instant book guidelines if a guest does not abide by our house rules we have the right to cancel the booking. We cannot accommodate stays with more than 6 people. - Absolutely NO PARTIES and NO SMOKING! Non-booked guests are not allowed in the house without prior approval from one of us.  There is a security camera monitoring the outside the gates, as well as the street so please follow the rules. - No sand or chlorine in the house or on the furniture.   There is a pool bath that includes a shower and we request that you wash and dry off after exiting the pool or come home from the beach.  -Please respect the home as you would your own home and leave it in the same condition as you found it. - While we love children, the house may not be suitable for yours. Please email us to discuss if you plan to travel with children under 6.
properties.host_about: We are two Californians who love to cook and entertain while at home in Malibu. When traveling, we love to live like locals, if only for a few days, and get to know to the surrounding markets, shops, and eateries.  We have traveled extensively throughout the world and are always looking for the next spot to visit and meet new people. Some of our recent travel favorites include Stockholm, Madrid and "The Ice Hotel" Sweden!

properties.neighborhood_overview: This is one of the most beautiful places on earth.  We border a square mile of open space.  We sit right in the heart of the most beautiful hiking and biking areas in the world and are only about 6 minutes away from the beach.  We are about 10 minutes away from Pepperdine University and most restaurants and shops in Malibu.
properties.notes: We live upstairs in the top two floors of this house.  Although we try to be as quiet as possible, sometimes you can hear us walking around.  If this is a problem for you, this property may not be a good fit.
properties.transit: You definitely need a car to get around Malibu.  This would not be a good fit for anyone relying on public transportation.  We do have Uber that comes to the house and a bus system that runs about 2 1/2 miles away from our house.  Uber is recommended especially if you plan to have cocktails out at a restaurant.  An Uber ride to our house from most places in Malibu is about 11.
properties.access: Guests have a totally separate entrance and free convenient parking.  The large fenced yard, outdoor dining and lounging areas are totally private and for use only by the guests.  Our family makes sure to respect guests privacy.
properties.interaction: We respect the privacy of our guests and interact with them only as much as they like.
properties.house_rules: We love and respect our neighbors and have a commitment to preserve our quiet neighborhood.  This is not a party house.  We do not rent for weddings, parties, film shoots or large gatherings of any kind.  We respectfully ask that you keep noise to a minimum between the hours of 8pm - 8 am. We can not accommodate more than 4 people per booking and we do count infants and children toward the total guest count.  We can only accommodate one vehicle per booking.
properties.host_about: I am a wife & mom above all else (although my kids are all big now).  I work freelance in the entertainment industry & love my job. I have a small rescue dog, Barney, who l am crazy about. I enjoy standup paddling, especially under the full moon or at sunrise. I LOVE, LOVE, LOVE being an Airbnb host!   It is much more than a business to me; it is my passion!  Malibu is my favorite place on earth and I get enormous joy from sharing this magical place with other people. I never, ever take for granted the gorgeous landscape that surrounds our home. Mountains, ocean, trees, birds and wildlife in every direction you look.  I have the greatest love and respect for the nature herenand am honored to share it with others.

properties.name: Unit 2 - Cassandra's Room
properties.summary: ** No Pets ** Property has dogs, must not be afraid of dogs ** Private Bedroom & Bathroom. My place is close to the beach and Pepperdine University in Malibu. You’ll love my place because of the coziness. My place is good for solo adventurers. Minimum 5 days stay.

properties.house_rules: - - No smoking, No drugs. All tenants must pass background and tenant screening guidelines.

properties.name: Oceanfront Retreat - Perfect for Family Reunions
properties.summary: Hello and welcome to Malibu!  This is comprised of two 3-bed/3-bath townhouses on quiet Malibu Rd. with amazing views. Granite and limestone kitchens & bathrooms, living room with fireplace, spa tub, BBQ on oceanfront deck, 2-car parking, lounge/recreation area with bar, ping-pong and dart board. A short drive or bike ride to all the great shopping and dining Malibu has to offer.  In addition to the beach, there are lots of hiking/biking trails and wine tasting nearby.
properties.space: You'll love these townhouses as they are spacious, quiet and private with ocean views from every room. They're laid out like houses and the master bedrooms are amazing with huge picture windows that look out to the ocean.  And at night, you can see the moon and the stars without even lifting your head off your pillow!

properties.neighborhood_overview: These townhouses are located on quiet and star-studded Malibu Road.  Most beachfront residences are on the Pacific Coast Highway, a four-lane highway that is both noisy and dangerous.  Whether you choose my place or another, I highly recommend you choose somewhere on Malibu Road.  Enjoy a short walk down the beach to Malibu Seafood where they serve the best fish & chips I've ever had!  Or check out the tide pools on Flat Rock, just a few hundred feet away.
properties.notes: If you have a baby, the townhouses come equipped with a crib, play pen, high chair and gate for the top of the stairwell.  However, the place is not baby-proofed, so your baby must be supervised at all times
properties.transit: Uber is the best way to get around if you don't have a car during your stay.
properties.access: The townhouses have keyless entries, which enables 24-hour check-in and the freedom from having to manage keys.  Included with your stay is access to our beach level recreation area that has a lounge, bar, ping-pong table and dart board.   There is also a restroom and outdoor shower for washing off after a swim in the ocean. In addition, we have mountain bikes for hitting the trails or riding into town.
properties.interaction: Co-host Waverly will check you in upon your arrival.  She will be looking after you during your stay and is available by cell phone.
properties.house_rules: For stays that include a Friday or Saturday night, a three night minimum is required between April 1 and May 31, and a four night minimum is required between June 1 and September 4, as well as Easter, Thanksgiving, Christmas and New Years.  Only confirmed guests are allowed on the property.  No one else is permitted without my specific consent.

properties.name: *NEW* Magical Reel Kick Ranch@ PCH!
properties.summary: New!!! 11 acre Ranch Getaway 1/2 mile to Latigo break/Pch. Gorgeous 1 & 1 Guest home. Stunning easy Ocean view hike to picnic table. Hot tub, W/D and dishwasher! Exceptional Concierge services by Simone- picnic, wine tasting, private dinner, driving! No TV! NO AC- We live inside/outside lives with open doors and windows :)
properties.space: Brand New listing! Great Value and low rate offered while we build up reviews and a reputation! This home is the renovated 1950's guest house of this classic Malibu Property.  The original home burned in the 2007 fire. It is a Magical and unique space. Its wild Malibu minutes from the beach and restaurants.  Lovely Hot tub to relax in - It is adjacent to the path to the other airbnb rental but i didn't want to make a privacy wall  because the Oak trees are so gorgeous and the other rental cannot see you once at their space. But I am looking forward to suggestions. Hammock, swings, nature walks, hiking, yoga, There is so much to do on this property. You share this property with wildlife and possibly another couple. We appreciate your respect to the land by  helping to keep the place wonderful for everyone.

properties.neighborhood_overview: Malibu, for us, is trails, hiking and riding! For others it is surfing, beaches, Road Biking and shopping! We are situated right in the middle of everything Malibu has to offer. No long winding drives. From Reel Kick Ranch, the beach is 1/2 mile drive or a 15 min walk to Latigo shores. World renown '1st point' Malibu pier beach is a ten minute drive and Zuma beach is a 15 min drive. We are between Solstice canyon and Escondido canyon parks and many others are only a short drive away! Latigo canyon road is also a famous motorcycle, road bike and driving canyon road. Be safe!
properties.notes: Internet is Mostly good...  Verizon is the only carrier that works on the property- Classic Malibu! No Cable or TV There are chickens and ROOSTERS Coyotes noises Its a ranch - complete with  crowing roosters and abundant wildlife.  We do our best to evict mice and spiders but they do live on our property! If you enjoy nature and the outdoors close to Urban shopping you will LOVE us.
properties.transit: Malibu taxi, Uber, public Transportion, Biking
properties.access: Explore scenic trails on our property. There is a ten min easy hike to our picnic table and hitching post overlooking the ocean. We welcome you to pop a cork and breath it all in! A lovely BBQ space, fire pit (when allowed), wifi.  Colorful, fresh, organic, free-range eggs are supplied for your breakfast! Wander the property at your leisure.
properties.interaction: You will be emailed a detailed pdf on the property that you must read for directions/parking ect..  Simone is our new Ranch Concierge! She can arrange any number of wonderful things from Driving, private dinners and wine tastings, Photographer, Picnics. All customized to suit your needs. Prices vary.
properties.house_rules: No Smoking No Fires No littering Conserve water IF you bring a dog be aware of the coyotes!!! Many of them live on our property.  Respect the unique personal possessions left for your homey enjoyment Be honest! If you did something bad just tell us so we can help fix it! Don't feed the animals - an oldie but goodie : ) Take your garbage to the bins and do your dishes before you go. Noise down at 10 pm Don't open the chicken coop or let them out. Make sure the toilet isn't running or using water in any unnecessary way. We save water where we can so be a part of that! DO have fun hiking and surfing and enjoying the dynamic of the special animals that live here and the amazingness that is MALIBU! Cant wait to meet you!
properties.host_about:
A Canadian who relocated to Malibu five years ago to live in the sun with horses, chickens and dogs! 

I love to Host and if you need any help, suggestions or have a special occasion that needs organizing. Im here to make it happen!
